texts.en: Fe, a 56-year-old loving mother of four children, operates a retail store as a source of income.  She is now requesting a loan of 10,000 pesos to buy soft drinks, biscuits, noodles, and coffee to sell, purchases that will allow her to keep generating income for the improvement of the family's living situation.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, biscuits, noodles, and coffee to sell.

loans.name: Remie

texts.en:
For the past eight years Remie has made money by selling packed peanuts and banana chips in her village. She assists her husband in improving their life this way.

Remie must run after vehicles in traffic to sell her wares, even though she finds it difficult and is afraid of accidents. Nevertheless, she does so and takes extra care of herself just to be able to take home the money her husband and she need.

Now Remie is asking for a 15,000 PHP loan from ASKI to buy additional peanuts, banana chips, packaging for these and oil to sell. She is praying for a great improvement in her income through this loan in order to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy additional peanuts, banana chips, packaging for these and oil to sell.

loans.name: María Nareida

texts.es: María Nereida, tiene la edad de 44 años, es casada, y tiene una hija que es su mayor prioridad. Ella quiere  comprar pollos para engordarlos. Tiene varios años que se dedica a esta actividad. Su deseo es mejorar la producción y los ingresos.  Es  primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR, porque FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. María Nereida también tiene el deseo de brindarle a su hija la educación necesaria  para que sea en el futuro una persona preparada y pueda enfrentar de manera más fácil la vida.
texts.en: María Nereida is 44 years old, she is married and has one daughter, her main reason of life. She wants to buy chickens to fatten them, she has been engaged in this activity for many years, and she wants to increase her productions and her income. This is the first loan she has been given by FUDECOSUR, because FUDECOSUR granted her the loan more easily and its inters rates were very low. María Nereida also wants to granted her daughter the education she needs to be a trained professional in the future in order to face life in an easier way.

loans.use: To buy chickens.

loans.name: Gissela Patricia

texts.es: Gissela es una mujer de 38 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su mercadería su historia empezó para ayudar a sus hijos comenzó a vender productos y así ser la fuente de ingreso para su familia, su trabajo lo hace sola los pedidos y le llegan a casa depende a qué hora este él productos, no tiene dificultades, está soltera, tiene2 hijos, su sueño más importante es seguir ganando clientela para luego el objetivo de ayudar a su familia. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su mercadería y asi comprar perfumes, cremas, desodorantes para tener mas capital de trabajo.
texts.en: Gissela is a 38 year-old woman who aspires in coming years to prosper with her business.  She started this business to help her children.  She started selling products so that she could obtain a source of income for her family.  She works alone, and sells by taking orders and delivering them to the houses when they arrive.  She has no particular difficulties in her work.  She is single and has 2 children.  Her main dream is to continue to attract customers so that she can help her family.  To do this, she needs a loan to buy merchandise.  She will use the loan to buy perfumes, creams and deodorants so that she can have more working capital.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams and deodorants

loans.name: Deysi Esperanza

texts.es:
La señora Deysi tiene 31 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos uno de 9 años y unos gemelos de 2 años. Ella de dedica a la compra y venta de pescado desde hace doce años, fue su mamá quien la motivo pues ella siempre se ha dedicado a esa actividad. 

Para vender el pescado ella tiene que recorrer largas distancias, su meta es invertir el préstamo para comprar los pescados para dos semanas, ya que ella esta comprando actualmente para el día, debido a que no tiene el dinero suficiente para comprar más. 

Ella se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. ha prepararle la comida a sus hijos y a su esposo, luego sale a comprar el pescado, para llegar al lugar donde lo compra debe viajar en tres autobuses y el recorrido es de tres horas, después de haberlo comprado se va a venderlo a una ciudad del oriente del país, luego se regresa a su casa un poco cansada, pero su sueño es sacar adelante a su familia.

El préstamo que esta solicitando la señora Deysi, es para comprar pescado seco, ya que se aproxima la semana santa, por eso ella quiere comprar por mayor para tener suficiente en esos días. Al comprarlos por mayor los adquiere más baratos y podrá obtener mejores ganancias. También viajara menos ahorrándose tiempo y dinero, mejorando su negocio y recibiendo más ganancias, por lo que le brindara mejor vida a su familia.

Su sueño es tener un puesto en el mercado, ya que actualmente lo hace de manera ambulante y darles el estudio a sus hijos para que su vida sea diferente.
texts.en:
Sra. Deysi is 31 years old and lives with her husband and their three children, one of 9 years and the twins who are 2 years old. She has been buying and selling fish for twelve years. Her mother motivated her because she herself had always been engaged in this business.

Deysi has to travel long distances to sell fish. Her goal is to use the loan to buy fish for two weeks since she is currently purchasing by the day because she does not have enough money to buy more.

She gets up at 4 a.m. and prepares breakfast for her children and husband and then leaves to buy fish. In order to reach the place where she buys them, she needs to ride three autobuses and the trip takes three hours. After buying the fish she goes to a city in the eastern part of the country to sell them. Then she returns home a bit tired, however her dream is to move her family forward.

The loan she is requesting is to buy dried fish since Easter Week is approaching and she wants to buy wholesale to have a sufficient quantity during those days. By buying wholesale she acquires the fish cheaper and will be able to earn a greater profit. She will also travel less thereby saving time and money. Expanding her business and earning more profit will provide her family with a better life.

Deysi’s dream is to have a stall in the market since currently she is a street vender. She also wants to give her children an education so that their lives will be different.

loans.use: to purchase dried fish wholesale.

loans.name: Rukhsana's Group

texts.en:
Rukhsana is the mother of five children. Her husband makes and sells lemon soda, a cold drink very popular among his customers. Her eldest son works with his father while all of her remaining children are enrolled in the local school and getting their education.

Rukhsana is a seamstress. To help support her family, she sews clothes for her customers in her community. She is very efficient in her work, and due to her good skills, she receives regular orders every month.

Rukhsana’s group has applied for a 95,000 PKR loan from KIVA’s partner Asasah. She will use her portion to help with her husband’s business. With the money he will buy a soda-making appliance that will allow him to offer better quality cold drinks to his customers and so increase his sales and profits.

Rukhsana is confident that with this loan her husband’s business will improve.

loans.use: to buy a soda-making appliance.

loans.name: José Isidro

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 28 años de edad, es padre soltero de un hijo. Desde los 12 años de edad se dedica a trabajar como jornalero y ha administrar un terreno propiedad de un doctor que esta cerca de su comunidad, también se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado.

Él tiene una vaca parida y un par de bueyes, se dedica a sacar fletes de leña del dueño de la propiedad que administra. El ganado lo compra en cabañas, sus materiales y la comida para el ganado lo adquiere en un lugar que esta a dos kilómetros y medio del  desvió donde aborda el autobús que tarda media hora en llegar al lugar donde compra lo que necesita.

Él solicita un préstamo para comprar un par de bueyes y para comprar concentrado para el ganado que ya posee. Con el financiamiento él tendrá mejor oportunidad de continuar trabajando con los bueyes realizando viajes a otras personas, ya que en su lugar no se encuentra un medio de transporte donde se pueda utilizar en diversos viajes. Por lo que recibirá mejores ganancias. En sus planes esta seguir trabajando con sus bueyes, comprar ganado y ampliar su casa ya que tiene un terreno suficiente para seguir construyendo.
texts.en:
José is 28 years old, he is a single father and has one son. For the past 12 years he has made a living working as a day laborer as well as managing land that is owned by a doctor and is close to his community. He also buys and resells cattle. 

He has a foal and a pair of oxen, which he uses to transport firewood from the land that he manages for the owner. He buys the cattle from a ranch, and the materials and food for the cattle he buys in a place that is located 2.5 kilometers from where he boards the bus; it takes him a half an hour to get to the place where he buys the things he needs.   

He has requested a loan to buy two oxen and to buy feed for the cattle that he already has. With this loan he will have a better opportunity to continue working with oxen, using them to make trips for other people as well; where he lives the forms of transportation are limited and infrequent. This will allow him to increase his earnings. His future plans include continuing to work with oxen, buying cattle, and making his house bigger (he already has a lot that is big enough on which to expand construction)

loans.use: to buy a pair of oxen and feed for his animals.

loans.name: Marvin

texts.es:
El señor Marvin tiene 44 años de edad, es casado con dos hijos. Él se dedicaba a realizar actividades agrícolas, pero hoy en día trabaja como motorista para una institución del gobierno, es una persona muy trabajadora y cristiana. Tiene dos vacas que ordeña obtiene leche, crema y guajada, la cual vende. Este trabajo de la ganadería lo realiza desde que era un niño y solo vivía con su mamá ya que ella fue madre soltera y fue quien le enseño a defenderse en la vida, por eso Marvin se dedicaba a realizar esas tareas.

Él esta acompañado y es padre de dos hijas, las que lo impulsan a seguir luchando, para salir adelante con su familia. Marvin se traslada desde su cantón hasta una ciudad  del oriente del país en autobús. Él ha estado comprando dos quintales de concentrado, pero con el crédito piensa comprar al por mayor para ya no viajar tanto y ahorrarse ese dinero.

Él solicita un préstamo para comprar dos vacas paridas y para comprar concentrado lechero para su alimentación. Cada vaca cuesta $450 dólares, por lo que comprara dos y el resto lo invertirá en el concentrado. De esta manera ampliara sus ventas, por que tendrá más productos que vender, por lo que sus ganancias se mejoraran para ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, que no les falte nada. Manifiesta Marvin que de las ganancias que obtenga, ahorrara para comprar más vacas y así incrementar el negocio de los lácteos.
texts.en:
Marvin is 44 years old, and is married with 2 children.  He used to work as a farmer, but now he works as a driver for a government institution.  He is a Christian and a very hardworking person.  He has 2 cows that he milks to get milk, cream and milk curd, which he sells.  He has been working with livestock since he was a child.  At that time he lived only with his mother, because she was a single mother.  She was the one who taught him how to make a living, and this is the reason that Marvin has been doing this type of work.

Marvin has a partner and is the father of 2 daughters.  His daughters are the ones who motivated him to continue to strive to get ahead with his family.  Marvin goes from his canton to a city in the east on a bus to buy two 100-pound sacks of concentrate (animal feed), but with this loan he plans to buy at wholesale so he doesn't have to travel as much, and can save some money.

He is requesting a loan to buy 2 dairy cows and to buy concentrated feed for them.  Each cow costs 450 US dollars, so he will buy 2, and will invest the rest of the money in the feed.  In this way he will increase his sales, because he will have more products to sell, and his earnings will improve.  This will allow  him to improve his family's quality of life and provide them with everything they need.  Marvin says that with the earnings he obtains he will save, so that he can buy more cows and continue to expand his dairy business.

loans.use: to buy 2 dairy cows and to buy concentrated feed for them.

loans.name: Wilson Alejandro

texts.es:
Wilson tiene 19 años de edad y vive con su compañera de vida. Desde hace cinco años trabaja como empleado en una venta de productos lácteos, este negocio lo aprendió gracias a su deseo de superación. 

Su lugar de trabajo esta situado en una ciudad del oriente del país, por lo que se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. ya que el recorrido desde su casa hasta la ciudad es de dos horas y medias, por eso debe salir de mañana para llegar a tiempo a su trabajo.

Wilson solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para repellar su vivienda y construirle dos habitaciones, por que se acaba de acompañar y su esposa esta embarazada y lo que él más desea es que sus hijos nazcan y crezcan en una casa digna, en un ambiente agradable, seguro y cómodo. Él manifiesta que seguirá luchando para brindarles la mejor de las vidas a sus hijos y esposa.
texts.en:
Wilson is 19 years old and lives with his life partner.  For five years he has worked as an employee of a dairy product business.  He learned this job thanks to his desire to improve himself.

His workplace is located in a city in the eastern part of the country.  He gets up at 4:30 a.m. because the trip from his house to the city is two-and-a-half hours.  This is why he has to leave so early to get to work on time.

Wilson is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to stucco his home and build two rooms onto it, because he just enclosed it.

His wife is pregnant, and what he wants most is for his children to be born and grow up in a decent house and in a pleasant, safe, and comfortable environment.  He says he will continue to struggle to give his children and wife the best of life.

loans.use: to stucco his home and build two rooms.

loans.name: Edis Breidy

texts.es:
Edis Breidy es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y siempre buscar una mejor calidad de vida para su familia. Edis Breidy con 37 años de edad, se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo a quien siempre le ha querido ofrecer una educación de calidad. Edis Breidy ha tenido que atravesar muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo las ganas de salir adelante le han permitido superarlas y continuar con su vida. Edis Breidy se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a la conducción, y gracias a esto ha generado los ingresos para su familia, sin embargo, estos no son suficientes para poder cubrir todas las necesidades de su familia. Es por esto que Edis Breidy esta montando una tienda general la cual le permita generar ingresos extras y poder así alternar la actividad de la conducción con la atención de su negocio generando mayores ingresos para su hogar. Edis Breidy inició con muy poco capital el montaje de su tienda, pero poco a poco ha ido surtiéndola con más productos de la canasta familiar. El mayor inconveniente que ha encontrado Edis Breidy es la numerosa competencia que hay en su región, y esto ha hecho que captar sus clientes sea un duro trabajo. Con el ánimo de seguir surtiendo su tienda, Edis Breidy busca que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar los cuales le permitan aumentar los productos que ofrece en su tienda, y terminar de montar el negocio. 

Edis Breidy espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá atender más necesidades de sus clientes. Además, espera con los ingresos extras provenientes de su tienda, poderles ofrecer a su esposa y a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progresar económicamente.
texts.en:
Edis Breidy is a person described as being very hardworking and always looking for a better quality of life for his family. He is 37 years old, married and the father of a son for whom he has wanted to provide a quality education. He has had to face many adversities in his life however his desire to get ahead has enabled him to overcome them and continue on.

Edis Breidy has spent a large part of his life in transportation and thanks to it has generated income for his family. Nevertheless this is not enough to cover all the family’s needs. Consequently, Edis Breidy is opening a general story which will enable him to generate extra income for his home by alternating his time between driving and running his store. He began with very little capital however, little by little, he has supplied his store with more household basic necessities. The greatest drawbacks he has encountered are the numerous competitors in his area. This has made attracting customers a difficult task. With the goal of continuing to stock his store, Edis Breidy will use his loan to buy essential household supplies thereby expanding the products he offers in his store and completing the inventory for his business. 

Edis Breidy hopes that in this way his income will greatly increase since he will be able to meet more of his customers’ demands. As well he expects that the extra income from his store will enable him to provide his wife and son a better quality of life and greater opportunities to succeed economically.

loans.use: to purchase essential household supplies which will enable him to expand the products that he offers in his store and finish stocking his business

loans.name: Fabian De Jesus

texts.es:
Fabián se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a la actividad de la agricultura, actividad con la cual ha podido sacar sus hijos adelante y superar las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida. Fabián es un padre soltero a cargo de 2 hijos de 10 y 15 años de edad, a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena educación y una buena calidad de vida. Gracias a la buena calidad de los cultivos de Fabián, sus productos son muy apetecidos por sus clientes y esto ha permitido generar buenos ingresos para su familia. Debido a los cambios de climas sus cultivos se han visto vulnerables y no ha crecido lo suficiente. Con el ánimo de sacar su cultivo adelante y poder entregar a sus clientes un producto de buena calidad, Fabián aspira a que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de semillas y abonos para su cultivo de modo que pueda recuperar el cultivo que se ha visto golpeado por los cambios de clima.

Fabián espera que de esta manera su cultivo pueda ser de buena calidad y pueda venderlo a un buen precio a sus clientes, de esta manera podrá generar los ingresos para el sostenimiento de sus hijos. Fabián sueña con poder tener un gran cultivo y diversificar los productos hasta cultivar legumbres y frutas. Fabián sueña con que su hijo pueda acceder a una educación universitaria y pueda tener una estabilidad económica que le permita salir adelante.
texts.en:
Fabian has spent most of his life farming, and with this activity he has been able to provide for his children and overcome the adversities that he has experienced in life.  Fabian is a single parent who has 2 children in his care, aged 10 and 15 years old.  He has always wanted to provide them with a good education and a good quality of life.  Thanks to the good quality of Fabian's crops, his products are sought-after by his customers, and this has allowed him to generate good earnings for his family.  Because of some climate changes, his crops have become vulnerable and are not growing enough.  With the intention of getting his crops to grow so that he can deliver good quality products to his customers, Fabian is hoping to buy seeds and fertilizers with this loan.  This way he can make up for the crops that have been damaged by the climate changes.

Fabian hopes that in this way his crops will be of good quality, and he will be able to sell them to his customers for a good price.  This will allow him to generate income to support his children.  Fabian dreams of having a large farm and diversifying his products by growing vegetables and fruits.  Fabian's dream is for his son to get a college education so that he can have economic stability, which will allow him to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers so that he can make up for crops that were damaged by changes in the climate

loans.name: Dominga Ana

texts.es:
La señora Dominga Ana, tiene 41 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 2 hijos, se dedica a la confección de tejidos, inicio este negocio siendo operario y hasta el momento lleva 2 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de telas e hilos, y poder mejorar su producción ya que se dedica a realizar costura de gabachas, delantales camisas y pantalones por encargos, espera en el futuro tener un negocio mas grande.
texts.en:
Dominga Ana is 41 years old. She did not have the opportunity to study. She has two children. She makes a living making clothing. She started this business herself and now has two years of experience. 

She has requested a loan that she will use to buy fabric and thread. It will allow her to improve her production; she currently makes aprons, shirts and pants for order. She hopes that in the future she will have a bigger business.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make clothing

loans.name: Yolanda De Jesus

texts.es:
Yolanda empezó su negocio desde que estaba recién casada. Un día se encontraba elaborando las arepas para el consumo de su familia cuando una vecina le pidió el favor de hacerle sus arepas y ella le pagaba por ellas. Su vecina quedó muy satisfecha y le fue contando a sus demás vecinas y de esta forma su negocio fue creciendo hasta llegar a atender las tiendas y los autoservicios de su municipio. Yolanda trabaja sola, ya que su esposo tiene otro empleo para poder entre los dos generar ingresos suficientes para su hogar. En las mañanas cocina el maíz, a medio día lo muele y en horas de la tarde elabora y asa las arepas, ya en la mañana siguiente mientras el maíz del día siguiente se cocina se dedica a realizar las entregas de las arepas a sus clientes. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus arepas, Yolanda tiene muy buenos pedidos, hasta el punto en que últimamente no ha tenido capacidad de atender a todos sus clientes. Es por esto que Yolanda busca un préstamo que le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de maíz en grandes cantidades para obtener un buen precio y a mejorar sus herramientas de trabajo como el horno asador y las parrillas de enfriamiento, que se han visto deterioradas con el pasar del tiempo por el trabajo.

Yolanda espera que su negocio le permita ofrecerles a su esposo y a su hija de 14 años una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades de progreso. Además sueña con comprar su casa propia y con ofrecerle a su hija la oportunidad de acceder a una educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Yolanda began her business from the time she was a newlywed. One day she was making arepas (traditional Colombian corn cakes) for her family to eat, when a neighbor asked her to please make arepas for her, and she would pay for them. Her neighbor was very satisfied, and started telling her other neighbors, and in this way her business grew little by little, until it came to serve stores and supermarkets in her municipality.  

Yolanda works alone, since her husband has another job, so that between the two of them they can generate sufficient income for their household. 

In the mornings she cooks the corn, at mid-day she grinds it, and in the afternoon she forms the arepas and bakes them. The next morning while the corn for the following day is cooking, she delivers the arepas to her customers.  

Thanks to the good quality of her arepas, Yolanda has very good orders, to the point where lately she has not had the capacity to serve all her customers. This is why Yolanda is seeking a loan that offers her the chance to purchase corn in large quantities to get a better price; and to improve her equipment such as the roasting oven and cooling racks, that are in poor condition from long use.

Yolnda hopes that her business will allow her to offer her husband and her 14-year-old daughter a better quality of life, and a better chance to succeed. In addition, she dreams of buying her own house and offering her daughter the chance to get a university education.

loans.use: To buy corn in large quantities to get a better price, and to improve her equipment such as the roasting oven and cooling racks, that are in poor condition as a result of long use.

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en:
Visitacion is 51 years old and has four children. Two of them are still studying, so she can devote herself to her business. To earn an income she buys and sells clothes such as pants, T-shirts and blouses in the public market.

Visitacion is asking for a 10,000 PHP loan from ASKI to buy stocks of underwear, blouses, skirts, jackets and T-shirts to sell. Hopefully, with her determination she can provide for the needs of her family, especially her school-aged children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of underwear, blouses, skirts, jackets and T-shirts to sell.

loans.name: Deisy Abigail

texts.es:
La señora Deysi tiene 63 años de edad, esta casada con cuatro hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de quesitos de mantequilla y crema desde que tenía 15 años de edad. Hoy en día ya tiene 47 años de experiencia en esta actividad, aprendió el oficio desde que estaba con sus padres. Ella manifiesta que esta actividad es un legado de familia, ya que tanto ella como sus hermanas se dedican a lo mismo y dice que siempre lo seguirá realizando hasta que Dios le preste vida y es de esa forma que saca adelante a su familia.  
Ella no compra los insumos para su producción, ya que en su familia siempre han tenido sus vacas, lo que hace es procesar la leche que obtiene de las vacas para realizar sus ventas en el mercado, para llegar ahí Deysi debe caminar a pie treinta y cinco minutos desde su casa hasta un desvió, donde aborda el autobús durante quince minutos que lo conduce a otro desvió y finalmente camina durante diez minutos a pie para llegar al mercado. 
El préstamo que esta solicitando la señora Deysi, es para comprar dos vacas, por que la venta que esta teniendo es bastante grande y solo tiene tres vacas paridas y esa lecha no le es suficiente.  Con la inversión ella aumentara su producción de leche, mejorara la calidad de vida de su familia, obtendrá mayores ganancias y así dispondrá en su casa de todo lo necesario para sobrevivir y ahorrar de esas ganancias por cualquier enfermedad que se presente.
texts.en:
Deysi, age 63, is married and has four children.  She has been selling little cheeses from butter and cream since she was 15 years old.  She now has 47 years of experience in this business activity.  She learned this trade when she was with her parents.  She says that this business activity is a family legacy.  She and her sisters do the same thing, and she says that she will always continue doing it as long as God gives her life.  This is the way she gets her family ahead.

She does not buy the supplies for her production because her family has always had cows.  What she does is process the milk she gets from the cows in order to make her sales at the market.  In order to get there Deysi needs to walk on foot for 35 minutes from her house to a turnoff where she boards a bus.  She rides for 15 minutes until she gets to another turnoff.  Finally, she walks on foot for ten minutes to get to the market.

The loan that Deysi is requesting is to buy two cows.  The sales she is making are pretty large, and she only has three dairy cows.  Their milk is insufficient.  With the loan she will increase her milk production, improve her family’s quality of life, and get greater income.  This way she will provide everything that is needed in her house in order to survive.  She will save her earnings for whatever malady presents itself.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Anselma

texts.es:
La señora Anselma tiene 44 años de edad, vive con su esposo y dos hijos. A los 12 años de edad ella empezó a trabajar como empleada en un hotel, luego se acompaño con su esposo y procreo dos hijos, desde entonces se dedica a la ganadería y a la crianza de especies menores. 
Para crecer poco a poco en la producción de especies menores, ella compra en pequeñas cantidades como pollos, cerdos, etc. el ganado lo ha comprado a vecinos de su comunidad.  
El préstamo que esta solicitando la señora Anselma, es para comprar dos vacas, para ir creciendo poco a poco el número de ganado y por consiguiente la producción de leche se ha mayor, para comercializarla en la comunidad. De esta manera ella fortalecerá sus ingresos económicos, ella es una persona trabajadora y les brindara a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. Ella desea ayudar a sus hijos con el estudio básico y con la universidad.
texts.en:
Anselma is 44 years old. She lives with her husband and two children. When she was 12 years old she started working as an employee in a hotel. Later she married her husband and had two children. Since then she has made a living raising livestock and other small animals. To slowly increase the business she does with small animals, she buys in small quantities chickens, pigs, etc. The cattle she has bought from neighbors in her community. 

The loan that Anselma is requesting is to buy two cows, to grow little by little the number of cattle she has and to begin a business producing milk to sell in the community. In this way she will be able to increase her earnings. She is a very hard worker, who provides for her children a higher quality of life. She wants to help her children be able to study in high school and university.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Alia's Group

texts.en:
Alia is married and has five children, three of them girls and two, boys. Only three of them are getting an education, as she is unable to afford to educate all of them. Her other two children stay at home.

Alia’s husband sells a local food called fruit chaat, which is made of fruits and spices. He is experienced in making it, and it is very popular among his customers. He makes a reasonably good income from his business.

Alia’s group has applied for an 80,000 PKR loan from KIVA’s partner Asasah. She will invest her portion of the loan in her husband’s business. With the money he will buy fruit and spices in larger quantities so as to be able to prepare more quality food and earn more profits by increasing his sales.

Alia is hopeful that this loan will help her husband to make a greater profit from his business.

loans.use: he will buy fruit and spices in larger quantities for his chaat.

loans.name: Ervie

texts.en: Ervie is 31 years old and is married. She earns a living by selling fish and meat in the village. She is borrowing PHP 15,000 to buy additional meat and fish to sell and to earn higher income. She has been doing this for 3 years and she is able to save for the studies of her two children. Ervie is working tirelessly for the sake of her children's education and the development of their lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy additional meat and fish to sell.

loans.name: Mukhbira

texts.ru: Мухбира честная и добрая молодая жена. На воспитании имеет двоих детей. Муж занимается предоставлением услуги такси. Более 5 лет она занимается купле- продажей женской верхней одежды. Она продает джемперы, кардиган, безрукавки и т.д. Когда ей было 15 лет, она с матерью торговала на базаре и в данное время отдельно самостоятельно работает. Муж помогает с грузоперевозкой. Мухбира запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки джемперов, свитеров и безрукавки. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Mukhbira is an honest and kind, young wife.  She is raising two children.  Her husband is involved in providing a taxi service.  Mukhbira has been involved in buying and selling women's outerwear.  She sells sweaters, cardigans, vests, etc.  When she was fifteen years old, she and her mother sold at the market, and currently she works independently.  Her husband helps with transportation.  Mukhbira is requesting a loan in the sum of 10,000 Somoni to buy jumpers, sweaters and vests.  She relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy clothing for sale

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her son’s embroidery business. With the loan investment, she will buy embroidery frame, beads, and thread in larger quantities and of more variety, which will allow her to provide better quality embroidered clothes to her clients and increase her sales and profits.

Naseem is a seamstress and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. She is very skillful in her work and receives regular orders every month.

She is a mother of 4 other children. None of them could complete their education due to financial constraints. She is hopeful that her son will successfully be able to improve his business after the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy beads and thread for the embriodery business.

loans.name: Héctor David

texts.es:
Héctor tiene 32 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su mamá y un hermano. Es una persona responsable en su comunidad, honesto con buena reputación. Él se ha dedicado toda su vida a la agricultura, a sembrar maíz y fríjol, además cultiva hortalizas.

Él esta solicitando un préstamo a la Fundación Campo, para comprar seis rollos de poliducto que cuesta $140 dólares, dos sacos de formula para fertilizantes que cuestan $104 dólares y cuatro mariposas para el riego de las hortalizas que cuestan $14 dólares y el resto será para pago de mano de obra ya que también sembrara maíz y fríjol.

La inversión le ayudara para trabajar en las hortalizas y obtener buenas ganancias, para la compra de insumos agrícolas para la producción de hortalizas. De esta forma tendrá una cultura de ahorro, le dará una mejor vida a su familia y  la producción será mejor.

Héctor desea reparar el techo de su vivienda, continuar trabajando con las hortalizas, tener una mejor vida en su familia, seguirse superando y continuar trabajando con la Fundación.
texts.en:
Hector is 32, single, and lives with his mother and brother. He is a responsible person in his community, honest and with a good reputation. He has farmed all his life, growing corn and beans, as well as vegetables.

He is applying to Fundación Campo for a loan to buy six rolls of plastic pipe ($140), two sacks of fertilizer ($104), four butterfly valves for irrigating his vegetables ($14); and the rest will be to pay for labor, since he will also plant corn and beans.

The investment will help him cultivate his vegetables and make good profits, as well buy agricultural supplies for growing vegetables.

This way, production will be better; he will be able to save, and give his family a better life. Hector wishes to repair the roof of his house, continue growing vegetables, have a better family life, keep improving himself, and keep working with the Foundation.

loans.use: To buy six rolls of plastic pipe ($140), two sacks of fertilizer ($104), four butterfly valves for irrigating his vegetables ($14). The rest is to pay for labor, since he will also plant corn and beans.

loans.name: Hovel Ottoniel

texts.es:
El señor Hovel Ottoniel es casado, tiene 32 años de edad, se dedica ala confección de playeras, cursó el tercer grado de educacion básica, tiene 3 hijos, inicio su negocio de producción de playeras como operario y hasta el momento lleva 10 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de telas e hilos para mejorar su producción de playeras, y seguir mejorando su negocio ya que en el futuro espera contar con operarios.
texts.en:
Hovel Ottoniel is married, he is 32 years old, and he makes t-shirts. He completed three years of school and he has 3 children. He began his t-shirt production business as a workman and he now has 10 years of experience. He has the support of his wife, who does the same kind of work.

He is requesting a loan which he will use to buy fabric and thread to improve his t-shirt production, and to continue to improve his business since in the future he hopes to have workers.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana Maria es una joven emprendedora que debido a las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida le ha tocado generar sus propios ingresos para salir adelante. Ana Maria a sus 20 años de edad es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 1 hijo de 2 años de edad, a quien siempre le ha querido ofrecer todo lo necesario. Debido a que el padre de su hijo nunca hizo una contribución económica para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hijo, Ana Maria se vio obligada a generar por parte de ella todos los ingresos necesarios. Ana Maria se dedica desde aproximadamente 1 año a la venta de productos de uso personal y ropa a través de catálogos, y gracias a esto genera sus ingresos. Ana Maria gracias al buen servicio que ofrece, cuenta con muy buenos clientes, los que hacen grandes pedidos a su negocio. Con el ánimo de atender algunos pedidos de sus clientes, Ana Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal y ropa para hacer entrega de los grandes pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.

Ana Maria espera que de esta manera su negocio siga generando los ingresos para su hogar y poder ofrecerle a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida. Ana Maria sueña con tener un gran negocio donde pueda atender una gran cantidad de clientes y donde pueda obtener grandes beneficios que le permitan generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y seguir saliendo adelante junto a su hijo.
texts.en:
Ana Maria is a young entrepreneur, who has needed to generate her own income to move ahead, owing to the adversities which she has faced in life.  At 20 years of age, Ana Maria is a single mother and head of her family, with a two-year-old child whom she has always wanted to provide with everything he needs.  As the father of her child has never contributed financially towards her child's upkeep, Ana Maria found herself obliged to meet all her income needs on her own.  

For the last year or so, Ana Maria has been working selling personal care products and clothing from catalogs, and thanks to this she has earned herself an income.  Thanks to the good service that she provides, Ana Maria has many good customers who place large orders with her business.  With the goal of meeting several customer orders, Ana Maria is looking for a loan to give her the possibility to purchase personal care products and clothing to meet the large orders that her customers have placed.

Ana Maria hopes that in this way, her business will continue earning income for her household and she will be able to provide her child with a better quality of life.  Ana Maria dreams of having a large business where she can serve a large number of customers and earn good profits which would allow her to create employment for those who most need it.  She also dreams of continuing to move ahead in life together with her child.

loans.use: to purchase personal care products and clothing to meet the large orders that her customers have placed.

loans.name: Duo Xejul Group

texts.es: Duo Xejul. Este duo esta integrado por doña Aura que es separada tiene 39 años de edad,tiene una hija,ella se dedica a la elavoracion de güipiles desde hace 5 años, al igual que la señora maria ester de 46 años de edad tiene tres hijos ella se dedica a la elavoracion de güipiles a mano ella nos cuenta que nececita este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos güipiles tipicos, ya que su sueño es tener un local donde vender porque actual mente vende de forma ambulante,desde ya agradecen a kiva por la ayuda.
texts.en:
Xejul Duo includes Aura. She is separated, 39 years old and has a daughter. She has been making güipil garments for 5 years. 

Maria Ester is 46 years old, has three children and also hand makes güipil garments. She tells us that she needs this loan to buy the raw materials to make traditional woven güipil garments, since her dream is to have a place to sell her wares, because she currently travels to sell them. 

They would like to thank Kiva for the help.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making woven goods and güipil garments

loans.name: Yuon's Group

texts.en:
Yuon is 42 and a widow who lives in a village of the Thmor Koul district of Cambodia. She has four children, two of whom are still dependent and working in Thailand for pay. To struggle to support her family, she has been earning a living through working for others for pay. She has been in this business for 18 years. With her current business, she earns KRH 25,000 per day to make a living. 

Yuon and another member have just joined with Kiva's field partner, VisionFund this loan cycle while the last member has been with VisionFund for three years. She is leading this group to apply for a loan with VisionFund. As the leader, she will use the entire loan to buy an old motorbike to ease her travel with the business. With this loan, she hopes to afford a motorbike to make it easy to travel for both personal and business purposes.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike

loans.name: Ly's Group

texts.en:
Ly is a resident living in a rural area of the Ratanak Mondul district of Cambodia. She is 27 years old and has four children. Only two of them are now still in school. The other two are too young to attend school. To earn a living, she has been farming corn and pepper as the main sources of income for almost nine years. 

Ly’s group has just joined with Kiva’s field partner, VisionFund, this loan cycle. Now they are requesting a loan of KHR 1,000,000 each. As the leader, Ly will use the loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her business and set aside some money to buy a motorbike for the family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Chamroeun's Group

texts.en:
A widow in a village of the Thmor Koul district, Chamroeun is a 38-year-old mother of only one daughter. Her daughter is still in school. She earns a living through growing rice on her own four-hectare farmland and planting corn on her own plantation. She has been in this business for five years. With her current business, she manages to earn more than KHR 100,000 per day to make a living but saves only around KHR 40,000 each day.

Chamroeun leads a group of four members. She is a first cycle client with VisionFund. Now requesting a loan with VisionFund, she will use this loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to earn more income to set aside some money to buy another plot of farmland to extend her farmland.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Bidémi

texts.fr: Bidémi est âgé de 29 ans et vit au Bénin. Bidémi est marié à une marchande du nom de Fidèle.  Bidémi a arrêté l'école au niveau primaire et a appris la soudure. Le couple a deux enfants, dont un est scolarisé. En dehors de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à leur charge. Bidémi et sa femme assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Bidémi exerce le métier de soudure depuis huit ans environs dans sa région. Cette activité lui permet ainsi de satisfaire aux besoins de sa famille. Bidémi s'approvisionne dans une ville du Benin. Bidémi désire mieux équiper son atelier de soudure par l’acquisition de gaz et de carbure ; ce qui lui permettra de répondre efficacement aux exigences de sa clientèle. Pour cette raison, Bidémi sollicite pour la troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux crédits reçus ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Bidémi is 29 years old and lives in Bénin. Bidémi is married to a trader named Fidèle. Bidémi stopped school at the primary level and learned to weld. The couple has two children, of whom one goes to school. In addition to their children, the couple has another child under their care. Bidémi and his wife take care of the diverse household responsibilities together. 

To take care of his different responsibilities, Bidémi has been working as a welder for about eight years in his region. This business allows him to satisfy the needs of his family. Bidémi gets his supplies in a town in Bénin. 

Bidémi wants to better equip his welding shop by purchasing gas and carbide, which will allow him to effectively respond to his clientèle's demands. For this reason, Bidémi is requesting a loan from ALIDé for the third time. The two loans that he received were well repaid.

loans.use: to buy gas and carbide.

loans.name: Sophan's Group

texts.en:
Sophan is 37 years old and widowed. She lives with her only daughter in a village in the Thmor Koul district of Cambodia. Her daughter is still in school. To make a living, she has been selling fragrant items such as perfume, detergent, body lotion etc. as the only main source of income for three years. 

Sophan’s group has been with VisionFund for three years. The loan has helped her run her business successfully. Currently, she earns more than KRH 100,000 per day but is able to save around KHR 40,000 each day. Now she is leading her group to apply for another loan with VisionFund of KHR 1,400,000 each. As the leader, she is going to use this loan to buy more fragrant items for her business. With this loan, she hopes to increase her business to earn more income and keep her daughter in school.

loans.use: To buy more fragrant items to sell

loans.name: Loum's Group

texts.en:
Aged 60, Loum is a farmer in a village in the Moung Russey district of Cambodia. She is married with two children, only one of whom is dependent on her. She is a farmer who farms her one-hectare farmland while her husband catches fish and sometimes cricket to sell. She has been in this business for 15 years. With her current business, she earns around US $5.5 per day and saves around US $2.6 each day. 

This is a first loan for Loum’s group with Kiva’s field partner, VisionFund. Her group consists of two members. As the leader, she will use this loan to buy two piglets for her business. This loan will enable her to increase her business and earn more income to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy two piglets for her business

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es:
La señora Esperanza tiene 48 años de edad, es casada. Ella tiene 6 años de dedicarse a la venta de pan de manera ambulante en un canasto, fue su mamá quien le enseño. La señora es una persona muy trabajadora, junto con su esposo luchan a diario para mejorar su calidad de vida.

Ella se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. a prepararle la comida a su esposo, ya que él es jornalero, luego Esperanza realiza los quehaceres del hogar, a las 10:00 a.m. se va a compra el pan ya elaborado, en un lugar que esta a cinco kilómetros de su casa, luego se traslada a su casa para que sus vecinos compren el pan, después sale casa por casa a vender el pan terminando a las 6:00 p.m. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo es para cambiarle la madera podrida y la teja al techo de su casa, debido a que esta en malas condiciones y ya casi inicia el invierno. Con la inversión ya no tendrán problemas en que sus electrodomésticos se dañen, por el ingreso del agua, pues ya se les daño un televisor por las goteras que caen del techo.

Lo que Esperanza desea es tener un techo seguro, que soporte las inclemencias del tiempo en invierno, para vivir en una casa más segura, construir las paredes de ladrillo porque actualmente es de adobe y así pueda durar más tiempo.
texts.en:
Señora Esperanza is 48 years old and married.  She has been working selling bread for the last six years; she sells it from a basket as a street vendor, as her mom taught her.  The Señora is a very hard-working woman, who along with her husband strives daily to improve her quality of life.

She gets up at 5 a.m. to prepare food for her husband, as he is a day-laborer.  After that, Esperanza does her household chores.  At 10 a.m., she goes to purchase already-baked bread from a place five kilometers from her home.  She then transports it to her home where her neighbors purchase bread.  Afterwards, she goes door-to-door selling bread, finishing at 6 p.m.

The loan that she is requesting from Fundación Campo is to replace the rotten wood and the tiling of the roof of her house, as it is in bad condition, and it is almost the start of winter.  With the investment, they will no longer have problems with their appliances getting damaged by water coming through the roof, as they have already had a television damaged by the roof leaking.

What Esperanza wants is to have a sound roof which will cope with the inclement nature of winter weather.  In order to have a more secure home, she wants to build brick walls, which will be able to last longer as currently the walls are made of adobe.

loans.use: to replace the rotten wood and tiling of the roof of her home.

loans.name: Chhunry

texts.en:
Chhunry, 23, is married with two dependent sons who are still too young to attend school. He and his wife live in a village in the Moung Russey and they earn a living through farming their own four-hectare rice field and raising one pig as additional income. He has been in the rice farming business for almost 10 years. 

Chhunry received his first loan with VisionFund one year ago and he successfully repaid the loan. Since 2010, the loan has helped him and his family afford sufficient food to eat. He now earns around US $5 per day to feed his family. Now requesting another loan with VisionFund, he is going to use the loan to buy fertilizer for his farmland and use a portion to buy feed for his pig. He hopes to earn a larger income to improve his standard of living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pig feed

loans.name: Phea

texts.en:
Phea, 27 years old, is married and lives in the Sa Ang district of Cambodia. She has four children who work for others to earn a living. Some of the children are still in school and work during their spare time. For the past 11 years, Phea has been earning a living through her plantation business.

Phea is in her fifth loan cycle with VisionFund. She has successfully repaid her loan, which helped her afford sufficient food to eat and send her children to school. Phea presently earns around US $10 per day from her current business. She is now requesting another loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland and to construct a toilet for her family. She hopes to increase her business and have a decent toilet for better health.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and construct a toilet for the family

loans.name: Salang

texts.en:
Salang, 45, is a villager living in the Sa Ang district. She is a married mother of four children who work in a factory. Salang and her husband have been earning a living working for others and doing construction work. 

This is the fourth loan for Salang with Kiva's field partner, VisionFund. The loans have improved her living conditions. Salang is now requesting another loan to buy construction materials such as cement, bricks, sand, wood, etc. for her house construction. This loan will enable her to have a decent house to live in.

loans.use: To buy construction materials for building a house

loans.name: Mom's Group

texts.en:
Aged 31 years old and living in a rural area of the Prey Chhor district, Mom is married with two children: one son and one daughter, dependent on her and still in school. Rice farming is her main source of income and she has been in this business for many years to make a living. In addition, she raises cows as labor for her rice farming. 

Mom has just been with VisionFund for one year. However, she can make her living a bit better and is able to send her children to school. She now earns less than four U.S. dollars per day from her current business. Now requesting another loan with other two members, Mom as leader will use the loan to buy fertilizer for her dry season rice. She hopes to gain more income to set aside some savings to keep her children in school and make a better living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her dry season rice

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en: Julieta is 58 years old. She lives in Tolors village with her husband, son and daughter-in-law. Julieta breeds cattle and cultivates land. Her family members help her with the agriculture. Julieta has applied for this loan to develop cattle breeding. She plans to purchase four cows and forage. Expansion of the farm will allow Julieta to earn more income and renovate her house, insuring a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Sarom's Group

texts.en:
Sarom is a 58-year-old single woman who lives in a village in the Ponhea Krek district of Cambodia, where farming is a common way to earn a living. She cultivates rice and plants cassava. To earn more income, Sarom sometimes works for others. She has been in the cassava and rice farming business for 2 years and 32 years, respectively. She currently earns almost US $4 per day. 

This is Sarom’s first group loan with Kiva’s field partner, VisionFund. She and her group member are applying for a loan of KHR 1,000,000 each. As the leader, Sarom will use her entire loan to buy fertilizer and to plant cassava. With this loan, she hopes to increase her crop yield.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and to plant cassava

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Seng An's Group

texts.en:
Seng An, 51 years old, lives in a village in the Ponhea Krek district. She is a married mother of two children: one daughter and one son, both dependent on her. For the past 10 years, Seng An has been earning a living by cultivating rice as her family’s main source of income. Her husband earns additional income as a construction worker. Seng An currently manages to earn an average of US $5 per day.

Seng An’s group consists of two members and this is her first group loan with Kiva’s field partner, VisionFund. She is now requesting a loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland and to buy an old motorbike. This loan will enable her to increase her business and her household assets.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland and to buy an old motorbike

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Kruoch's Group

texts.en:
Kruoch, 51, is a windowed mother of six children living in a rural area of the Ponhea Krek district. She still has three children dependent on her working at the family’s business. She is a farmer who has been farming rice and planting cassava to support her living and her big family for 15 years. Sometimes, she works for others for pay to better feed her children. 

Kruoch has been with VisionFund for three years and she successfully paid back the loan with VisionFund. Her group members have been with VisionFund for one year to two years. She earns less than US$2 per day. Leading a group of four members, she will use the loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her business to earn a larger income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Kin's Group

texts.en:
Kin is a 51-year-old mother of three daughters, two of whom are still dependent on her and work as garment factory workers. She has been earning a living through cultivating rice and planting cassava as her main business for 23 years. She now earns less than $4 per day to feed her family. 

This is the second loan for Kin's group. Having been with VisionFund since 2011 and successfully repaying the first loan, Kin is leading her group of two members to apply for another loan with VisionFund. As the leader, she is going to use this loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her business and earn more income for some savings for the future.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Hasan

texts.ru: Хасан трудолюбивый, добрый молодой семьянин. Имеет двоих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством и присматривает за детьми. Более 7 лет он занимается продажей мяса на базаре. Брат помогает в бизнесе. Хасан хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота на бойне с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Hasan is a hardworking and kind young family man.  He has two children.  His wife is involved in household work and looks after the children.  Hasan has been involved in selling meat at a market for over seven years.  His brother helps him with the business.  Hasan wants to obtain a loan to buy livestock at a slaughter house in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Emilio

texts.en:
Emilio started his rice farming business when he was 24 years of age. He learned this type of business from his parents. Now, Emilio is married and is 44 years old. He is still managing a rice farming business. This is his primary source of income to meet his two children's needs and to improve their living situation.

Emilio says that his income from the business is used to pay for his obligations to the private traders who provide for his needs in farming. Emilio wishes to take a loan that has a low interest rate to save some of his profits. He chose ASKI organization to provide this loan. Emilio requests a loan of P25,000 to buy seeds, fuel and fertilizers that he needs for farming. He is hoping that he will earn a higher income from the business as a result of the loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fuel and fertilizers

loans.name: Grisha

texts.en:
Grisha is a 52-year-old farmer from Areg village. He lives with his wife, two sons, daughter-in-law, and two grandchildren. Grisha's older son has left to work abroad, and his younger son helps him with agriculture. 

The current income Grisha earns is barely enough to cover the family's costs, so he has applied for this loan to develop his farm. Grisha plans to purchase cattle and forage and develop cattle breeding, as well as purchase seeds to cultivate the land. This loan will help Grisha to increase his income from agriculture and insure improved living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to pay for cattle, forage, and seeds

loans.name: Sonia's Group

texts.en:
Sonia has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her sweater-making and selling business. With the loan investment, she will buy wool in bulk to make better-quality sweaters and make more sales and income. She is very experienced in her business and has been operating it for the past many years. She is confident that her business will grow further by investing the loan.

Her husband is a laborer by profession. He is illiterate and couldn’t find a suitable job. The income he earns through his profession is not guaranteed because sometimes he doesn’t get any work. This was the reason that Sonia started her business. She is confident her business will succeed after the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy wool and other material for her sweater-making business

loans.name: Pheng's Group

texts.en:
A resident of a village located in the Ponhea Krek district, Pheng is 43 years old and still single. She has been earning a living by cultivating rice and raising pigs for 25 years. For the past 4 years, she has also been selling rice soup and Khmer noodles to earn more income.  With her current businesses, Pheng is able to earn US $10 per day. 

This is the first loan for Pheng's 3-member group with Kiva’s field partner, VisionFund. As the leader, Pheng will use her entire loan to buy a few piglets. She hopes to feed her pigs to be healthy and fat in order to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy a few piglets for her business

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Mun

texts.en:
Originally from a village in the Ponhea Krek district of Cambodia, Mun is 41 years old and married. She is a mother of three dependent children who are still in school. She earns a living through cultivating rice and planting cassava. She has been in this business for 15 years. With her current business, she manages to earn more than US $10 per day but is able to save only around US $2 each day. 

This is the first loan for Mun with Kiva’s field partner, VisionFund. Now requesting the loan, she plans to use the entire loan to buy cassava seedlings and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes, with this loan, to keep farming cassava to make a living and earn income to keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy cassava seedlings and fertilizer

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Voeun's Group

texts.en:
Voeun, 57, is a married mother of five children, living in a village in the Ponhea Krek district. For the past 15 years, she and her husband have been earning a living by farming rice and planting cassava. Voeun earns almost US $5 per day with her current business.

This is the first loan for Voeun's 2-member group with Kiva’s field partner, VisionFund. As the leader, Voeun wants to use her loan to pay for labor to harvest cassava. She hopes that this loan will help to make her life better.

loans.use: To pay for labor to harvest cassava

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Ros' Group

texts.en:
Ros is a 32-year-old single man from a village in the Kang Meas district of Cambodia. He earns a living by cultivating rice once a year and planting cassava twice a year. He has been in this business for twelve years. Ros currently earns KHR 22,600 per day from his business.

This is the first loan for Ros's 2-member group with VisionFund. He will use the loan to buy fertilizer for his farmland. He hopes to increase his crop yield and make a better life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for his farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas District

loans.name: Duo Lindo Tecpan Group

texts.es:
Dúo Lindo Tecpan
Doña Gregoria y doña Albina Adelaida, nos cuentan que doña gregoria se dedica a la compra y venta de laurel, gracias a dios poco a poco fue conocida con sus productos y ahora ya la conocen  en la comunidad y también hace entregas de sus productos en la capital, y doña Albina ella se dedica a la fabricación de cal, nos cuenta que ella compra la materia prima por camionadas y ella hace toda la preparación para después sacar al mercado sus productos, ahora ellas quieren implementar mas sus negocios  y ampliar mas su capital para poder generar más ganancias, solicita este crédito para la compra de mercaderia para elavorar cal. para seguir con su negocio y esperan que kiva las pueda ayudar como la mano amiga que siempre ha sido para muchas familias.
texts.en:
Dúo Lindo Tecpan

Gregoria and Albina Adelaida tell us that Gregoria works buying and selling laurel. Thanks to God she became known little by little for her products. Now she is already known in her community, and she also delivers her products to the capital. Albina works making lime. She tells us that she buys raw materials by truckloads. She prepares everything so she can then take her products to the market. 

Now they want to implement their businesses more, and increase their capital in order to gain more profits. She is requesting this loan to purchase lime-making merchandise so their business can continue. They hope Kiva can offer them a helping hand, like it has already done for so many other families.

loans.use: to purchase lime-making merchandise.

loans.name: Ganijon

texts.ru: Ганиджон женат и на воспитании имеет двух сыновей. Он очень трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. С 1998 года он занимается купле- продажей мужской и детской одежды. А также детской обуви. Он сам является владельцем бизнеса и в бизнесе помогают жена и старший сын. Арендует место на базаре. Ганиджон запрашивает займ для предоплаты арендуемое место бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу поддержку и помощь.
texts.en: Ganijon is married and raising two sons.  He is a very hardworking and goal-oriented person.  He has been involved in buying and selling men's and women's clothing and also children's shoes since 1998.  Ganijon is the owner of this business, and his wife and oldest son help him with the business.  He leases a space at a market.  Ganijon is requesting this loan prepay for his leased place of business.  He relies on your support and help.

loans.use: to prepay for his leased space

loans.name: Linda Vista Group

texts.es:
Avelina tiene 42 años de edad y es originaria de una localidad donde su principal actividad económica es la producción de Noche Buena y las artesanías de ocoshal ya que muy cerca de la localidad se encuentra el santuario de la mariposa monarca y la zona arqueológica de Zirahuato. Ella esta casada con el señor Leopoldo ellos tienen seis hijos Juan Iván Ivon de 16 años, Maley de 14 años de edad,  Aylin de 13 años,  Itzel de tres años y una pequeña de 20 días de nacida. La producción de la Nochebuena actualmente genera 680 empleos fijos y 320 temporales y comenta que la mayoría de los jornaleros que cultivan esa planta está en manos de mujeres. Avelina es parte de esas mujeres que sacan adelante a su familia y le echan ganas para darles una mejor calidad de vida pese a que tiene poco que se alivio de su pequeño hijo ella está trabajando para empezar la nueva temporada de flor y es por eso que está pidiendo el crédito a la financiera por que quiere comprar tierra, masetas, abonos, plástico para el vivero ya que el plástico que tiene esta muy desgastado por las inclemencias del clima. Dice que cuando no es temporada de flor de noche buena ella vende fruta de temporada y su esposo le ayuda a rentar huertas de aguacate y durazno y luego cortan la fruta y la sacan a vender a la central de abastos de la capital del país. Dice que con el negocio de la flor de noche buena lleva aproximadamente más de 25 años, la meta que tiene doña Avelina es hacer otro vivero un poco más amplio para así producir más flor de noche buena. Una de sus metas es poder comprar una camioneta para poder salir a vender a la central de abastos en Zitacuaro sus productos como nopales, aguacates y duraznos ya que tiene huertas y quiere aprovechar para hacerse de clientes también aquí en la región.
Las demás personas que conforman el grupo son: Alejandro, Epifania, Mauricio, Catalina e Ivan. Todos ellos están muy agradecidos por el préstamo que recibieron.
texts.en:
Avelina is 42, and from a place where the main economic activity is growing poinsettias and crafting pine needle baskets. This is because it is very close to the Monarch Butterfly Sanctuary and the archeological site of Zirahuato. 

She is married to Leopoldo and they have six children: Juan Iván Ivon, 16;  Maley, 14; Aylin, 13; Itzel, 3, and a 20-day-old little girl. 

The poinsettia production currently generates 680 permanent jobs and 320 temporary, and she says that the majority of day laborers that cultivate that plant are employed by women. Avelina is one of those women who are helping their families succeed, and wish to provide them a better quality of life, in spite of the fact that she has had little since the birth of he small son.  

She is working to start the new flower season, and that is why she is asking for the loan from the financial institution because she wants to buy soil, pots, fertilizers, and plastic sheeting for the nursery; the plastic sheeting she has is very worn due to inclement weather.

She says that when it isn't poinsettia season, she sells seasonal fruit, and her husband helps her rent avocado and peach orchards, and then to harvest the fruit and take it to sell at the wholesale food market in the country's capital. She says that she has been in the poinsettia business for more than 25 years. Avelina's goal is to develop another nursery that is a bit more spacious, in order to grow more poinsettias.

One of her goals is to be able to buy a truck so that she can go to sell at the wholesale food market in Zitacuaro. This would involve products such as nopales, avocados, and peaches, as she has orchards and wants to make the most of it, in order to also get customers here in the region.  

The other group members are Alejandro, Epifania, Mauricio, Catalina and Ivan. All are very thankful for the loan they have received.

loans.use: To grow poinsettia plants.

loans.name: Simma Group

texts.fr:
Mme Dadissa est la représentante du groupe SIMMA. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants. Le plus âgé a 20ans et le moins âgé a 13ans. Tous les 2 vont à l’école et elle a 2 personnes à sa charge.

Elle vend des chaussures et habits de puis 12ans. Mme s’approvisionne au marché de secteur 10 en ville. Ses clients sont les femmes.

Mme veut s’acheter 30paires de chaussures, 15  complets de pagnes et des habits pour enfants.

Elle veut économiser ses bénéfices pour agrandir son commerce. Mme ambitionne ouvrir une boutique de pagnes et chaussures.
texts.en:
Madam Dadissa is the representative of the Simma group. She is married and mother to two children. The oldest is 20 years old and the youngest is 13 years old. Both go to school and she has two dependents.

She has been selling shoes and clothing for 12 years. Madam Dadissa gets her supplies at the market of sector 10 in town. Her clients are women.

Madam Dadissa wants to buy 30 pairs of shoes, 15 pagnes [colorful West-African fabric] outfits and children's clothing. She wants to save her profits to expand her business. Madam Dadissa's ambition is to open a boutique selling pagnes and shoes.

loans.use: to buy 30 pairs of shoes, 15 pagnes [colorful West-African fabric] outfits and children's clothing.

loans.name: Kimlun's Group

texts.en:
Kimlun, 46 years old, is married and has seven children, only four of whom are still dependent on her (two sons and two daughters) and work in a factory and on the family’s farm. For the past 14 years, Kimlun has been farming rice once a year and selling palm sugar once a year. To better support the family, her husband is sometimes a motor-taxi driver. With her current sources of income, Kimlun earns more than US $5 per day to feed her family. 

Kimlun has just been with VisionFund for one year and can build on some savings for the future. She is now leading her 4-member group in applying for a loan of KHR 1,000,000 each. Kimlun will use the loan to buy a cow for her farming business. With this loan, she hopes to increase farming production capacity and earn more income to make a better living and to keep building some savings.

loans.use: To buy a cow for her farming business

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Rin's Group

texts.en:
Rin, 49 years old, is originally from a village in the Ponhea Krek district where crop farming is a common way to earn a living. She is a married mother of one dependent son who also works in the family business. To feed the family, Rin and her husband have been farming rice and planting cassava for five years. With her current source of income, Rin earns more than US $5 per day and is able to save around US $3 each day.

This is the third loan for Rin's group with VisionFund. She completely repaid her loans with VisionFund and, since 2010, they have helped improve her life. Rin and her group member, Rath, are applying for another loan with VisionFund. As the leader, Rin will use her entire loan to buy fertilizer for her cassava farmland and to pay for labor to plant the cassava. She hopes to increase her crop yield to make her quality of life better.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and to pay for labor to plant cassava

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Unusali

texts.ru: Юнусали трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и ответственный отец четверых детей. Более 11 лет он занимается выращиванием и купле- продажей скота. Он пастух и выгуливает скот своего села. Юнусали хочет улучшить свое благосостояние семьи и для этого старается расширить свой бизнес. С этой целью запрашивает займ для покупки1 голов крупного и 5 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Unusali is a hardworking and conscientious person.  He is married and a responsible father of four children.  He has been involved in fattening up and buying and selling livestock for over 11 years.  He is a shepherd and takes out livestock from his village.  Unusali wants to improve his family's welfare and tries to expand his business for this purpose.  This is why he is requesting this loan to buy one head of cattle and five heads of small livestock.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle and small livestock

loans.name: Indira

texts.ru: Индира трудолюбивая и честная женщина. Она замужем и любящая мать двоих детей. Более 5 лет она занимается купле- продажей разных вещей, в основном на заказ, такие как парфюмерия детская одежда женские украшения. Также продает фартуки, домашние тапочки, скатерти, и т.д. Начала свой бизнес с продажи парфюмерии. Она не имеет торговую точку, она ходит по организациям и по домам предлагает свой товар и продает их. Её соседи и знакомые также покупают у неё. Индира запрашивает займ для покупки товара с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Indira is a hardworking and honest woman.  She is married and a loving mother of two children.  She has been involved in buying and selling various things, primarily to-order, such as perfumes, children's clothing and women's jewelry, for over five years.  She also sells aprons, house shoes, tablecloths, etc.  Indira started her business with selling perfumes.  She does not have a retail outlet and goes to businesses and houses to sell her merchandise.  Her neighbors and friends also buy from her.  Indira is requesting this loan to buy merchandise in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in order to expand her business

loans.name: Sabohatjon

texts.ru: Сабохатджон замужем и любящая мать пятерых детей. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина. Более 7 лет она занимается переработкой и продажей сухофруктов. Она торгует на местном рынке. В бизнесе помогают дети. Муж в трудовой миграции. Данный бизнес приносит ей хорошую прибыль. Накопленную прибыль потратила на свадьбу дочери, которую выдала замуж . Сабохатджон запрашивает займ в размере 4000 Сомони для покупки сухофруктов с целью расширения бизнеса. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Sabohatdjon is married and is a loving mother of five children. She is a very hardworking woman. She has been processing and selling dry fruits for more than seven years. She trades on the local market. Her children are helping in this business. Her husband is in a labor migration. This business brings her a good profit. Accumulated profit was spent on the wedding of her daughter who got married. Sabohatdjon is requesting a loan of 4,000 somoni to purchase dry fruits in order to expand her business. She looks forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy dry fruits.

loans.name: Mao's Group

texts.en:
Mao, 38 years old, lives in the Tbaung Khmum district of Cambodia. She is married and has three children, two of them still dependent and in school. For the past 18 years, Mao and her husband have earned a living by farming rice and operating a plantation.

Mao is the leader of this 2-member female group. She has been with VisionFund for three years while her group member, Neat, has just joined VisionFund. Since 2009, Mao's past loans have helped her family extend their farmland. She now earns less than US $5 per day and saves only around US $1 each day for future needs. Mao is now requesting another loan with VisionFund, and she will use her entire portion (KHR 1,400,000) of the loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her business and earn a larger income to keep her children in school until graduation.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Munavvarjon

texts.ru: Мунавварджон замужем и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Муж является агрономом. Более 15 лет она занимается переработкой сухофруктов. Он сушит абрикос и изготавливает миндаль и продает за хорошую цену. Имеет абрикосовый сад возле своего дома. Мунавварджон запрашивает займ для покупки сухофруктов с целью расширения бизнеса. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Munavvarjon is married and raising four children.  Her husband is an agronomist.  Munavvarjon has been involved in processing dried fruits for over 15 years.  She dries apricots and prepares almonds, and sells them at a good price.  She has an apricot orchard near her house.  Munavvarjon is requesting this loan to buy dried fruits in order to expand her business.  She relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy dried fruits

loans.name: Rahima

texts.ru: Рахима проживает в Гиссарском районе. Она замужем. Ей 60 лет. У нее семеро детей. Трое ее сыновей находятся на заработках заграницей, а муж пенсионер. Сама она занимается скотоводством. В этой области она десять лет. Кредит берет для закупа телят, коз и овец.
texts.en: Rahima lives in the Gissar region. She is married. She is 60 years old and has seven children. Three of her sons are now working abroad and her husband is retired. She does animal husbandry. She has been in this business for nine years. She is taking out the loan to buy calves, goats and sheep.

loans.use: to buy calves, goats and sheep.

loans.name: Kurbon

texts.ru: Курбон житель района Дангара. Ему 60 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Его дети живут отдельно. Сам Курбон занимается животноводством. Он закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Kurbon lives in the region of Dangara. He is 60 years old. He is married and has five children. His children live separately. Kurbon does animal husbandry. He buys the cattle for future resale. He is taking out the loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Sokhany

texts.en:
Sokhany, 49 years old, is married and lives in a rural area located in the Ponhea Krek district. She has two dependent sons; one is still in school and the other is a motor mechanic in the village. Sokhany earns a living by farming rice and grinding rice crops for a fee and to sell. She earns additional income by raising pigs in her back yard. Sokhany has been in the farming and pig raising businesses for 25 and 10 years, respectively. With her current sources of income, she manages to earn just under US $10 per day.

This is Sokhany's first loan with Kiva's field partner, VisionFund. She will use the loan to buy additional pigs, pig feed and more paddy rice to grind for sale. She hopes this loan will help her increase her business, earn a larger income for the family and keep her son in school.
