loans.use: To buy additional pigs and paddy rice to grind for sale

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Lina's Group

texts.en:
Lina, 23, is married and lives in a village in the Ponhea Krek district of Cambodia. She has one son dependent on her. Lina and her husband have been farming rice and planting cassava as the primary family business for 5 years. 

This is the fourth loan for Lina's group with Kiva's field partner, VisionFund. Lina successfully repaid her loan with VisionFund, which helped her make a better living and afford sufficient food. Lina currently earns KHR 27,400 per day from her business. She is now leading her group in applying for another loan of KHR 1,000,000 each with VisionFund. As the leader, Lina will use her entire portion of the loan to lease a small plot of farmland for cassava planting. She hopes to gain more income from her business to better feed her family and to save for the future.

loans.use: To lease a small plot of farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Bopha's Group

texts.en:
Bopha is 23 years old, married, and has one son. She earns a living through rice farming and duck raising, which she has been doing for four years. 

Bopha joined VisionFund one year ago and the first loan from VisionFund helped her increase her income and raise more ducks. She earns more than $15 per day from her current business. 

Bopha successfully repaid the loan with VisionFund and is requesting a loan for 1,000,000 KHR with her group member who has been with VisionFund for two years. Since she plans to raise pigs as additional business, Bopha will use the loan to buy pigs. With this loan, she hopes to earn more profit to set aside for the future and send her child to school.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Roberto Arturo

texts.es:
Roberto gran parte de su vida se ha dedicado a la producción agropecuaria, y con esta actividad genera los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, donde vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Roberto tiene un cultivo de legumbres el cual vende a muy buen precio a sus clientes. Debido al invierno de hace pocos meses, que se prolongó más de lo esperado, Roberto ha visto como sus cultivos no han crecido lo suficiente. Con el ánimo de cambiar esta situación, Roberto busca comprar abonos y semillas para su cultivo. Debido a que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para la compra de estos productos, Roberto busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de abonos y semillas para su cultivo.

Roberto espera que su cultivo pueda seguir sacando productos de buena calidad para poderlos vender a un buen precio. Sueña con tener un gran cultivo donde pueda generar muchos empleos, además, con el que le pueda brindar a sus hijos una estabilidad económica. Roberto anhela poder mejorarles la calidad de vida a su esposa y sus 2 hijos, además de ofrecerle mejores oportunidades para progresar económicamente.
texts.en:
Roberto, for most of his life, has made a living in agricultural production. Through this activity, he has generated enough income to cover expenses for his home, where he lives with his wife and two children. Roberto has a vegetable farm, and sells his produce to his customers at a very good price.

Due to the effects of this past winter, which lasted longer than expected, Roberto has watched his crops fail to grow sufficiently. In hopes of changing this situation, Roberto is looking to buy fertilizers and seeds for his farm. Since he does not have sufficient capital to purchase these products, Roberto is requesting a loan that will give him the opportunity to purchase fertilizers and seeds for his farm.

Roberto hopes that his farm can continue yielding high quality products so that he can sell them at a good price. He dreams of having a large farm where he can generate many jobs, as well as provide financial stability for his children. Roberto longs to be able to improve the quality of life for his wife and two children, while also providing greater opportunities for financial progress.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for his farming operation.

loans.name: Twungubumwe I Group

texts.fr:
Jeanine fait partie du groupe TwungubumweI,  elle habite à Gitega, elle a 31 ans et est mariée à Emmanuel, un cultivateur. Ensemble ils ont 5 enfants dont, 2 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de vin de banane depuis 15 ans.

Elle est à son huitième  crédit à  Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital, en achetant  une grande quantité de bananes pour la préparation de beaucoup de litres de vin de banane à vendre, pour gagner plus.

Les bénéfices que lui apportent son commerce, la permettront d’acheter une parcelle pour sa famille
texts.en:
Jeanine is a member of the Twungubumwe I group.  She lives in Gitega.  She is 31 years old, married to a farmer named Emmanuel.  Jeanine and Emmanuel have 5 children, two of whom are students.

Jeanine has been selling banana wine for 15 years.

This is her eighth loan with Turame.  With this loan from KIVA, she will buy large quantities of bananas to prepare many liters of banana wine for resale.  This will allow her to earn more money and increase her capital.

With the profits from her retail activity, she will be able to buy a plot of land for her family.

loans.use: to buy large quantities of bananas to prepare many liters of banana wine for resale, and therefore earn more money and increase her capital.

loans.name: Allaba

texts.fr:
Allaba est un homme âgé de 29 ans. Il est marié å une coiffeuse. Il a un enfant d’un an.
Allaba est propriétaire d’un lavage à sec depuis 2008. Il lave des habits pour tous clients dans son lavage à sec. Il travaille seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pouvoir pas satisfaire toutes les demandes à temps.
Allaba a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter une machine à laver. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Allaba voudrait agrandir son activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit d’assurer les besoins de sa famille pour qu’ils vivent heureux.
texts.en:
Allaba is a 29-year-old man.  He his married to a hair dresser, and has a one-year-old child.

Allaba has owned a dry cleaning business since 2008.  He cleans clothes for all customers in his dry cleaning shop.  He works alone.  At the moment, his main challenge is to satisfy all orders on time.

Allaba has requested a first loan from WAGES in order to buy a washing machine.  He wants to reinvest in his activity.

In the coming years, he would like to expand his business.  He says that with the profits, he is planning to provide for his family, so that they can live a happy life.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine.

loans.name: Em's Group

texts.en:
Em, 37, is a married mother of three dependent children: one daughter and two sons, who are still in school. She is a farmer who has been farming her own land for 10 years. To better support her family, she and her husband buy and sell sugar and clams. 

Em has been with VisionFund for two years while her group member just joined VisionFund this loan cycle. Since business has been good, Em has successfully repaid her loan and now earns more than US $10 per day. She is now leading her 2-member group in applying for a loan with VisionFund. As the leader, Em will use her entire portion of the loan to buy palm sugar for sale. This loan will enable her to keep her business running. Em hopes to increase the family's income to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy sugar for sale

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Touch's Group

texts.en:
Touch, aged 32, is married and has four children dependent on her. They are still in school but also work for others. Touch lives in a village in the Ponhea Krek district of Cambodia. She earns a living by working for pay while her husband is a local policeman. 

Touch has been with VisionFund for two years and has successfully repaid her loan. Her group member has just joined VisionFund this loan cycle. Since 2010, Touch's loan has helped her improve her living conditions. She now earns around US $9 per day. Touch is now requesting a loan with VisionFund to buy rice for family consumption. This loan will enable her to have sufficient nutrients and good health so she may work for others to make a better daily living.

loans.use: To buy rice for family consumption

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Kanya's Group

texts.en:
A resident living in the Thmor Koul district of Cambodia, Kanya is 35 years old and a mother of two children: one son and one daughter. Both of her children are still in primary school. To feed her family, she has been farming her 2.5 hectares of rice paddy for five years. This is her main source of income. Additionally, she sometimes works for others for a fee to earn more income to better feed her family.

Kanya joined VisionFund in 2009 and completely repaid the loans. She successfully used the loans from VisionFund to improve her standard of living. Now she can earn up to 15 USD per day and save around 3 USD each day. She is now leading her group of four members to apply for a bigger loan of 1,400,000 KHR for herself and 1,000,000 KHR for each of the other three group members. As the leader, she plans to use this entire loan to buy seed and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her crop yield so as to earn a larger profit. Her goals are to set aside some money to build a new house and to keep her children in school until graduation.

loans.use: To buy seed and fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Duo Luz Y Vida Group

texts.es: Duo Luz y vida, este duo esta formado por Gloria,DE 30 años de edad,ella se dedica a la elavoracion de gúipiles,desde hace 3 años,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para elavoracion de tejidos tipicos,nos cuenta que esta muy contenta porque la ayudara a superarse mas,al igual que la siquiente socia esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos tipicos.
texts.en:
Duo Luz y Vida includes Gloria, who is 30 years old and has made a living making guipiles [traditional blouses] for the past three years. She is requesting a loan to purchase raw materials for making traditional weavings. She tells us that she is very happy, because this will help her to get ahead. 

Similarly, the other member is also requesting this loan to buy raw material for making traditional weavings.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for making traditional weavings.

loans.name: Martin Yvan

texts.es:
Martin tiene 46 años, vive junto a su hijo de 14 años de edad en la ciudad de Ica, El departamento de Ica es el único de la costa sur formado por planicies, también llamadas llanuras costeñas, puesto que la Cordillera de los Andes se levanta muy al interior. En Ica se encuentran extensos desiertos, como las Pampas de Lancha, las Pampas de Villacurí, en donde el calor es muy intenso, ofrece playas y aguas termales, variada fauna marina, museos de sitio y excelentes servicios de hoteles, en sus tiempos libres a Martin le gusta jugar Futbol, asimismo le gusta comer uno de sus platos favoritos que es el “Lomo Saltado”; el estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar “Ingeniería Civil”.

Con mucho esfuerzo inicio su negocio de Decoración de todo tipo de eventos y fiestas, semanalmente trabaja alrededor de 30 horas, ya que depende del tipo de evento en el que esté trabajando, es muy ingenioso y creativo y por ello el cree que le va bien en su negocio, además de ser muy responsable y cumplido con sus clientes y por ello lo recomiendan.

Martin está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado el podrá pintar los fierros que utiliza en las decoraciones y darle mantenimiento a los implementos que utiliza en las decoraciones, así el podrá ofrecer un mejor servicio y seguir trabajando para poder cumplir sus gran sueño:” Tener una camioneta para transportar sus herramientas y seguir dándole educación a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Martin is 46 years old and lives with his 14-year-old son in the town of Ica. The department of Ica is the only one on the south coast that is comprised of plains, also called coastal plains, since the Andes mountains arise much farther inland. In Ica there are vast deserts, such as the Pampas de Lancha and the Pampas de Villacurí, where the heat is very intense. These places offer beaches and termal waters, a varied sea fauna, onsite museums and excellent hotel services. During his free time, Martin enjoys playing soccer. He also likes to have one of his favorite dishes, "lomo saltado" (stir-fried steak and potatoes). He studied up to the 5th grade of middle school, but he would have very much liked to have studied civil engineering.
With a lot of hard work, he started his business providing decorations for all kinds of parties and events. He works about 30 hours a week, because that depends on what type of event he's working on. He's very inventive and creative and he believes that is the reason his business is doing well. Besides, he's very responsible and reliable towards his customers and that's why they recommend him.
Martin is very thankful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their support, he will be able to paint the iron rods he uses in his decorations and to do maintenance on the decoration supplies he uses. That way he'll be able to provide a better service and keep on working to achieve his biggest dreams: to own a van in order to transport his tools, and to continue providing his son with an education.

loans.use: to paint and do maintenance on iron rods.

loans.name: Jeferson De Jesus

texts.es:
Jeferson es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo sus ganas de trabajar y de salir adelante le ha permitido superar las dificultades y seguir progresando en su vida. Jeferson trabaja atendiendo un bar en las noches, pero este trabajo no le genera ingresos suficientes para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar. Es por esto que en una parte de su casa adecuó una venta de legumbres para poder combinar las dos actividades y poder generar así el ingreso suficiente para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Jeferson siempre ha querido ofrecerle a su madre una buena calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades para progresar, es por esto que ella es su mayor motivación a la hora de esforzarse para trabajar en dos partes diferentes. Jeferson aún tiene su venta de legumbres en una parte de su casa y quiere adecuarlo de manera que pueda dividir su negocio de su casa, para poder hacerlo más cómodo, además de que tiene muy bajo el inventario de legumbres dado el poco capital que tiene, es por esto que ahora busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a realizar reformas locativas a su negocio para dividir su casa del negocio y a la compra de legumbres y verduras para surtir mejor su negocio y poder ser más atractivo para sus clientes y aumentar sus ventas.

Jeferson espera que de esta manera su ingresos aumenten y pueda brindarse una mejor calidad de vida, además espera que su madre pueda gozar de estos beneficios y lograr aumentar su nivel de calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jeferson has had to overcome many adversities in his life. Nevertheless, his drive to work and get ahead in life has allowed him to get through these difficulties and continue progressing in his life. 

Jeferson works as a bartender at night, but that job does not pay well enough to cover the household expenses. Because of this, one part of the house has been adapted to sell beans and vegetables, and that way he can put the two activities together and be able to generate enough income to support the household. Jeferson has always wanted to provide his mother with a good quality of life and better opportunities to progress. She is his main motivation when it comes time to push himself to work two different jobs. 

Jeferson has his bean and vegetable sales in one part of the house, but he would like to change it so that he can separate the business from the house, making it more comfortable. In addition, his inventory is very low because of the small amount of capital he has. This is why he is requesting the loan. It which would allow him to renovate the space to divide the house from the business as well as make it possible to buy more beans and vegetables to better stock the store. This would make the business more attractive to customers and increase sales. 

Jeferson hopes that these changes will increase his earnings and make a better quality of life possible. He hopes that his mother will enjoy these benefits and arrive at a better quality of life.

loans.use: Make renovations on his house to separate the store from the home, and to buy vegetables and beans to stock the store.

loans.name: Sreynith's Group

texts.en:
Sreynith, a young 26-year-old mother, lives in a small village in the Thmor Koul district, Battambang province, of Cambodia. She has 2 dependent children who are too young for schooling. For the past 3 years, Sreynith has been working for pay and catching crickets to sell in order to feed her family.

This is the fourth loan for Sreynith's group with VisionFund. She has successfully repaid her loan, which helped her have sufficient food. Sreynith currently earns US $5 per day from her business. She is now leading a 2-member group in applying for a loan of KHR 200,000 each. She will use her entire portion of the loan to buy equipment for catching more crickets for sale. Sreynith hopes to earn more income and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy equipment for catching more crickets for sale

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en: Gayane is 56 years old. She lives with her husband and son, who are both builders. Gayane runs a little shop, where she trades with food. Gayane would like to expand her shop, for which she needs financial means. With the help of this loan, she plans to purchase food for the shop. Gayane hopes she will increase her working capital and invest in future development of the business.

loans.use: to buy food to sell

loans.name: Vahan

texts.en: Vahan is 25 years old. He lives with his wife and parents. Vahan breeds cattle, cultivates land and keeps a greenhouse. His farm currently includes 13 cows and 7 calves. Vahan has applied for a loan to develop pig breeding. With the loan's help, he plans to purchase pigs and forage. Vahan expects to earn more income from the sale of meat, which will allow him to insure a better life for his family.

loans.use: to pay for pigs and forage

loans.name: Kaim's Group

texts.en:
Kaim is aged 54 and a mother of four children, three of whom depend on her. Living in the Thmor Koul district where farming is common for a living, Kaim has been as a farmer for 10 years to make a living, and sometimes, she also works for others for pay as additional income to better feed the family. She earns about US$5 per day, but is able to save less than US$3 each day.

Kaim group's consists of three female members. This is her first loan with Kiva's field partner VisionFund, while the other two members have been with VisionFund from seven to eight years. She leads this group to apply for a loan with VisionFund. As the leader, she will use the entire loan to renovate her old house for better living conditions. This loan will enable her to have a decent house for her family, especially for her children to live like others in the village.

loans.use: To renovate her old house.

loans.name: José  Osmin

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 35 años de edad, es casado con cinco hijos. Él toda su vida se ha dedicado a realizar trabajos agrícolas, fue su papá quien le enseño desde muy pequeño.

Don José solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar una vaca. Así él podrá tener un patrimonio para su familia y obtendrá leche, cuajada para la alimentación de él y de su familia. Con la compra de la vaca, se ahorrara la compra de productos lácteos y le servirá para cambiarle el techo a su casa y realizar otras mejoras, también desea ayudarle a sus hijos con el estudio, brindarles una buena alimentación, él desea tener una casa de bloque y continuar trabajando con la Fundación.
texts.en:
Jose is 35 years old, and is married with five children.  He has spent his whole life in agricultural jobs, as his father taught him when he was very little.  

Don Jose is requesting a loan from Fundacion Campo in order to buy a cow.  He will thus be able to build capital for his family and he will have milk and curd to feed him and his family.  With the purchase of the cow, he will save on the purchase of milk products and he will use his savings to change the roof on his house and to complete other improvements.  

He also wants to help his children to study, providing them with good nutrition.  He wants to have a house made of concrete block and will continue working with the foundation.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Olivia Margarita

texts.es:
Olivia se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy trabajadora y siempre querer brindarle una buena calidad de vida a su familia. Olivia se encuentra casada y es madre de 3 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una educación de calidad. Debido a que los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para sostener los gastos de su hogar, Olivia decidió montar una tienda en la cual ofrece a sus clientes todos los productos de la canasta familiar. La tienda ya lleva operando hace un buen tiempo y poco a poco sus ventas se han incrementado considerablemente. Olivia tuvo la gran idea de ofrecer el servicio de entregas a domicilio, y gracias a esto su tienda se consolidó en su región. Actualmente su servicio a domicilio genera gran parte de los ingresos de su tienda, y a menudo debe retrazar sus entregas debido a la gran cantidad de domicilios que le piden. Con el ánimo de agilizar las entregas de sus domicilios y poder entregar a más personas este servicio, Olivia aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una motocicleta que le permita entregar el servicio a domicilio en menos tiempo y pueda atender más entregas.

Olivia espera que de esta manera su negocio siga creciendo y siga siendo reconocido en su región, y así pueda seguir aumentando sus ventas. Olivia sueña con que sus 3 hijos tengan una gran calidad de vida y puedan acceder a una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en:
Olivia is very hardworking and continually wishes to provide a better quality of life to her family. Olivia is married with three children. She has always wanted to give her children a high quality education. Since her husband’s income is not enough to cover the household expenses, Olivia decided to set up a store, providing customers with all of the basic household goods. The store has been in operation for a long time, and little by little, it has seen a considerable increase in sales. 

Olivia had the excellent idea to offer home delivery. Thanks to that, her store has grown stronger in her region. Right now, deliveries make up a large portion of the store’s income, and sometimes the deliveries are delayed due to the large number of requests. Olivia wishes to take out a loan to be able to buy a motorcycle. This would allow her to make more deliveries in less time and serve more people. Olivia hopes that with a motorcycle, her store will continue to grow and continue to be recognized in her region, and she will be able to continue increasing sales. Olivia’s dream is to give her three children a good quality of life and a good quality education.

loans.use: purchase a motorcycle which would allow her to make more deliveries in less time.

loans.name: Paraje Centro 2 Group

texts.es:
La señora Rosario es soltera, tiene 31 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica a la crianza de animales, inicio este negocio criando aves domésticos, pollos y hasta el momento lleva 6 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de toro y cerdos, lo cual cuando fueran grandes poder venderlos y mejorar sus ganancia, espera en el futuro contar con una granja. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales y al comercio.
texts.en:
Rosario is 31 years old and single.  She didn't have the chance to study. She makes her living taking care of animals.  She started this business raising domestic birds (chickens) and she now has six years of experience.  

She is requesting a loan to buy a bull and pigs, which when they are grown she will sell to improve her earnings.  She hopes in the future to have a farm.  

The other members of the group also raise animals and are in sales.

loans.use: to buy a bull and pigs.

loans.name: Jamshed

texts.ru: Чамшед житель района Дангара. Он женат. Ему 46 лет. У него трое детей. Он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности занимается десять лет. Кредит берет для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Jamshed is a resident of the Dangara region. He is 46 yeras old, married and has three children. He makes a living by breeding large horned cattle. He has been in this business for ten years. He is taking out the loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Walter Miguel

texts.es:
Walter vive junto a su esposa y a su pequeña de 2 años de edad en la ciudad de Camana, la cual es famosa por sus exquisitos camarones, sus machas y el encanto de sus pobladores que siempre ofrecen sus tradicionales bollos, alfajores y oquendos; Es el primer productor en el mundo de arroz por hectárea, por grandes cantidades, entre tanta producción se encuentra el arroz Tacuarí, que viene a ser el mejor y más rico arroz. -Además de producir el mejor arroz, también tiene el más rico frejol; sus playas son las más extensas y más limpias del Sur del país. Los científicos dicen que son las playas más hermosas del sur y que tendría un gran futuro a nivel nacional, en su tiempo libre a Walter le gusta escuchar música, de preferencia música clásica ya que es muy tranquilizante; asimismo como buen peruano le gusta mucho la comida típica por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “Lomo Saltado”.

Con mucho esfuerzo y sobre todo el apoyo de su mano derecha que es su esposa Martin pudo iniciar su negocio de decoración, alquiler de equipos de sonido y también preparación de comida para los eventos, es muy trabajador pero sobre todo porque su esposa es quien lo anima a seguir a pesar de los contratiempos que pudiera haber y quien le dio la idea de trabajar en esta clase de negocio,  puede trabajar hasta 12 horas al día, dependiendo del tipo de evento en el que trabajen, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque es honrado y amable con los clientes.

Walter agradece a los prestatarios Kiva la ayuda brindada ya que gracias a ello el podrá comprar platos, cubiertos, manteles y servilletas para su negocio, con ello el podrá mejorar su servicio y aumentar sus ingresos, así seguirá trabajando y luchando para cumplir su mas gran sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hija y Crecer en su negocio”.
texts.en:
Walter lives with his wife and his 2-year-old little girl in the town of Camana. This town is known for its exquisite shrimps, its clams and the charm of its residents, who always offer their traditional rolls, alfajores and oquendos. It is the world's number one producer of rice by hectare and in large quantities. Among such great production is the Tacuarí rice, which is the best and most tasty kind of rice. Apart from the best rice, it also has the most tasty beans, and its beaches are the vastest and clearest of the southern area of the country. Experts say that they are the most beautiful beaches in the south, with a lot of potential nationwide. During his free time, Walter enjoys listening to music, especially classical music, because it is very soothing. Besides, being a good Peruvian, he very much likes the typical food, and one of his favorite dishes is the delicious "lomo saltado" (stir-fried steak and potatoes).
With a lot of hard work and most of all with support from his wife, who's his right-hand person, he was able to start his business providing decorations, rental sound equipment and also catering for events. He's very hardworking, but it is mostly his wife who encourages him to keep going in spite of the obstacles he may face. She was also the one who gave him the idea to be in this line of work. He may work up to 12 hours a day, depending on what type of event they're working on. He believes that his business is doing well because he's very responsible and, above all, because he's honest and kind to his customers.
Walter gives thanks to Kiva lenders for their help, because thanks to that he will purchase plates, cutlery, tablecloths and napkins for his business, so that he can improve his services and increase his profits. That way he can keep on working and striving to achieve his biggest dream: to provide his daughter with a good education and to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase plates, cutlery, tablecloths, etc.

loans.name: Arnoldo De Jesus

texts.es:
Arnoldo es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer ofrecerle a su familia una buena calidad de vida. Arnoldo se encuentra casado y es padre de 2 hijos de 15 años y 10 meses de edad, quienes son la motivación para esforzarse en su trabajo diariamente. Hace aproximadamente 12 años un amigo le enseñó a preparar jugos de caña de azúcar y montó un negocio en la calle de venta de vasos de jugo de caña. Gracias a esta actividad, Arnoldo genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Por la buena calidad de sus productos, y el buen servicio que ofrece, Arnoldo tiene una gran cantidad de clientes, hasta el punto en que en la actualidad no puede satisfacer toda la demanda de su producto. Con el ánimo de poder satisfacer a todos sus clientes, Arnoldo busca un préstamo que le permita acceder a la compra de una máquina para preparar jugo de caña de azúcar y poder así atender toda la demanda de su producto.

Arnoldo espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente y poderles ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, además quiere ofrecerles a sus hijos el acceso a una educación de calidad. Arnoldo sueña con tener un gran negocio, estar ubicado en un local propio y poder generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Arnoldo is a person who is characterized by being very hardworking, and he always wants to offer his family a good quality of life.  Anroldo is married and is the father of 2 children who are 15 years and 10 months old, who are his motivation for making an effort in his work every day.  Approximately 12 years ago, a friend taught him how to prepare juices from cane sugar, and he started a street business selling glasses of cane sugar juice.  Thanks to this work, Arnoldo makes the necessary income to cover the costs of his home.  Due to the good quality of his products, and the good service that he offers, Arnoldo has a large quantity of customers, up to the point that he currently cannot satisfy all the demand for his product.  With the intention of satisfying all of his customers, Arnoldo is looking for a loan which will allow him to purchase a machine to prepare the cane sugar juice and therefore be able to meet all of the demand for his product.

Arnoldo hopes that in this way his income will increase considerably and that he will be able to offer his family a better quality of live.  Furthermore, he wants to offer his children access to a quality education.  Arnoldo dreams of having a big business, being located in his own place, and being able to create jobs for people who are most needy.

loans.use: buy a machine to prepare sugarcane juice and to be able to therefore meet the demand for his product.

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es:
Rosalba tiene desde hace aproximadamente 1 año una tienda general en una escuela de su región, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos para su hogar. Rosalba es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 6 hijos, y desde que su esposo los abandonó sin contribuir económicamente a los gastos de su hogar, a Rosalba le tocó generar por su propia cuenta todos los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de sus hijos. Gracias a un contacto que tenía en una escuela de su región, Rosalba pudo abrir una tienda donde ofrece a sus clientes gaseosas, dulces, snack, helado, entre otros. Debido al poco capital con el que cuenta Rosalba, su tienda no tiene un gran surtido de mercancía, es por esto que ahora Rosalba aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de gaseosas, dulces, snack, helado, entre otros para aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes en su tienda. 

Rosalba espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá ofrecerle mayor cantidad y variedad de productos a sus clientes, además, espera que sus hijos puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Rosalba sueña con tener un gran negocio el cual le brinde grandes ingresos y el cual le permita tener grandes oportunidades para ofrecerle a sus hijos una educación de calidad y mejores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
For approximately one year, Rosalba has operated a general store in a school in her area, and thanks to this, she generates the income for her household. Rosalba is a single mother and head of a family of 6 children. Since her husband abandoned them without contributing economically to the household expenses, it fell to Rosalba to generate on her own all of the necessary income to support her children. Thanks to a contact she had in a school in her area, Rosalba was able to open a store where she offers her customers soft drinks, sweets, snacks and ice cream, among other items. Due to Rosalba's low level of capital, her store does not have a wide range of merchandise, and for this reason Rosalba now hopes that a loan will give her the opportunity to buy soft drinks, sweets, snacks and ice cream, among other items, to increase the variety of products she offers to her customers in her store. 

Rosalba hopes that in this way her income will increase considerably, since she will be able to offer a greater quantity and variety of products to her customers. She also hopes that her children will be able to enjoy a better quality of life. Rosalba dreams of having a large business which will bring her a good income, and which will allow her to have great opportunities to offer her children a good education and better opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, sweets, snacks, ice cream and other items to increase the variety of products she offers in her store.

loans.name: Ilhomjon

texts.ru: Илхомджон добрый и целеустремленный молодой семьянин. Дома имеет свою мастерскую. Он изготавливает окна и двери. Уже более 9 лет занимается этим ремеслом и имеет своих учеников. Илхомджон запрашивает займ для покупки дерево для расширения бизнеса. Илхомджон надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ilhomjon is a good and and purposeful young family man. He has his own workshop at home. He makes windows and doors. He has been working for more than nine years in this profession and has his own students. Ilhomdjon is requesting a loan to buy wood for business expansion. Ilhomdjon is hoping for your help and generosity.

loans.use: to buy industrial wood.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
El señor Jorge tiene 46 años de edad, esta casado con cinco hijos. Él se ha dedicado toda su vida a la agricultura, fue su papá quien le enseño. Su familia es bien unida, responsable, es conocido en la comunidad donde vive como una persona honesta, trabajadora con buena reputación y trabaja  la tierra en la agricultura como jornal. 

Él esta solicitando un préstamo a la Fundación Campo, para comprar 300 bloques que cuesta $120 dólares, 4 quintales de hierro de 3/8 que cuestan $204 dólares, 1 quintal de hierro de 1/4 que cuestan $51 dólares, 10 bolsas de cemento que cuestan $72.50 dólares 4 metros cúbicos de arena que cuestan $80 dólares, 1 metro cúbico de grava que cuestan $25 dólares, también comprara teja, cuartones de madera y para pago de mano de obra. 

La inversión le permitirá comprar todos los materiales que necesita para mejorar  su casa y vivir en mejores condiciones, más que ya se acerca la época lluviosa. 

Jorge desea construir una casa de bloque ya que en la que vive es de adobe, brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, que sus hijos estudien y continuar trabajando con la Fundación.
texts.en:
Jorge is 46 years old and married with five children. He has dedicated his whole life to agriculture, which his father taught him. His family is very unified  and responsible, and he is known in the community where he lives as a hardworking, honest person with a good reputation, and he works the land in agriculture as a dayworker. 

He is asking for a loan from the Farm Foundation to buy 300 blocks that cost $120, 4 100-pound 3/8 iron rods that cost $204, 100 pounds of 1/4 iron rods that cost $51, 10 bags of cement that cost $72.50, 4 cubic meters of sand that cost $80, 1 cubic meter of gravel that costs $25, and also roofing, wooden  planks, and payment for labor. 

The investment will allow him to buy all the materials he needs to improve his house and live in better conditions, and on top of that rainy season is coming up. 

Jorge wants to build a block house, since the one he lives in is adobe, and to give his family a higher quality of life, and also wants his children to study and to continue working with the foundation.

loans.use: to buy 300 blocks that cost $120, 4 100-pound 3/8 iron rods that cost $204, 100 pounds of 1/4 iron rods that cost $51, 10 bags of cement that cost $72.50, 4 cubic meters of sand that cost $80, 1 cubic meter of gravel that costs $25, and also roofing, wooden  planks, and payment for labor

loans.name: Sergey

texts.en: Sergey is 27 years old. He lives with his mother and brother. For already 8 years Sergey has been involved in agriculture. During this period he has managed to expand his cultivated land and has built a barn. Now Sergey needs some financial investments to develop sheep breeding. With the help of this loan he plans to purchase 20 sheep and forage. Sergey will increase his income, which will allow him to renovate his house and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for sheep and forage.

loans.name: Phal

texts.en:
Phal, 43, is the breadwinner of the family.  They live in a rural area of the Thmor Koul district of Cambodia.  She has three sons who are still dependent on her and they work to make a living.  To survive, Phal and her husband, as well as the entire family, have been farming rice for ten years.  With her current source of income, she can earn US$16 per day and save around US$5 each day.

Phal has just joined with Kiva's field partner, VisionFund this loan cycle.  She wants to extend her farmland and is now requesting her first loan of US$1,000.  She will use the entire loan to buy an additional two hectares of farmland for her rice farming business.  With this loan, she hopes to own more farmland which will increase the farming business, so as to earn more income.

loans.use: To buy two hectares of farmland for farming.

loans.name: Anelie

texts.en: Anelie is from the village of Calaocan. She is 30 years old, married and has one child. Anelie owns and operates a general store selling a variety of different products in her community. Anelie has been in her business for over three years and earns approximately 8,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) a month from it. Anelie is requesting a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell in her sari-sari store such as canned goods, spices, drinks and snack foods. With this loan, she believes that she will improve her business, and she is hoping that she will be successful in carrying it out.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell in her sari-sari store such as canned goods, spices, drinks and snack foods

loans.name: Yuliana Andrea

texts.es:
Yuliana inició con el negocio de la venta de productos de uso personal por catálogo hace aproximadamente 2 años, motivada principalmente por mejorar los ingresos de su familia para mejorar su calidad de vida. Yuliana se encuentra casada y es madre de 1 hijo de 4 años, y ellos han sido su motivo para esforzarse en su negocio diariamente. Yuliana encontró en la venta de productos de uso personal una gran fuente de ingresos, pues le permite estar pendiente del cuidado de su hijo mientras atiende el negocio, gracias a esto, ha podido mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposo y su hijo y brindarle un buen acompañamiento a su hijo en su etapa de crecimiento. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, y a la buena atención que ofrece a sus clientes, Yuliana ha captado un gran número de clientes los cuales le hacen grandes pedidos de su negocio. Con el ánimo de responder a un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente suyo, Yuliana espera que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal como son lociones, cosméticos, desodorantes, entre otros y responder al gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente.

Yuliana espera que de esta manera su negocio siga aumentando las ventas y pueda seguir mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia. Yuliana, también anhela que su hijo pueda acceder a una educación de calidad y tenga una gran prosperidad económica. Sueña con que su negocio crezca y se consolide y pueda montar su propio local donde ofrezca gran cantidad de productos a sus clientes y donde pueda generar empleo para las personas que más lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Yuliana began her business of selling personal products through catalogs about 2 years ago, motivated principally by the idea of improving the financial status of her family so as to better their quality of life.  Yuliana is married and has one 4-year-old son; they are her motivation for striving with her business every day.   Yuliana found that selling these personal products is a great source of income and they also allow her to take care of her son while she does her work.  Thanks to this she has been able to give her husband and son a better standard of living and for her son, a boost in this stage of his life.  Thanks to the good quality of the products and the way she treats her customers, she has attracted a big customer base who give her large orders for her business.  Yuliana has been spurred on to receive a loan so that she can fill a big order that one of the customers put in.  She will use the loan to buy lotions, cosmetics, deodorants, etc. for this order.

She hopes that in this way her sales will continue to rise and she can keep on improving her family’s living standards.  Yuliana also wants her son to have a quality education and a good financial future.  She dreams that her business will grow and she can consolidate and open her own store to offer a big variety to her customers and where she can give employment to people who need it.

loans.use: to buy personal products such as lotions, cosmetics, deodorants, etc to fill to a big order from a customer.

loans.name: La Canoa Group

texts.es:
Gerarda tiene 49 años y es parte del grupo llamado La Canoa, platica que se dedica a la compra y venta de fruta y verdura de temporada como son aguacate, ciruela, plátanos guayabas, piña, melones  también vende chiles manzanos, cebollas, jitomates, tomates, zanahorias, lechugas, etc. También comenta que cultiva y vende flor de noche buena, tiene con su negocio desde hace 20 años y vende sus frutas en San Mateo Atenco en el Estado de México, ella se surte en la central de abastos de México y también vende lo que saca de las huertas de aguacate y durazno que tiene. Comenta que ella sola aprendió el negocio de vender la necesidad la hizo aprender a vender y no malbaratar su mercancía de frutas. Doña Gerarda está casada con el señor Gilberto quien se dedica al cultivo de flor de noche buena ellos tiene 7 hijos, su problemática es la vivienda donde vive comenta que es de madera y vive en una zona de riesgo ya que vive sobre un cerro y tiene miedo que se derrumbe y que se quede sin casa y tiene miedo que les llegue a pasar algo. Dice que con el crédito quiere comprar tierra para cultivo de la flor de noche buena, también quiere comprar macetas y abonos orgánicos para tener una muy buena producción este año ya que vende la flor en el Estado de México.
Los demás integrantes del grupo se llaman Carolina, Yesenia, Mauricio, Juan Luis ellos invertirán en frutas y legumbres de temporada, macetas para el cultivo de flor de noche buena y tierra para lo mismo.
texts.en: Gerarda is 49 years old and a member of the communal bank named "La Canoa" ("The Canoe"). She buys and sells seasonal fruits and vegetables such as avocados, plums, plantains, guavas, pineapples and mellons; she also sells peppers, apples, onions, tomatoes, carrots and lettuce. She also reports that she grows and sells Christmas Eve flowers (poinsettias). She has been in this business for 20 years and she sells her fruits in San Mateo Atencio in the state of Mexico. She stocks up at the wholesale food market in Mexico and she also sells what she reaps from her avocado and peach gardens. She comments that she learned the sales business by herself - necessity taught her to make sales and not to sell off her fruit cheap. Gerarda is married to Gilberto, who grows poinsettias. They have seven children and their problem is their house, which is made of wood. They live in a hazardous area on a hill, and she's afraid that it could collapse and they could become homeless, and she's also afraid something could happen to them. She says that she wishes to use the loan to purchase soil for cultivating poinsettias. She also wants to purchase flowerpots and compost in order to get a very good production this year, since she sells the flowers in the state of Mexico. The other members of the group are named Carolina, Yesenia, Mauricio and Juan Luis. They will invest in seasonal fruits and vegetables, flowerpots and soil for growing poinsettias.

loans.use: to purchase compost, pesticide, flowerpots, soil, etc., in order to cultivate Christmas Eve flowers (poinsettias).

loans.name: Bibikhon

texts.ru: Бибихон замужем и любящая мать двоих детей. Она очень целеустремленная и добрая женщина. Более 10 лет она занимается купле продажей мебели. Имеет арендованную торговую точку. Муж уехал в Федерации России на заработки. В бизнесе занимается одна и старается расширить бизнес, чтобы содержать свою семью в хороших условиях. Бибихон запрашивает займ для увлечения оборотного капитала, то есть покупки мебели для расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Bibikhon is married and a loving mother of two children.  She is a very goal-oriented and kind woman.  She has been involved in buying and selling furniture for over ten years.  She has a leased store.  Her husband left to work in the Russian Federation.  Bibikhon is involved in this business by herself and tries to expand her business in order to provide good conditions for her family.  Bibikhon is requesting this loan to increase her working capital, i.e. to purchase furniture in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy furniture in order to expand her business

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en: Marcelina is engaged in buying and selling fruits in the market. She has been in her business for 19 years and she usually received P10,000 monthly from it. Marcelina wants to buy more fruits to sell, but she lacks the necessary capital. Thus she is taking out this loan PHP 10,000 to buy apples, oranges and mangoes to sell in the market.  She believes that her sacrifices will lead her to reach her goal, which is to increase her profit and save money for future emergency purposes.

loans.use: to buy apples, oranges and mangoes to sell.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en: Josephine is 41 years old, and is married. She is a mother of two children. She has been engaged in buying and selling fruit in the market of Cauayan City. Right now, Josephine is asking for a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to acquire more fruits such as apples, mangoes, oranges, “pomelo” and guava to sell. This business helps Josephine, because it’s the only source of income she has to raise her family.

loans.use: to acquire more fruits such as apples, mangoes, oranges, “pomelo” and guava to sell.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.en:
Gregoria is a jolly person with a strong personality. She lives with her family in the village of Duminit.

Gregoria is engaged in a hog-raising business that primarily involves hogs for breeding. It is a business that she started along years ago. The best way to earn profits was to go to the livestock markets to buy and sell pigs. Now, she needs to increase her business, thus she is taking out this loan of 10,000 PHP that she will use to buy feed, vaccines, and additional hogs to raise. Through this loan, she believes that she can make improvements in her business and she is hoping that she will be successful in carrying them out.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines, and additional hogs to raise.

loans.name: Nay's Group

texts.en:
Aged 39, Nay lives in a village in the Ponhea Krek district of Cambodia. She is married with four children: three daughters and one son, who are still dependent on her and still in school.  During their spare time, the children help and work at the family's business.  She and her husband earn a living through farming rice and producing palm juice.  They have been in this business for nine years. 

She is leading a group of two members and this is her second loan with VisionFund.  Her group member has just joined with VisionFund this loan cycle.  She now earns US$8 per day from her current business.  With her request for this small loan with VisionFund, she will use the entire loan to buy fertilizer and plant cassava as additional business items to better earn income.  She hopes to increase her business and make a better living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and plant cassava.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es:
Maria tiene 43 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por la importante actividad comercial de sus habitantes. En sus alrededores se encuentra la Fortaleza de Ungará, último vestigio de la Cultura Huarco, antiguo Cañete. También se hallan antiguas haciendas instaladas entre las extensas áreas de cultivo, el domicilio donde vive es el de sus compadres, ya que ellos viajaron a otro país y le dejaron la vivienda ´para ella, Maria ha pasado por varias dificultades , de pequeña su madre la abandono cuando tenía solo 8 años, al suceder ello la crio su tía, quien le enseño a ganarse el pan con el sudor de la frente como se dice, con ella vendía dulces en las calles, mas adelante conoció al padre de sus 5 hijos, el cual la abandono hace mas de 15 años, a pesar de ello fue muy fuerte y decidió salir adelante, actualmente vive con solo 4 de sus hijos ya que uno de ellos ha formado una familia.

Hace ya un año Maria inicio su negocio de venta de salchipollos a fuera de su vivienda, tambien vende gelatina, chupetes y dulces, al inicio lo hacía sacando su pequeña cocina y sus ollas a las afueras de su casa pero poco a poco perdió la vergüenza ya que ella miraba a sus hijos y eso la motivaba a seguir, poco a poco se hizo conocida y debido a su amabilidad, los clientes siempre la buscan y por ello Maria cree que le va bien.

Maria está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá comprar un carrito sanguchero y también  utensilios para cocinar sus platillos, así ella seguirá trabajando y luchando como siempre para cumplir su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos y tener un local para su negocio”.
texts.en:
Maria is 43, lives in the Imperial city characterized for the large commercial activities of its inhabitants.
In the surrounding area the Ungara Fort is located, it's the last trace of the Huarco culture, formerly "Cañete". Old haciendas are also located in the large crop land areas, the place where she lives belongs to her friends, they went to another country and left the house for her to live in, Maria has gone through several difficulties, when she was little her mother abandoned her when she was only eight years old, she grew up with her aunt, who taught her how to earn a living like the common expression "through your foreheads' sweat" says; she sold candy with her in the street, later on she meet the father of her five children, who abandoned her more than 15 years ago, in spite of that she stayed strong and decided to get ahead, she lives with four of her children since one of them has started his own family.

A year ago Maria started a business outside her house selling "salchipollo" (french fries with fried chicken), she also sells jello, popsicles and candy, when she first started she moved her stove, pots and pans to a section close to the entrance of her house, but slowly she felt more confident and less shy because watching her children motivated her to keep going, she became known little by little and thanks to her nice personality clients always look for her and that's why Maria thinks she does well.

Maria is very thankful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to them she will be able to buy a mobile cart to sell food and she will also buy utensils to cook her meals, she will keep working hard like she has been to fulfil her biggest dream: pay for her children's professional education and have a commercial location for her business.

loans.use: To buy a mobile cart for food sales, kitchen utensils, and other items.

loans.name: Anvarjon

texts.ru: Анварджон женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Жена работает администратором в стоматологической поликлинике. Более 6 лет он занимается перевозкой людей и имеет большой опыт в этой сфере деятельности. Имеет машину марки «Тикко». Предоставляет услуги такси. Анварджон запрашивает займ для установки газового оборудования для автомашины. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Anvarjon is married and a responsible father of three children.  His wife works as an administrator at a dental clinic.  Anvarjon has been involved in passenger transportation for over six years and has an extensive experience in this business area.  He owns a "Tikko" car.  He provides a taxi service.  Anvarjon is requesting this loan to install gas equipment for his car.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to install gas equipment for his car

loans.name: Muhammadfiruz

texts.ru: Мухаммадфируз трудолюбивый и активный парень. Более 4лет занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Имеет опыт в данном бизнесе и имеет много клиентов. В бизнесе помогает отец. Мухаммадфируз хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы помогать своим родителям в содержании семьи. Запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки скота с целью увлечения поголовья скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Muhammadfiruz is a hardworking and active young man.  He has been involved in buying and selling cattle for over four years.  He has experience in this business and many clients.  His father helps him in the business.  Muhammadfiruz wants to expand his business in order to help his parents with supporting the family.  He is requesting a loan in the sum of 10,000 Somoni to buy livestock in order to increase livestock headcount.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Mauricia

texts.en:
Mauricia is 44 years old, and is married. Mauricia is responsible for her family. She is engaged in her recycling business. She earns about PHP3,000 monthly from it. Her business comes primarily from buying and selling recycling materials.

As of now, Mauricia is asking a loan amounting to PHP 17,000 to buy more recycled materials, cans, metals and empty bottles. This business helps Mauricia, because it's the only source of income she has to raise her family.

loans.use: to buy more recycled materials, cans, metals and empty bottles.

loans.name: Rahmat

texts.ru: Рахматжон трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей из них трое несовершеннолетние. Боле 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. В основном он выращивает картофель, лук и чеснок. Жена помогает по обработке земли и посева семян. Рахматжон запрашивает займ для приобретения семян лука и пленки для парника саженцев помидора.
texts.en: Rahmat is a hardworking and goal-oriented person.  He is married and raising four children, three of whom are adolescent.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over ten years.  He primarily grows potatoes, onions and garlic.  His wife helps him with treating the soil and sowing seeds.  Rahmat is requesting this loan to buy onion seeds and plastic for a greenhouse with tomato seedlings.

loans.use: to buy onion seeds

loans.name: Zarifa

texts.ru: Зарифа проживает в городе Дангара. Ей 46 лет. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Она занимается торговлей одежды и обуви. Этим видом деятельности занимается шесть лет. Кредит берет для приобретения сезонного товара.
texts.en: Zarifa lives in the city of Dangara.  She is 46 years old, married and has five children.  She is involved in selling clothing and shoes.  Zarifa has been in this business for six years.  She is requesting this loan to buy seasonal merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal merchandise

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.ru: Хосият проживает в районе Дангара. Она замужем. Ей 46 лет. У нее пятеро детей. Она занимается скотоводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается шесть лет. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Khosiyat lives in the Dangara district.  She is 46 years old, married and has five children.  She is involved in animal husbandry.  Khosiyat has been in this business for six years.  She is requesting this loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
A resident of San Antonio, Mrs. Lilibeth is a farmer. She is 26 years old and a responsible mother of one. She has been able to earn 20,000 PHP per crop from her businesses.
At present, she would like to borrow funds to buy fertilizer and seeds to grow for her farming business. This will help her to sustain her living conditions. In the future, she wishes to own a few hectares of farmland to farm on.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farming business

loans.name: Blanca Estella

texts.es:
Blanca es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre buscar un bienestar para su familia. A sus 59 años de edad, Blanca se encuentra casada y es madre de 7 hijos, quienes son su motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio. Blanca anteriormente era una vendedora ambulante, pero gracias a un programa del gobierno pudo acceder a un local en un centro comercial. Blanca en este local ofrece café y cigarrillos, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Debido a que ha tenido muy buenas ventas, a Blanca se le ha disminuido el inventario de los productos que ofrece, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de cigarrillos y café para aumentar el inventario de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

Blanca espera que sus ventas sigan aumentando para ofrecerles una buena calidad de vida a su familia, además de ofrecerles un buen estudio a sus hijos menores. Blanca sueña con poder ubicarse en un mejor local, pues en el que se encuentra ahora es muy pequeño, y poder así ser más visible para los clientes.
texts.en:
Blanca is a person who is well-known as being very hard-working, and who always is striving for her family's well-being. At the age of 59, Blanca is married and the mother of 7 children, who are her motivation for working hard in her business. Previously, Blanca was a mobile vendor, but thanks to a government program she was able to obtain a space in a shopping center. In this shop, Blanca offers coffee and cigarettes, and thanks to this work she generates sufficient income to support her household. Since she has had very good sales, the inventory of products Blanca offers has decreased, and for this reason she hopes that a loan will give her the opportunity to buy cigarettes and coffee to increase the inventory of products she offers to her customers. 

Blanca hopes that her sales will continue to increase, so she can offer a good quality of life to her family, in addition to offering a good education to her younger children. Blanca dreams of being able to locate her business in a better shop, since the one where she is now is very small, and in this way she would be more visible to customers.

loans.use: to buy cigarettes and coffee to increase the inventory of products she offers to her customers.

loans.name: Husan

texts.ru: Хусан более 5 лет занимается купле- продажей продуктовых и промышленных товаров. Он очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Раньше арендовал лавку, а теперь имеет магазин, там где имеет широкий ассортимент продуктов. Хусан хочет расширить свой бизнес и запрашивает займ для покупки продуктов питания с целью увлечения ассортимента продуктов.
texts.en: Husan has been involved in buying and selling food products and household goods.  He is a very hardworking and conscientious person.  He is married and raising three children.  Husan previously leased a store and now owns a store, where he has a wide selection of products.  He wants to expand his business and is requesting this loan to buy food products in order to expand his product selection.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Elzara

texts.ru: Элзара жительница района Дангара. Ей 27 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Ее дети маленькие. Элзара занимается растениеводством. Этим видом деятельности она занимается десять лет. Кредит берет для закупа семян и горючего. Она хочет посеять картошку и лук.
texts.en: Elzara is a resident of the Dangara district.  She is 27 years old, married and has two children.  Her children are small.  Elzara is involved in agriculture.  She has been in this business for ten years.  She is requesting this loan to buy seeds and fuel.  She wants to sow potatoes and onions.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fuel

loans.name: Abdulmanon

texts.ru: Абдулманон проживает в районе Дангара. Он занимается посевом злаковых культур. Ему 29 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Растениеводством Абдулманон занимается 7 лет. Кредит берет для посева пшеницы.
texts.en: Abdulmanon lives in the Dangara district.  He is involved in sowing cereal crops.  He is 29 years old, married and has two children.  Abdulmanon has been involved in agriculture for seven years.  He is requesting this loan to sow wheat.

loans.use: to sow wheat

loans.name: Chibek

texts.ru: Чибек жительница района Дангара. Ей 54 года. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Она занимается животноводством. Чибек разводит скот у себя дома. Этим видом деятельности занимается 7 лет. Кредит берет для закупа мелко - рогатого скота.
texts.en: Chibek is a resident of the Dangara district.  She is 54 years old, married and has three children.  She is involved in animal husbandry.  Chibek breeds livestock at home.  She has been in this business for seven years.  She is requesting this loan to buy small livestock.

loans.use: to buy small livestock

loans.name: Salomat

texts.ru: Саломат более десяти лет занимается растениеводством. Она в основном выращивает овощи для продажи. Ей 39 лет. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Она берет кредит для закупа семян и топлива.
texts.en: Salomat has been involved in agriculture for over ten years.  She primarily grows vegetables for sale.  She is 39 years old, married and has four children.  Salomat is requesting this loan to buy seeds and fuel.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fuel

loans.name: Robinson

texts.en: Robinson is a hardworking and patient father. He lives with his wife, who is also a very loving person. The family has been farming for five years. He has applied for this loan to develop his farm. He plans to purchase chemicals, fertilizer and seed to grow, which will allow him to receive more income. Farm [products] are in great demand, not only in the city, but also in the region. Meeting this demand will allow Robinson to increase his income and ensure a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer and seed for his farming business

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is 58 years old. She is a mixed crop farmer. She and her husband Gabriel are blessed with five children. She has been in the farming business for the past 20 years and has a monthly income of 5,000 PHP, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for a loan of 35,000 PHP. Elena will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and venture into rice farming.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer and seedlings for her farm business

loans.name: Delma

texts.en:
Delma is 45 years of age. She is married to Alfredo, a farmer in the village of Calaocan. The couple is thankful because they have been blessed with two children. 

Due to high cost of basic commodities, Delma decided to close her sari-sari store. But now, Delma wants to continue her business she started before. Thus, she is taking out this loan amounting to 30,000 PHP to buy grocery stock such as noodles, soft drinks, kitchen ingredients, curls and bread to sell in her sari-sari store. She hopes that she can get the amount she requested to further grow her business.

loans.use: to buy grocery stock such as noodles, soft drinks, kitchen ingredients, curls and bread to sell

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is from the village of Cabisera 17-21, province of Isabela. She has been engaged in a farming business for 10 years. Lorna is 31 years old with three school-age children. Lorna is hardworking person.

Lorna is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy fertilizer and seedlings for her farming business. Farming is the main source of their income. She is very hopeful that her husband's business will grow with the loan she invests and it will help her family to live a better financial life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seedlings for her farming business

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en: Lydia lives in the Cabisera 17-21 province of Isabela. She is 48 years old and is married. Lydia has three grown up children. She is involved in agriculture, and primarily sows crops for sale. She has been in this business for nine years. Lydia is requesting this loan of 25,000 PHP to buy fertilizer and seed for her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase seed and fertilizer for her farming business

loans.name: Lelita

texts.en: Lelita lives in the village of San Antonio in the province of Isabela. She is 43 years old, married, and has four children. She is involved in farming. Lelita has been in this business for ten years. She is requesting a loan amounting to 20,000 PHP to buy mineral fertilizers and seedlings for her farming business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed to grow for her farming business

loans.name: Gloria Amparo

texts.es:
Gloria trabaja la actividad de reciclaje desde hace aproximadamente 10 años, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Gloria es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 4 hijos, pues el padre de sus hijos la abandonó hace 7 años y no ha contribuido económicamente para los ingresos de su hogar. Debido a esto, Gloria se ve en la necesidad de generar sus propios ingresos y poder satisfacer las necesidades de su hogar. Gloria trabaja comprando y recogiendo reciclaje el cual posteriormente lo vende por bultos a una empresa recicladora a un buen precio. Debido a que actualmente una persona le esta vendiendo una gran cantidad de reciclaje en un muy bajo precio, Gloria espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de reciclaje para venderlo posteriormente por bultos y generar utilidad. 

Gloria espera que su negocio siga creciendo y pueda tener una bodega con mayor capacidad para guardar el reciclaje. Además, Gloria espera que si su negocio crece pueda generarle mayores ingresos para mejorarles la calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gloria has worked in the field of recycling for approximately 10 years, and thanks to this work, she generates the income to pay her household expenses.  Gloria is a single mother and the head of a family of 4 children, since the father of her children abandoned her 7 years ago and has not contributed economically to the income of her household. Due to this situation, Gloria needs to generate her own income so that she can satisfy the needs of her household. Gloria works collecting and buying recycled items, which she later sells in bulk to a recycling company at a good price. Since a person is currently selling her a large quantity of recycled items at a very low price, Gloria hopes that a loan will give her the chance to buy recycled items so that she can sell them in bulk and generate profits.

Gloria hopes that her business will continue to grow and she will be able to have a warehouse with greater capacity to store the recycled items. In addition, Gloria hopes that if her business grows, it will generate more income for her so she can improve the quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to buy recycled items to sell them in bulk and generate profits.

loans.name: Ilhomjon

texts.ru: Илхомчон проживает в районе Пяндж. Он женат. Ему 36 лет. У него двое детей. Он занимается растениеводством. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 20 лет. Кредит берет для посева лука и картошки.
texts.en: Ilhomjon lives in the Pyandj district.  He is 36 years old, married and has two children.  He is primarily involved in agriculture.  Ilhomjon has been in this business for 20 years.  He is requesting this loan to sow onions and potatoes.

loans.use: to sow onions and potatoes

loans.name: Ulkhon

texts.ru: Улхон проживает в районе Пяндж. Ей 49 лет. Она замужем. У нее семеро детей. Она занимается выращиванием овощей. В основном она сеет картошку для продажи. Этим видом деятельности занимается два года. Кредит берет для закупа семян.
texts.en: Ulkhon lives in the Pyandj district.  She is 49 years old, married and has seven children.  She is involved in growing vegetables.  Ulkhon primarily grows potatoes for sale.  She has been in this business for two years.  She is requesting this loan to buy seeds.

loans.use: to buy seeds

loans.name: Pheng's Group

texts.en:
A resident living in a rural area of the Ponhea Krek district, Pheng is a 49-year-old mother of seven children.  Only four of them are still dependent on her and they work at the family's business to help earn a profit.  To support her big family, she has been farming rice and planting cassava for 33 years and sometimes she also works for others.  With her current source of income, she manages to earn around US$5 per day.

This is the first loan for Pheng's group which consists of two female members.  Now she is leading her group to apply for another small loan of KHR1,000,000 each.  As the leader, she will use the entire loan to lease a small plot of farmland for her cassava business.  This loan will enable her to plant more cassava so as to earn a larger income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To lease a small plot of farmland to plant cassava

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Leticia

texts.en:
Leticia has been in the farming business for ten years and sells her farm produce within the local markets in the town area of Ilagan.  She lives in the town area of Ilagan with her three children who all attend school. She harvests rice and corn.

She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer and seed as well as cover the labor costs associated with her farming business. She says the loan will help her farming business and thereby help meet her family's consumption needs, the major need being education of the children. She plans to install an irrigation system in her farm in the future to ensure income during every season.

She considers the high cost of inputs and loss of production due to pests as major challenges for her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seed as well as cover the labor costs associated with her farming business.

loans.name: Nely

texts.en:
Nely is 45 years old and still single. To earn a living, she runs a grocery shop. She has 10 years of experience in the business and she usually receives a net income of 8,000 PHP monthly from it.

Nely needs a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy additional products such as noodles, coffee, sugar, canned goods and snack foods for her store. She believes that this loan will help her to improve the business and is hoping that she will be successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional products such as noodles, coffee, sugar, canned goods and snack foods for her store.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria lives with her husband and three siblings. They are farmers. With the help of her husband and siblings, she grows corn and rice year after year. She herself has four years experience. 

She is applying for a loan to buy materials she will use for planting, such as fertilizer, herbicides, and seed. With these materials she will be ready to improve her work and is expecting to have good results. 

Her objective is to find the way to have an abundant harvest, so that she and her family can get ahead in life.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals, fertilizer and seed to grow

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda intends to improve her hog-raising business to make it a viable source of income. She is 41 years old and has five children. Some of them are still going to school. Belinda aims to improve their standard of living and wants to give her children a brilliant future. 

To improve her business, Belinda is asking for additional capital of 30,000 Philippine pesos to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines. She says that this loan will be a great help to her to improve the business, and she is hoping that she will be successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed for her hog-raising business

loans.name: Humberto De Jesus

texts.es:
Humberto es una persona que ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante le han permitido superarlas y continuar progresando en su vida. Hace aproximadamente 15 años tuvo que abandonar su municipio natal debido a la violencia, y emigró hacia la ciudad de Medellín con el ánimo de continuar con su vida. En la ciudad trabajó como empleado en varios negocios, pero al ver lo mal remunerado que estaba, Humberto decidió independizarse y montar una tienda general. Actualmente Humberto atiende su tienda generar la cual le permite generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece en su tienda, Humberto tiene muy buenos clientes y esto ha hecho que sus ventas hayan aumentado en los últimos meses. Debido a que sus clientes le han manifestado sus intenciones de que Humberto venda licor en su tienda, Humberto busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de licores para su tienda general para aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes. 

Humberto espera que su negocio aumente las ventas considerablemente. Además, espera que le siga generando los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Humberto sueña con tener un gran negocio donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y con el cual pueda tener una estabilidad económica su familia.
texts.en:
Humberto is a person who has had to pass through many difficulties in his life. However, his desire to work and get ahead has permitted him to overcome them and continue to make progress in life. Approximately 15 years ago, he had to leave the municipality where he was born due to the violence, and he emigrated to the city of Medellín with the determination to continue with his life. In the city, he worked as an employee in various businesses, but seeing how poorly paid he was, Humberto decided to become independent and open a general store. Currently, Humberto is operating his general store, which permits him to generate the necessary income to cover his household expenses. Thanks to the good service he offers in his store, Humberto has very good customers, and this has caused his sales to rise in recent months. His customers have made the request that Humberto sell liquor in his store, and thus Humberto is seeking a loan to buy liquors for his general store, in order to increase the variety of products he offers his customers. 

Humberto hopes that his business will increase its sales considerably. He also hopes that it will keep generating the income he needs to maintain his household. Humberto dreams of having a large business where he can create jobs for people who need them most, and which will allow him to provide economic stability for his family.

loans.use: to buy liquors for his general store, to increase the variety of products he offers his customers.

loans.name: Tojihol

texts.ru: Тожихол жительница района Пяндж. Ей 52 года. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Тожихол занимается скотоводством. Она закупает крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. В этой области она четыре года. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Tojihol is a resident of the Pyandj district.  She is 52 years old, married and has four children.  Tojihol is involved in animal husbandry.  She buys cattle for future resale.  She has been in this business for four years.  She is requesting this loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Eng's Group

texts.en:
A resident located in a village of the Tbaung Khmum district of Cambodia, Eng is a 48-year-old mother of five children.  Only three of them are still dependent and in school.  She and her husband earn a living through planting rubber tree.  They have been in this business for ten years.  With her current and only source of income, she can earn around US$4 per day which is sufficient to afford the family's daily needs, but she can only save US$1 each day.

This is the first loan for Eng's group with VisionFund.  Her group consists of two members.  To earn a better profit for the family, she wants to extend her rubber plantation.  Now she is leading her group to request a loan of KHR1,000,000 each.  As the leader, she will use the entire loan to buy a small plot of land to plant rubber tree.  She hopes to increase her family's income, be able to afford better nutrient-rich food, and also keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy a small plot of land to increase her rubber plantation.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Vic

texts.en:
Mr. Vic is 36 years old and a resident of Cabisera 17-21. He has a life partner in his wife and has been blessed with two children: one is married and one is single. Vic cultivates rice crops twice a year to generate his income and takes some time to go fishing along the river.
