His wife sells the fish he catches to local villagers and raises some piglets at home.

Vic is taking out this loan from Kiva to purchase rice seeds for 5 hectares of farmland and 10 bags of fertilizer. In the future, Vic hopes to improve his family-owned businesses and generate additional household income.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and chemicals for his farming business

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is from the village of Calaocan, Angadanan. He is 42 years old and is married to Vilma. He has been blessed with five children. Joseph is willing to work hard to lift his family out of poverty. Joseph has been running his general store for five years and earns approximately 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) monthly from it. Joseph wants to improve his business; therefore, he is asking for a loan of  25,000 PHP to buy canned goods, bakery bread, curls and other basic ingredients to sell in his village.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, bakery bread, curls and other basic ingredients to sell

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Гулнора занимается предпринимательством более 7 лет. Она продает детскую обувь. После смерти супруга она осталась одна с четырьмя несовершеннолетними детьми, старшей дочери было -10 лет. Гулнора начала работать посудомойкой в разных столовых и ресторанах и получила мизерную зарплату, которая хватило только на пропитание. Она обратилась за займом в «ИМОН Интернешнл» и первый её займ был в размере 5000 Сомони. Благодаря займу она постепенно увеличивала товар и расширила бизнес. Этим успехом она смогла выдать свою дочь замуж. Гулнора запрашивает займ в размере 13000 Сомони для расширения ассортимента своего товара. Она заранее благодарит «ИМОН Интернешнл» и КИВА за поддержку!!!
texts.en: Gulnora has been an entrepreneur for over seven years.  She sells children's shoes.  Following her husband's death, she was left with four adolescent children, with her oldest daughter being ten years old.  Gulnora started to work as a dishwasher at various cafes and restaurants and earned a miserly salary, which was only enough for food.  She requested a loan from "IMON International", and her first loan was for 5000 Somoni.  Thanks to the loan, she gradually increased merchandise and expanded her business.  This success allowed her to marry off her daughter.  Gulnora is requesting a loan in the sum of 13,000 Somoni to expand her merchandise selection.  She is grateful in advance to "IMON International" and Kiva for the support!!!

loans.use: to buy shoes in order to expand her business

loans.name: Ahror

texts.ru: Ахрор очень трудолюбивый и честный человек. Более 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей и разведением скота. Кроме скотоводство он помогает жене печь лепешки, а затем продает их.  Своих детей он вырастил трудолюбивыми человеками. В бизнесе помогает жена. Ахрор запрашивает займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ahror is a very hardworking and honest person.  He has been involved in buying and selling livestock for over ten years.  Besides animal husbandry, he helps his wife to bake flatbread and then sells it.  He raised his children to be hardworking people.  His wife helps him in the business.  Ahror is requesting this loan to buy livestock in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Lin's Group

texts.en:
Lin, 27, is married with three children and lives in the Tbaung Khmum district of Cambodia.  Her three children are still dependent and in school.  She earns a living through farming rice and planting rubber tree as main source of income. With her current source of income, she earns US$3 per day. 

This is the first loan for Lin's group with Kiva's field partner, VisionFund.  Her group consists of four members.  With the need to increase their family's income, she is leading her group to apply for the small loan of KHR1,000,000 each with VisionFund.  As the leader, Lin will use this loan to buy a small plot of land to plant rubber trees.  She hopes to increase her business and earn more income in order to make a better living and also keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy a small plot of land to plant rubber trees.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Mom's Group

texts.en:
A resident in a village of the Tbaung Khmum district, Mom is 27 years old and married with three dependent children who are still in school.  She and her husband have been earning a living through working on a rubber plantation for ten years.  With only a single source of income, she currently earns US$3 per day to feed her family. 

This is the first loan for Mom's group with VisionFund.  Her group consists of five members.  Now she is leading this group to apply for a small loan of KHR1,000,000 each.  As the leader, she will use the entire loan to buy construct materials such as cement, wood, etc. in order to build a new, small house in which to live.  She hopes to have a new house that can accommodate her children better.

loans.use: To buy construction material for house building.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Khorn's Group

texts.en:
A villager in the Ponhea Krek distric of Cambodia, Khorn is 49 years old and married with five children.  She and her husband earn a living through making beds for sale.  They have been in this business for two years.  Sometimes Khorn works for others as well.  With her current source of income, she earns around US $7 per day. 

This is the first loan for Khorn's group with VisionFund.  Her group consists of two members.  She is now leading her group to apply for the loan with VisionFund of KHR1,000,000 each.  As the leader, she will use her entire loan to buy more wood to make beds for sale.  She hopes to increase her business so as to earn more income.

loans.use: To buy more wood to make beds for sale.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Rorn's Group

texts.en:
A villager in the Tbaung Khmum district of Cambodia, Rorn is 32 years old and married with three dependent children who are still in school.  She and her husband earn a living through farming rice and by working at rubber plantation.  They have been in this business for seven years.  She currently earns US$3 per day to feed her family.

This is the first loan for Rorn's group with VisionFund.  Her group consists of four members.  She is now leading her group to apply for a small loan with VisionFund of KHR1,000,000 each.  As the leader, she will use the entire loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland.  She hopes to increase her business so as to earn more income and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es:
Efraín se ha dedicado desde muy joven a la fabricación de zapatos, actividad que aprendió gracias a que su familia se dedicaba a esta actividad y le daban trabajo en sus talleres. Luego de haber adquirido la experiencia necesaria, Efraín montó su propio taller de fabricación de calzado y gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Efraín, con 57 años de edad se encuentra casado y es padre de 2 hijos, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena educación. Los productos que fabrica Efraín tienen el reconocimiento por ser de muy buena calidad, además que siempre ofrece una muy buena atención. Efraín ha visto como sus herramientas se han visto desgastadas por el uso que les ha dado, es por esto que ahora quiere renovarlas para hacer su trabajo de manera más eficiente. Debido a que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar esta compra, Efraín anhela que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de herramientas de trabajo como troqueles para cortar la materia prima, además de surtir con materias primas su negocio. 

Efraín espera que su negocio siga aumentando las ventas para ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Además, Efraín espera que pueda aumentar los puestos de trabajo que ofrece, pues hasta el momento emplea a 2 personas y espera que sigan aumentando. Efraín sueña con tener un gran taller de fabricación de calzado donde pueda emplear a muchas personas vulnerables y donde pueda ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Since he was very young, Efraín has worked making shoes. He learned this trade thanks to the fact that his family members dedicated itself to this activity, and they gave him work in their workshops. After having acquired the necessary experience, Efraín set up his own workshop making shoes, and thanks to this, he generates the necessary income to support his household. At 57 years of age, Efraín is married and the father of 2 children, for whom he has always wanted to provide a good education. The products Efraín makes are recognized as being of very good quality, and he also always offers very good service. Efraín has noticed that his tools have become worn through the use he has given them, and for this reason he wants to renew them so he can do his work more effectively. Since he does not have the necessary capital to make this purchase, Efraín desires a loan to provide him the opportunity to buy working tools such as cutting dies to cut the raw materials, and to stock his business with supplies. 

Efraín hopes that his business will continue to increase its sales, so that he can offer his family a better quality of life. Efraín also hopes that he can increase the number of jobs he provides, since at present he employs 2 people, and he hopes this will continue to increase. Efraín dreams of having a large workshop making shoes, where he can employ many people who need help, and which will let him offer his children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tools such as cutting dies to cut the raw materials, and also to stock his business with supplies.

loans.name: Alimardon

texts.ru: Алимардон женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. У него очень большая семья с ним живет его родители. Более 7 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур, таких как лук, помидор и пшеницы. Кроме этого он занимается скотоводством. В бизнесе помогает жена. Он хочет улучшить свое жилищные условия и с этой целью Алимардон запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки стройматериалов для ремонта своего дома. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Alimardon is married and raising three children.  His parents also live with him, and he has a very large family.  Alimardon has been involved in growing agricultural crops, such as onions, tomatoes and wheat, for over seven years.  Besides this, he is involved in animal husbandry.  His wife helps him with the business.  Alimardon wants to improve his living conditions, and is requesting a loan in the sum of 10,000 Somoni to achieve this goal and buy building materials to repair his house.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Chavli

texts.ru: Чавли женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Более 15 лет он занимается купле- продажей мелкого рогатого скота. Его дети и жена помогают по бизнесу. Чавли хочет расширить свой бизнес с целью улучшения благосостояние семьи. Чавли запрашивает займ в размере 7000 Сомони для покупки 14 голов мелкого рогатого скота.
texts.en: Chavli is married and a responsible father of three children.  He is a very hardworking and conscientious person.  He has been involved in buying and selling small livestock for over 15 years.  His children and wife help him with the business.  Chavli wants to expand his business in order to improve his family's welfare.  Chavli is requesting a loan in the sum of 700 Somoni to buy 14 heads of small livestock.

loans.use: to buy small livestock

loans.name: Tagoimurat

texts.ru: Тагоймурат женат и ответственный отец четверых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Более 10 лет занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. В основном выращивает картошку и кукуруза, а затем полученную урожай продает на базаре. В бизнесе помогают жена и дети. Тагоймурат запрашивает займ в размере 2000 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов.
texts.en: Tagoimurat is married and a responsible father of four children.  He is a very hardworking and goal-oriented person.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over ten years.  He primarily grows potatoes and corn, and then sells his harvest at a market.  His wife and children help him with the business.  Tagoimurat is requesting a loan in the sum of 2000 Somoni to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Bozor

texts.ru: Бозор женат и любящий отец четверых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Более 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Потом полученный урожай продает оптом. В бизнесе помогают жена и старшие дети. Бозор запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов. Бозор надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Bozor is married and a loving father of four children.  He is a very hardworking and kind person.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over ten years.  Then, he sells his harvest wholesale.  His wife and older children help him with the business.  Bozor is requesting a loan in the sum of 5000 Somoni to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants.  Bozor relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Gloria dedicó gran parte de su vida a trabajar como empleada en una fábrica de arepas. Debido a su embarazo, donde tuvo 2 gemelos, Gloria tuvo que dejar de asistir a su trabajo para poder estar al cuidado de sus 2 hijos, sin embargo, el no contar con una fuente de ingresos diferente a la de su esposo hacía que sus necesidades no estuvieran totalmente satisfechas. Con el ánimo de volver a generar ingresos para su hogar, pero sin descuidar de sus hijos, Gloria tuvo la idea de montar su propio taller de arepas, y empezó a trabajar fuertemente para poderlo sacar adelante. Actualmente Gloria tiene su fábrica de arepas montada donde cuenta con un buen número de clientes fijos, lo que le permite tener ingresos para su hogar y seguir contribuyendo a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Con el ánimo de mejorar la producción de sus arepas, Gloria espera que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de un horno para asar las arepas y surtir con materia prima su negocio.

Gloria espera poder seguir aumentando sus ventas para ofrecer empleo a las personas más vulnerables, además de que sus hijos y su esposo puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Gloria sueña con tener una gran empresa de arepas y poder distribuir sus productos a gran parte de su región, y que sus hijos puedan tener en esta empresa una gran oportunidad de progresar económicamente.
texts.en: Gloria dedicated a large part of her life to working at factory making arepas (a very popular traditional Columbian roll made of corn). After giving birth to twins, Gloria had to leave her job so she could be with her two young children. Of course, without another source of income besides her husband's, the family wasn't able to totally meet its needs. With the goal of starting to earn income again for the household while not neglecting her children, Gloria decided to start her own business making arepas and started working hard to make it happen. Currently, she has a running arepa bakery where she counts on a good number of regular customers. This allows her to contribute to the household finances and continue to improve her family's quality of life. With the goal to increase her production, Gloria hopes that the loan will help her purchase an oven and stock up on ingredients. She hopes to keep increasing her sales so she can offer employment to people who need it, and so her children and husband can have a better quality of life. Gloria dreams of having a big arepas company that can distribute her products throughout the region, so that her children can have this business as a way to prosper financially.

loans.use: to purchase an oven to bake arepas and stock her business with ingredients.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna lives in the village of San Antonio together with her husband and six young children. In this agricultural region, the main business activity is growing vegetable crops for sale. She is engaged in farming work where she grows different vegetables and has been in this business for about eight years. She is a hardworking person. At present, her working capital is about 2,000 PHP. 

Lorna plans to use her Kiva loan in the amount of 10,000 PHP to buy seeds, fertilizer and chemicals to grow early season vegetable varieties.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable seed, fertilizer and chemicals for her farming business.

loans.name: Nora

texts.en: Nora and her husband are engaged in buying and selling animals and this has been the source of income for their family. She is 39 years old and married to Ruben. They live in a rural and mountainous place. Their two children are still studying. They buy cows and carabao (domesticated water buffalo) and sell them in Isabela. They only sell animals once or twice a week. She is now requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 that they can use as additional capital for their business to buy animals to sell. Nora wants her children to have a better life and she is hoping that she can send them to college after high school. She believes that she can make it by working hard. She hopes that her loan will be granted so she can have a continuous source of livelihood, which is a big help in sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy animals to sell for her business

loans.name: Modesta Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Modesta de 48 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad de Granada, casada, madre de tres hijos. Ella es dueña de una pulpería la cual tiene en su casa de habitación, este negocio lo inicio hace 10 años  y que la ha servido de mucho pues obtiene sus ingresos de manera independiente y ayuda a sus hijos con sus estudios.
Ella realizo el crédito para compra de granos básicos, aceite, azúcar, salsas, sopas, productos de limpieza, verduras, frutas, jugos, gaseosas, pan, huevo , leche, avenas. Pues son productos que le demandan sus clientes y de los cuales ella necesita estar abastecida para mejorar sus ingresos. En lo próximo quiere invertir en compra de nuevos productos para vender en la pulpería, comprar estantes y vitrinas para exhibir sus productos.
texts.en:
Modesta is 48 years old and lives in the city of Granada. She is married and has three children. She is the owner of a small store, which is located in her home. She started this business 10 years ago. It has helped her a lot because it gives her a source of her own income and has allowed her to help pay for her children's schooling. 

She has requested a loan to buy basic grains, cooking oil, sugar, sauces, soups, cleaning products, vegetables, fruits, juices, sodas, bread, eggs, milk and oatmeal. These are products that are in demand by her customers and which she needs to keep in stock in order to improve her income. With her next loan she wants to invest in buying new products to sell in the store, as well as shelves and cases to display her products.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, cooking oil, sugar, sauces, soups, cleaning products, vegetables, fruits, juices, sodas, bread, eggs, milk and oatmeal.

loans.name: Celestino

texts.en:
Celestino has been a rice grower for about 10 years now. He is involved in this kind of business because his parents had left him a hectare of rice field as inheritance. As tribute for his parents, he is ensuring good production from the farming business. His wife also raises hogs to fatten for future sale. They both work hard to meet the family's daily consumption needs. The couple has three children attending school. 

He is asking for a loan of P10,000 to buy fertilizers used in farming and to buy hog feeds for sustainability.

In the future, Celestino would like to achieve abundant harvests to save for his children's education. He is also hoping for stable income from the business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers used in farming and buy hog feeds for sustainability.

loans.name: Bibiana

texts.en:
Bibiana is 45 years old, married and has three children. She is married to a farmer named Johnny. Together, they plant and harvest rice to sell. They also hire laborers who help them do these farming activities. 

Bibiana is asking for a loan because she needs to sustain her crops with fertilizers and insecticides to maintain good crop production. She is asking for P10,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

In the future, Bibiana would like to keep making their farming business more profitable and continuosly finance the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming

loans.name: Danilo

texts.en:
Danilo is a proud farmer who lives at Manalo. Income from farming goes for meals and allowance for his child. His wife also helps him transplant rice seedling on their one-hectare rice field. 

As of now, he needs additional capital to buy herbicides and insecticides used in farming. He is asking for P10,000.

Hopefully, Danilo would increase his output to save funds to invest in a hog raising business.

loans.use: to buy herbicides and insecticides used in farming

loans.name: Tania Maria

texts.es:
Tania se desplazó desde su municipio natal con el ánimo de buscar mejores oportunidades económicas. Cuando llegó a la ciudad de Medellín comenzó trabajando en casas de familia y gracias a esto sostenía sus propios gastos. Posteriormente conoció al que sería su esposo y cuando tuvo su segundo hijo decidió independizarse para poder estar al cuidado de sus hijos. Debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes, Tania debía seguir trabajando, pero como tenía que estar al cuidado de su hijo no podía acceder a las ofertas de empleo que le ofrecían algunas personas. Como en su sector no había muchas tiendas generales, Tania decidió con unos ahorros montar una tienda general desde su casa y así generar ingresos para su hogar mientras puede estar al cuidado de sus hijos. Actualmente Tania se encuentra casada y es madre de 3 hijos, quienes son la motivación para esforzarse en su trabajo todos los días. Su tienda la ha ido surtiendo poco a poco con nuevos productos de la canasta familiar y todavía le falta surtir un poco más de productos de la canasta familiar. Es por esto que Tania busca que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para surtir su tienda con los productos que le hacen falta para ofrecer a sus clientes. 

Tania espera que sus ingresos aumenten para poder ofrecerles a sus 3 hijos una educación de mejor calidad que en la que pueden acceder actualmente. Además, Tania espera con que su negocio crezca y se consolide para poder cumplir su sueño de tener un minimercado.
texts.en:
Tania left the municipality she grew up in, in search of better economic opportunities. When she arrived in the city of Medellin she began working in family homes and thanks to this was able to pay for her own expenses. Later she met who would become her husband and when she had her second child she decided to start her own business so that she could also take care of her children. Due to the fact that the income her husband was making was not enough, Tania had to continue working, but because she needed to care for her children she was not able to accept job offers that were offered to her. In her area there were not many small general stores, Tania decided to open a small store out of her home using some savings she had accumulated, so that she could provide income for her household and take care of her children as well.      

Now Tania is married and has three children who are her motivation to put effort into her work every day. She has stocked her store with new staple goods products little by little, but still lacks stock in a few basic products. It is for this reason that she has sought out a loan that will allow her to buy staple products to stock her store with the products she lacks to offer her customers. 

Tania hopes that her income will increase so that she can offer her 3 children a higher quality education than she is able to give them right now. Also, Tania hopes that her business will grow so that she will be able to realize her dream of having a mini-market.

loans.use: to buy staple goods to stock her store with the products that she is lacking to offer her customers.

loans.name: Felisicimo

texts.en:
Felisicimo, 38, is a hardworking man who lives in Manalo. He has a rice farming business and fattens hogs as sources of income. Aside from managing these businesses, he also serves his community as a Barangay Councilor (the smallest unit of the community). He enjoys his business though the income from the business is not stable. 

He is now asking for a loan of 10,000 Philippines pesos to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides. He would like to make his crops more productive and increase his earnings. 

In the future, Felisicimo would like to make the family financially stable.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es:
Rosa es una persona que se ha caracterizado por tener un gran carisma y siempre tener un espíritu de lucha que le ha permitido salir adelante. Proveniente de una familia con muy bajos recursos económicos, Rosa es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos, a quienes su padre nunca les ha aportado económicamente para su sostenimiento. Rosa con el ánimo de generar ingresos para su familia, decidió montar hace aproximadamente 2 meses una tienda general donde ofrece productos de la canasta familiar. Con el ánimo de seguir montando su tienda, Rosa aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de estanterías, un refrigerador y productos de la canasta familiar para terminar de surtir su tienda.

Rosa espera que sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues de esta manera podrá generar mayores ingresos de los que generaba en una empresa donde trabaja mucho tiempo por muy poco dinero. Rosa sueña con que su tienda crezca y le permita generar ingresos con los cuales pueda ofrecerles a sus hijos mejor educación y una mejor calidad de vida, además, Rosa sueña con que su madre que tiene tan bajos recursos económicos también pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa is a person known for her charisma and her fighting spirit which has enabled her to get ahead in her life.  Rosa comes from a very poor family, and now she is a single mother responsible for 2 children.  Their father has never provided support for them.   With the objective of supporting her family, Rosa opened a small general store a few months ago.  She would like to grow this business and is requesting a loan to purchase a refrigerator and stock her store with familiar every day items.   Rosa hopes her income will grow considerably.  This would give her more money than she used to earn when she worked at a company for many years for very little pay.    Rosa's dream is that her small store will grow and the increase in income will enable her to provide a good education for her children, and a better quality of life.  She also hopes to help improve the quality of life for her mother, who is still very poor.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator for her small general store, as well as stock familiar every day items.  The income from this store enables Rosa to support her two children.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is a housekeeper and an entrepreneur living in Larion Bajo with her spouse and four children. Together, they have a blacksmith business, manufacturing knives of different sizes. They usually merchandise their output to establishments selling kitchen items. In this kind of business, they generate about 2,000 Philippines pesos (P) each month, which goes to meals and the allowances of her four children. 

She is asking for a loan of P20,000 to buy more metals used in the blacksmith business. She would like to improve her output so that she can meet the demand of the customers, who look for quality. She also pays the laborers who help them in the blacksmith business. 

In the future, Margie would like to save funds for the future expenses of the family and to increase her sales from the business.

loans.use: to buy more metals used in the blacksmith business.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en:
Teodora is a hog raiser in her village. She is very proud that the income generated from the business goes for meals for the family and the school expenses of her youngest child. She has four children; three of them are employed and sometimes help the youngest child financially. 

Teodora would like to ensure good growth of her hogs to sell them at a higher price and increase her earnings, too. She is asking for a loan of 15,000 Philippines pesos to buy feed, vitamins and medicines for the hogs' sustainability.

Teodora would like to make the business more profitable in order to save funds and invest in another business, like a small store.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and medicines for the hogs' sustainability.

loans.name: Saniata

texts.en:
Saniata is a 28-year-old mother who is engaged in direct selling of AVON products in her village to generate income. She has two children. 

Due to the high cost of basic commodities, Saniata aims to improve her business to increase her income. She wants to ask for additional capital of 30,000 Philippines pesos to buy lotions, body sprays, underwear, roll-on and lipstick to sell in her village. She believes that through her patience and sacrifices, she will improve the business and make it a viable and profitable source of income.

loans.use: to buy lotions, body sprays, underwear, roll-on and lipstick to sell.

loans.name: Piedad Cecilia

texts.es:
Piedad es una persona que se ha encontrado con muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante le ha permitido superar las dificultades y continuar progresando en su vida. Desde hace aproximadamente 13 años, Piedad se dedica a la actividad del corte y cepillado del cabello, y debido a pocos recursos económicos no ha podido montar su propio salón de belleza, sino que su servicio lo ofrece a domicilio. Esto le ha traído muchas dificultades para poder obtener sus ingresos, pues ha sido muy difícil poder hacerse conocer por parte de sus clientes. Gracias a su buen servicio, Piedad ya ha podido captar una muy buena clientela y esto le ha permitido tener muy buenos ingresos. Con unos ahorros que tiene, y la ayuda de un préstamo, Piedad quiere montar su propio salón de belleza, es por esto que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de implementos de trabajo para su salón de belleza como un lava cabezas, sillas, cajones, entre otros, para montar su propio salón de belleza en un local fijo.

Piedad espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues así podrá ser más visible para las personas que quieran recibir sus servicios. Piedad sueña con terminar de montar su propio salón de belleza y que este se consolide por el buen servicio y en un futuro poder ampliarlo y generar empleo para las personas más vulnerables que como ella no tuvieron oportunidad de acceder a mayores recursos económicos para progresar.
texts.en: Piedad is a person who has encountered much adversity in her life, but her desire to work and improve her life have enabled her to overcome the difficulties and continue moving ahead.  From about the age of 13, Piedad has worked as a hair stylist.  Due to limited financial resources she's been unable to open her own salon, and has provided service for her clients in their homes.    This makes it difficult for her to increase her income, as it's hard to reach new clients.  But thanks to the good service she provides, Piedad has built up a good customer base which has helped increase her income.   With the savings she now has, and with the help of the loan she is requesting, Piedad is ready to open her own salon.  The loan will enable her to purchase the tools and supplies she needs such as sinks and chairs, as well as other items.   Piedad hopes that with a fixed location her income will increase considerably, as she'll be much more visible to new clients.  Piedad's dream is that her salon will grow with the good service she offers, and that she'll be able to expand and hire employees in the future.  She would like to hire people like herself, people who have limited financial resources, and give them a chance to better their lives as well.

loans.use: to purchase sinks, chairs and other supplies needed to open her own beauty salon.

loans.name: Simplicia

texts.en: Simplicia lives in the village of San Antonio in the province of Isabela. She is 60 years old. Simplicia has been growing crops for the last 15 years. She also grows different vegetables and is taking out this loan to purchase fertilizer. To have a better quality of living condition for her three adult-aged children.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizer and seedlings for her farming business

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es: María, 47 años de edad originaria  de granada tiene 3hijos . Inicio vendiendo platanito y luego vendió frutas y verduras actualmente tiene 35 años vendiendo vigoron  lo realiza sola y sale  a vender a los barrios aledaños cuenta con clientes fijos y se siente bien realizarlo donde ha venido trabajando. El préstamo lo solicita para reparar su vivienda,quiere comprar materiales de construccion  pues su casa es muy humilde y carece de muchas condiciones  para vivir ademas necesita darle una mejor apariencia y tener en mejores condiciones su cocina donde elabora su sabroso vigoron granadino. Es una mujer  que a venido luchando para preparar a sus hijas en carreras universitarias y en levantar su casa ya que primero no tenia donde vivir  y vivía con su mama actualmente le  compro a su suegro su deseo es  terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
María is 47 year old and originally from Granada. She has 3 children.  She started off by selling bananas and later she sold fruits and vegetables.  Currently she has been selling vigoron [a traditional Nicaraguan dish with cassava and pork rinds] for 35 years and she does it by herself. She goes out to make her sales in the surrounding neighborhoods.  She has consistent customers and she feels good about her accomplishments where she has been working.  

She is requesting the loan to repair her home. She wants to buy construction materials since her house is very humble and is lacking many living conditions. She also needs to give it a better appearance and have better conditions in her kitchen where she prepares her delicious vigoron of Granada.  

She is a woman who has fought to prepare her children for university degrees and give her house a boost since at first she didn't have a place to live, and she lived with her mother. Currently she bought for her father-in-law.  Her wish is to finish constructing her house.

loans.use: to repair her house and buy construction materials.

loans.name: Duo Luz De Sol Comalapa Group

texts.es:
Duo Luz del Sol Comalapa.
Este grupo esta integrado por Ervin,de 33 años de edad el se dedica a la confeccion de trajes,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima ya que nececita mas capital para poder comprar,mercaderia al igual que la señora tambien se dedica a la misma actividad,por eso esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de trajes, agradece a kiva por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Duo Luz del Sol Comalapa. This group includes Ervin, who is 33 year old.  He makes a living tailoring clothes. He is requesting this loan for the purchase of raw materials since he needs more capital in order to be able to buy merchandise.  

The woman makes a living in the same business, and for this reason she is requesting this loan to buy the raw materials for tailoring clothes.  She is grateful to Kiva for the help provided.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for tailoring.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es: Ana, originaria de Granada ,casada su esposo trabaja en Costa Rica, tiene 2 niñas de 18 y 5 años  de edad respectivamente la mayor  de sus hijas esta en la universidad.  Ana  inicio vendiendo ropa usada que su mama le envía de Estados Unidos para que ella se ayude lleva 5 años con este negocio además de eso se dedica a  la venta de artículos escolares tiene una mini librería  en  la cual invierte productos empezó a los 36 años de edad con 5 años de experiencia también le invirtió productos de mucha utilidad para las escuelas primaria cercanas en su vecindario. Su hermana le ayuda a vender en su casa, mientras ella se dedica a cobrar a sus clientes.Ella solicita el crédito para comprar artículos escolares como mochilas, cuadernos, lápices, lapiceros, libros, marcadores, borradores, uniformes escolares. Su meta es tener más grande el negocio de lbreria para que sea  auto sostenible y no estar dependiendo solo de créditos y poder brindar empleos a otras personas
texts.en:
Ana is originally from Granada. She is married and her husband works in Costa Rica. She has 2 daughters, 18 and 5 years old, and the older daughter attends university. 

Ana began selling used clothing that her mother sent her from the United States so that she could help. She has had this business for 5 years, and in addition she sells school supplies. She has a mini bookstore in which she invests products. She began it at 36 years old with 5 years of experience. She also invests in very useful products for the nearby primary schools in her neighborhood. Her sister helps her to sell in her house while Ana takes care of charging customers. 

She is requesting this loan to purchase school supplies such as backpacks, notebooks, pencils, pens, books, highlighters, erasers, and school uniforms. Her goal is to have a bigger bookstore business that can be self-sustaining and not depend solely on loans, and that will be able to provide work for other people.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies such as backpacks, notebooks, pencils, pens, books, highlighters, erasers, and school uniforms.

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia has been operating her retail store for four years and she is glad because her business is improving and growing. She is able to earn about PHP 8,000 a month and uses her profit to pay for her family's electric bills and daily needs. 

Cresencia has suffered difficulties in her business due to much unpaid credit from her customers. She is requesting a loan of PHP 12,000 to allow her to buy groceries such as soft drinks, assorted biscuits, eggs, cooking oil, baked breads and other items for her retail shop business. She hopes to obtain this loan so that she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy groceries for her retail shop business

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina, aged 40, is a married woman with two adult children. She lives in the province of Isabela. She is a hard worker and owns a mini-grocery located in front of their house. When she started her business, it was a small store but it has grown and improved. Her mini-grocery is completely stocked. Her customers come to buy all types of products and different groceries such as sugar, rice, noodles and other items that sell well. This helps her to continue improving and reinvesting in her business. 

On this occasion, her loan will be used to buy snack foods, drinks and spices that have been requested by her customers so that her business will be complete. She will also expand her business premises to make it larger and more comfortable for her customers. She is hoping that her business will improve in the future so that her family can enjoy a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy snack foods, drinks and spices for her retail business

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en: Olivia is engaged in buying and selling vegetables in the village of Palutan. She is married and takes care of  her children. She has been selling fruits and vegetables for five years. The income she makes from her sales is used to pay school fees and utility bills. Her loan will be used to buy more vegetables to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to provide a meaningful education for her children.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables for her business

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en: Evelyn is 44 years old, married to a carpenter and lives in Isabela. She has three children. For two years, Evelyn has owned a sari-sari store (mini variety store) located in front of their house. Evelyn believes that she needs to work hard and well, and be patient in all aspects of life. She is asking for a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy snack foods, drinks, spices and noodles for her mini store. She hopes that her store will expand so that her family can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy snack foods, drinks, spices and noodles for her store business

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is a hard-working mother who is engaged in a food vending business. Because she provides basic commodities, Geraldine aims to improve her small business to satisfy her children's basic necessities. 

She cooks and sells different kinds of food in their village, but her capital is not sufficient to acquire the needed ingredients to cook. Therefore, she is asking for additional capital of PHP 20,000 to buy raw ingredients for her food vending business, such as vegetables, chicken meat and pork, to cook and sell in their village.

She mentioned that this loan will help a lot to make the business grow as she continues to work and strive harder.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Silvestre

texts.en:
Silvestre, aged 52, is married and has six children. His goal is to improve his hog-raising business to support his family. He has been in this business for almost two years. He received profits of PHP 15,000 for two hogs last month. Despite the hardships and difficulties of life, he has the strong determination to uplift their standard of living.

He intends to raise more pigs to increase his income. He is asking for a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines for his hog-raising business. He believes that this loan will contribute a lot to make the business grow and become a viable source of income.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines for his hog-raising business

loans.name: Viviana

texts.en: Viviana is 40 years old and has been engaged in her sari-sari (variety) store for five years. She is from the village of Calaocan. She is married and has three school-aged children. Viviana wants to improve her business, thus she is taking out this loan of PHP 40,000 to purchase grocery items such as canned goods, noodles, bread, curls (chips) and other basic ingredients to sell. She hopes that she can get the amount she requested to further develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items such as canned goods, noodles, bread, curls (chips) and other basic ingredients to sell

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a certified hog-raiser in the village of Calaocan, Angadanan. She is 27 years old and is married with three children. Elena is a hard-working mother who is willing to work hard every day to lift her family from poor living standards.

Elena is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase feed and vaccines for the maintenance of her hogs.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vaccines for the maintenance of her hogs.

loans.name: Philbert

texts.en:
Philbert is 27 years old and is married with one child who is two years old. He owns a boutique business selling food and drinks such as: Fanta, water, juice, rice, beans, potatoes, meat, etc. He has been working in this business for six years and he works from 7 am until 9 pm every day. Philbert currently employs two people to help him. 

Philbert has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase Fanta, water, juice, rice, beans, potatoes, meat, etc to sell. With any profits, he will be able to pay his children's school fees and to renovate his own house.

loans.use: To purchase more food and drinks to sell.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is 27 years old and is single. He sells soft drinks in his boutique business. Emmanuel works from 6am until 7pm every day and has six years' experience in this business.

Emmanuel has requested a loan from Kiva lender, Vision Finance Company, in order to expand his business by buying more soft drinks to sell. With profit from the loan, Emmanuel will reinvest in his business and pay medical insurance.

loans.use: To purchase more soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Gaudence

texts.en:
Gaudence is 47 years old and is married with six children aged between 10 and 20. Her business is well-organized. She sells various goods such as cooking oil, rice, salt, etc. She works from 7am until 5pm every day except on Saturday. Gaudence has 15 years of experience in this business and she currently employs one person to help her. 

Gaudence has requested a loan from Kiva partner, Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase various goods such as cooking oil, rice, salt, etc. to sell. With any profit from the loan, Gaudence will be able to reinvest in her business and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase various goods such as cooking oil, rice, salt, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Jean De Dieu

texts.en:
Jean is 27 years old and is single. He owns a business selling various goods such as salt, cooking oil, flour, etc. He has operated this business for seven years and he works from 7 am until 6 pm every day. He currently employs two people to help him. 

Jean has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various goods such as salt, cooking oil, flour, etc. to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and renovate his own house.

loans.use: To purchase various goods such as: salt, cooking oil, flour, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Damien

texts.en:
Damien is 29 years old and is married with two children aged two and five. He owns a business selling various goods such as African clothes, cooking oil, powder, etc. This is his ninth year in this business and he works from 7 am until 7 pm every day. He currently employs two people to help him. 

Damien has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various goods such as African clothes, cooking oil, powder, etc. to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase African clothes, cooking oil, powder, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Anathalie

texts.en:
Anathalie is 37 years old and is married with six children aged between 6 and 19. She owns a restaurant business selling food and drinks such as Fanta, water, juice, rice, beans, potatoes, meat, etc. This is her fifth year in this business and she works from 7 am until 9 pm every day except on Sunday. Anathalie currently employs three people to help her.

Anathalie has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase new equipment like chairs, kitchenware, etc. to use in her restaurant. With any profits, she will be able to pay her children's school fees and renovate her own house.

loans.use: To purchase new equipment like chairs, kitchenware, etc. to use in her restaurant.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida is a small entrepreneur selling eggs to the people in the village where they live. She cooks salted eggs and balut (fertilized duck egg with a nearly-developed embryo inside that is boiled and eaten in the shell). This serves as her alternative source of income. Her spouse works as a construction worker. They have seven children, five of whom attend school.  

She is now asking for a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy more eggs to cook and sell. She hopes this loan will be given to her to help improve her sales. She promises to repay her loan on time. 

With the family's hard work and perseverance, she hopes to achieve a better quality of life someday.

loans.use: to buy more eggs to cook and sell

loans.name: Ambrocio

texts.en:
Ambrocio has been working for 16 years in the hog-raising business. He has been fattening pigs and has a sow for breeding. Ambrocio always see to it that his piggery house is clean for safety and is comfortable for his pigs. 

Ambrocio is 40 years old, is married and has three children. His children are all at the high school level of education. He is managing his hog-raising business well so he can send his children through school until college.

With the high cost of pig feed at present, Ambrocio is asking for a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy feed for the maintenance of his hogs. He hopes to succeed in his business, to earn a higher income and to save some of it for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy feed for the maintenance of his hogs.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Nowadays, all market vendors are increasing their prices for all commodity items.  Household expenses like electric bills and school fees are also increasing. Hence, Jose and his wife are teaching their children to be thrifty. 

Jose and his wife are engaged in a furniture-making business. Their income from the business was not enough to sustain their three children's school needs at the high school and college level of education. Since Jose is aware of his children's future, he has also engaged himself in the hog-raising business. He is doing this to meet his children's needs.

Jose wanted to borrow additional working capital of PHP 35,000 to buy feed for the maintenance of his hogs. He is looking forward to the growth of his business and to able to provide a better future for his family.

loans.use: to buy feed for the maintenance of his hogs.

loans.name: Lope

texts.en:
Lope is a farmer working in the Philippines. He is also engaged in the hog-raising business which provides an additional source of income for the family. At the age of 57, Lope can still manage both of his businesses because he wants to attain his goal in life of uplifting their living standards out of poverty.

Through farming and his hog-raising business, Lope is able to meet the needs of his wife and his four children. He has been sending his children to school and some of them have finished college.
 
With regards to his hog-raising business, Lope wants to maintain and develop it for his future and for his wife since he is getting older. Lope is requesting a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy feed for the maintenance of his hogs. He hopes to maintain and develop the business as he continues his life journey.

loans.use: to buy feed for the maintenance of his hogs.

loans.name: Otoniel

texts.es:
Otoniel abandonó su municipio natal hace aproximadamente 13 años con el ánimo de buscar mejores oportunidades de empleo y progresar económicamente junto a su hija, a quien debe garantizarle todas las necesidades satisfechas pues su madre los abandonó hace un tiempo. Otoniel se radicó en la ciudad de Medellín donde montó un puesto de venta de frutas donde ofrece las frutas enteras o preparadas y de esta manera genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece, y a la buena calidad de sus productos, Otoniel ha podido captar un gran número de clientes lo que le permite tener en ocasiones muy buenas ventas. Debido a que en los últimos meses ha tenido muy buenas ventas, su negocio ha disminuido el inventario, es por esto que Otoniel aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de frutas para poder ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad de productos. 

Otoniel espera que sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente y de esta manera pueda ofrecerle a su hija una mejor calidad de vida y una mejor educación. Otoniel sueña con que su negocio crezca y pueda expandirse hacia otros sectores y de esta manera pueda generar empleo para las personas que más necesitan de unos ingresos.
texts.en:
Otoniel left his birthplace approximately 13 years ago to seek better employment opportunities and improve his economic situation.  He takes care of his daughter and must guarantee all her needs are met ever since her mother left them some time ago.  Otoniel established himself in the city of Medellín where he set up a fruit stand, offering whole and sliced fruit in order to generate an income to support his household.  Because of his attentiveness and the quality of his products, Otoniel has been able to gain many customers which means sales are good on many occasions.  And since sales have been high over the last few months his inventory has decreased, so Otoniel is requesting a loan to to buy more variety of fruit for his customers.

Otoniel is hoping to increase his income considerably so he can give his daughter a better lifestyle and a good education.  His goal is to grow his business and diversify into other areas so he can generate employment for people who need an income.

loans.use: To buy a larger variety of fruit.

loans.name: C8027 Tuzamurane Group

texts.en:
Faustin is 26 years old, is married with one child who is one year old. Faustin is the leader of the group which is called "C8027 Tuzamurane" in the local language. He works from 8am until 6pm every day selling spare parts. 

Faustin has requested a loan from the Vision Finance Company, a Kiva partner, in order to increase his business by buying more spare parts to sell. He plans to reinvest his profits in his business and to save for the future.

loans.use: To purchase more spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Hugo Alberto

texts.es:
Hugo se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a las actividades de la mecánica, y esto le ha permitido poder desempeñar su actividad con mucha experticia. Hugo tiene su propio taller de mecánica donde repara autos desde hace aproximadamente 35 años, y gracias a la buena atención que ofrece y la buena calidad de su trabajo ha podido captar una gran cantidad de clientes. Hugo se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo. A su familia siempre le ha querido ofrecer una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que siempre se esfuerza en su taller con el ánimo de sacarlos adelante. Hugo, debido a que montó su taller desde hace bastante tiempo, tiene las herramientas de trabajo muy desgastadas, es por esto que busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de herramientas de trabajo para poder desempeñar su actividad con mucha más calidad.

Hugo espera poder mejorar sus herramientas de trabajo sin que sus ingresos mensuales se vean afectado, además, espera que su negocio le siga ofreciendo los ingresos necesarios para brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hugo has spent much of his life working as a mechanic, which has allowed him to gain much expertise.  He has his own vehicle repair shop where he has been in business for approximately 35 years.  Because of his good customer service and the quality of his work he has gained many customers.  He is married and has a son, and always has wanted to give his family a quality lifestyle by working hard in his shop in order to get ahead.

Hugo set up his shop some time ago, so his work tools are considerably worn out.  He is requesting a loan to buy new work tools to add quality to his business.

Hugo hopes to acquire the tools without affecting his monthly income, as he wants his business to continue offering the necessary services so he can provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy work tools to improve services.

loans.name: Cristian Camilo

texts.es:
Cristian es una persona que a pesar de su corta edad ya ha formado una familia la cual es la motivación para trabajar arduamente todos los días. Cristian se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo de 1 mes de nacido. Cristian gran parte de su vida se ha dedicado a la actividad de la herrería, pues su padre se desempeña en esta labor y le ha enseñado desde temprana edad a trabajarla. Cristian ahora tomó el trabajo de su padre quien ya se encuentra en una edad en la que le es difícil trabajar, por esto cuando sus ingresos se lo permiten, colabora con el sostenimiento de los gastos de sus padres. Con el ánimo de poder fabricar un pedido que le ha hecho un cliente suyo, Cristian debe comprar materia prima que requiere, sin embargo no cuenta con el capital disponible. Es por esto que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas como hierro, carbón y lámina para fabricar un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente.

Cristian espera que con estos ingresos pueda seguir ofreciéndole a su familia una buena calidad de vida, garantizarle a su hijo un buen crecimiento y ofrecerle a su esposa mejores oportunidades de progreso de las que ha tenido en la vida.
texts.en:
Cristian is a person who, in spite of his young age, has formed his own family who are his motivation to work hard every day.  He is married and the father of a one-month-old son.  Cristian has spent much of his life working as a blacksmith as his father works in this trade and taught it to him at an early age.  He has now taken over his father's work his father is at an age where it is difficult for him to work.  For this reason, whenever he is able, he helps to support his parents with their expenses.  With the aim of filling an order that he has received from a customer, Cristian needs to buy raw materials.  However, he does not have enough capital available.  For this reason, he is hoping to take out a loan which will allow him to purchase raw materials such as iron, coal and sheets of metal.

Cristian hopes that the income he makes will enable him to continue offering his family a good quality of life, guarantee his son a good upbringing and offer his wife better opportunities for making progress than those he has had in life.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as iron, coal and sheets of metal so that he can fill a large order from a customer

loans.name: C9370 Twiyubake Group

texts.en:
Marline is 46 years old, married and has six children between the ages of six and sixteen years old. 

Marline operates a general store, selling goods, such as rice, sugar, Irish potatoes, soap and cooking oil. She employs one person to help her and works from 7am until 6pm every day. She is the president of this borrowing team, which is called "C9370 Twiyubake" in the local language. 

Marline has requested a loan from Kiva partner Vision Finance Company, in order to expand her business by buying more goods, such as rice, sugar, Irish potatoes, soap and cooking oil to sell. With her profits, Marline will be able to reinvest in her business and to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more goods, such as rice, sugar, soap and cooking oil to sell in a general store.

loans.name: Ara

texts.en:
Ara is 31 years old. He lives with his wife and parents. 

The main source of income for the family for the past ten years has been agriculture: land cultivation and cattle breeding. 

Ara needs some financial means to invest in his farm. With the requested loan, he plans to purchase forage for the cattle and fertilizer for cultivation of the land. 

This will allow Ara to keep his income stable and save for the further development of agriculture.

loans.use: to pay for forage and fertilizer

loans.name: Laura

texts.en:
Laura lives with her husband and two children. 

She has been engaged in agriculture for 15 years. Now Laura wants to expand her farm. She has applied for this loan to purchase cattle and forage. 

Laura hopes she will earn more income, which she will invest in her children's education in the future.

loans.use: to pay for cattle and forage

loans.name: Eligio De Jesus

texts.es:
Eligio es una persona que se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al trabajo, pues desde muy temprana edad inició a trabajar con el ánimo de contribuir en su hogar con los ingresos para el sostenimiento de los gastos. Eligio se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo a quien siempre le ha querido ofrecer el acceso a una educación de calidad. Eligio se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 2 años a la preparación y venta de comidas. Su negocio esta ubicado al borde de la carretera donde pasan gran cantidad de viajantes, y esto le permite tener una muy buena clientela. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus comidas y al buen servicio que ofrece, Eligio es reconocido en su región y esto le ha permitido tener una gran cantidad de clientes fijos. Con el ánimo de hacer más atractivo el negocio para sus clientes, Eligio quiere arreglar el piso del negocio, sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital para realizar esta reforma. Es por esto que Eligio busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a realizar reformas al piso de su negocio pudiéndolo acondicionar de mejor forma para sus clientes. 

Eligio espera poder realizar estas reformas sin que sus ingresos mensuales se vean afectados. Además, espera que su negocio de esta manera sea más atractivo para sus clientes y siga generando buenas ventas. Eligio sueña con que su familia pueda tener una mejor calidad de vida y su hijo pueda tener acceso a una educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Eligio is someone who has dedicated a large part of his life to work, having begun at a very young age with the intention of making a contribution to his home by helping to pay the bills from his earnings. Eligio is married and he has one son to whom he has always provided access to quality education.

For approximately two years Eligio has worked preparing and selling food. His business is located at the side of a road that is used by a large number of travelers and this affords him a good customer base. Thanks to the quality of his meals and the good service he provides, Eligio is well known in the area and this means he has many regular customers. 

With the objective of making his business more attractive to his customers, Eligio wants to repair the floor of his business premises. However he cannot afford to carry out this change. Therefore Eligio is requesting  loan that would allow him to make the changes to the floor, thus improving the condition of his business for his customers.

Eligio hopes to be able to carry out these changes with affecting his monthly income. He also hopes that this will make his business more attractive to his customers and that he will continue to generate good sales. Eligio dreams that his family will have a better quality of life and that his son will have access to a quality education.

loans.use: to make the changes to the floor of his business premises, thus improving the condition for his customers.

loans.name: Anushik

texts.en:
Anushik lives with her husband. 

They are both engaged in beekeeping. Anushik would like to increase the number of beehives they have, for which she needs financial investments. 

With the help of this loan, Anushik will purchase more beehives. She will gather more honey and get additional income from its sales.

loans.use: to pay for beehives

loans.name: C9256 Ubumwe Kanombe Group

texts.en:
Assia is 33 years old and married.  

She sells beans, rice, sugar and soap, etc. Her business is well organized, she employes three people to help her and works from 10am until 5pm every day. She has five years experience. 

She is the president of this group, which is called "C9256 Ubumwe kanombe" and is in the middle in this photo. 

Assia has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance company, in order to purchase more beans, rice, sugar and soap to sell. With this profit, Assia will be able to save money for her future.

loans.use: To purchase greater quantities of goods, such as beans, rice, sugar and soap.

loans.name: Gildardo Alonso

texts.es:
Gildardo es una persona que ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de salir adelante y sus fuerzas para trabajar le han permitido superar las dificultades y continuar progresando junto a su familia. Gildardo es una persona casada y es padre de 2 hijos, quienes son su motivación para esforzarse diariamente en la búsqueda de los ingresos para su hogar. Gildardo hace poco se quedó sin trabajo, por lo que está buscando donde poder emplearse y generar los ingresos para su hogar. Gracias a que una amiga le está enseñando a preparar comidas rápidas, y un amigo le prestará un espacio a las afueras de su negocio, Gildardo busca un préstamo que le permita comprar un carro de comidas rápidas para dedicarse a este negocio y poder así generar los ingresos para su familia. 

Gildardo espera que este negocio le genere los ingresos necesarios, y gracias a que su amiga le esta enseñando ya tiene muy buena experiencia para la preparación de las comidas. Gildardo sueña con poder lograr que su negocio crezca y pueda montar en un futuro un buen restaurante y poder emplear a más personas.
texts.en:
Gildardo has encountered many adversities in his life but is still intent on getting ahead.  His work efforts have allowed him to overcome difficulties and provide for his family.  He is married and has two children who are his motivation for struggling daily to earn money for the household.  Gildardo lost his job not too long ago so he is looking for a way to work and generate an income.  Thanks to a friend who taught him to prepare fast food, and another friend who will give him space to work outside his business, Gildardo is seeking a loan to buy a fast food cart so he can go into business and generate an income for his family.

Gildardo hopes the business will be profitable since, thanks to his friend, he has enough experience in food preparation.  He wants to expand his business in the future and open a good restaurant so he can hire more people.

loans.use: To buy a fast food cart to go into business.

loans.name: Cesar Julio

texts.es:
Cesar se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo a quien siempre le ha querido ofrecer el acceso a una buena educación. Cesar se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 12 años a la actividad de la panadería, cuando trabajaba en una empresa de esta actividad adquirió la experiencia para elaborar sus productos. Desde hace aproximadamente 2 años Cesar montó su propio negocio de panadería donde ofrece muy buenos productos a sus clientes. Con el ánimo de seguir aumentando la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes, Cesar busca un préstamo que le permita acceder a la compra de insumos para la preparación de panes y a la compra de una licuadora industrial que le permita ofrecer en su panadería productos de repostería. 

Cesar espera que de esta manera su negocio siga creciendo y pueda seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes mayor variedad de productos. Cesar espera que con esto sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente y de esta manera les pueda ofrecer a su esposa y a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progresar en la vida. Cesar sueña con tener una gran panadería que sea reconocida por las personas del sector y donde pueda generar empleo para una gran cantidad de personas que requieran de unos ingresos y no tengan oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Cesar is married and the father of one child to whom he has always wanted to offer access to a good education.  Cesar has been in the bakery business for approximately 12 years.  He gained experience in how to make his products when he used to work for a company in this field.  Approximately two years ago, he set up his own bakery business where he offers very good products to his customers.  With the aim of continuing to increase the variety of products he offers his customers, Cesar is looking to take out a loan which will allow him to buy the supplies he needs to prepare his bread and to buy an industrial blender which will allow him to offer confectionery products in his bakery.

Cesar hopes that this will enable him to continue growing his business and that he will be able to continue offering his customers a larger variety of products.  He hopes that his income will increase significantly so that he can offer his wife and child a better quality of life and more opportunities to make progress.  Cesar dreams of having a large bakery which is well known in his area and being able to create work for a large number of people who need income but don't have any work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making bread and to buy an industrial blender which will allow him to offer confectionery products in his bakery

loans.name: Maria Angelica

texts.es:
La señora Maria Angelica es soltera, tiene 29 años de edad, cursó el sexto año de educacion primaria, se dedica al bordado de blusas, trabaja que inició con el apoyo de un familiar y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia.

solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para pagar la reparación de un vehículo que tiene, ya que es muy necesario para hacer sus compras y ventas del negocio de bordados de blusas que tiene, quiere que su negocio siga generando mas ganancias.
texts.en:
Señora Maria Angelica is single and she is 29 years old. She completed her sixth year of primary education. She embroiders blouses for a living. She started doing this job with the help of a family member and so far she has three years experience.

She is requesting a loan that she will use to pay for repairs to a vehicle she has, as this is a necessary part of making the purchases and sales for her blouse embroidery business. She wants her business to continue making more profits.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her car

loans.name: Zarine

texts.en:
Zarine is 32 years old. She lives in Sisian with her husband, son and mother-in-law. 

Zarine cultivates potato and corn on her land. She also keeps a greenhouse. Zarine needs to repair the greenhouse, as current conditions are not favorable for a good harvest. 

Besides this, she wants to purchase seeds to cultivate the land and fuel for agricultural practices. With the help of this loan, Zarine plans to increase her income by 40%, which is important for her to ensure the improved living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to pay for seeds, fuel and greenhouse renovation

loans.name: C5693 Mfashakwifasha Group

texts.en:
Josee is 27 years old. She is married and has one child, who is two years old. 

Her business is well-organized. She sells sacks of charcoal and works from 6am until 6pm every day. Josee is the team leader of this group, which is called "C5693 Mfashakwifasha" in the local language. She is the first person on the righthand side. 

Josee has requested a loan from Kiva lender Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell. With this profit, she will pay her children's school fees, renovate her house and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Flor Alba

texts.es:
Flor es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y dedicada al bienestar de su familia. Flor se encuentra casada y es madre de 4 hijos, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer todo lo que necesitan. Flor se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a las actividades agropecuarias, pero siempre lo había hecho trabajando para empresas. Hace aproximadamente 3 años Flor decidió independizarse y montar su propio cultivo de legumbres. Gracias a esto Flor genera ingresos con los cuales contribuye junto con su esposo al sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Flor, con el ánimo de sacar sus cultivos adelante, busca un préstamo que le permita acceder a la compra de riegos y abonos para sus cultivos. 

Flor espera poder sacar adelante sus cultivos y poder así generar más ingresos para su familia, además, espera poder obsequiarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y una buena educación. Flor sueña con que su cultivo crezca y pueda convertirse en una gran comercializadora de legumbres, en la cual pueda generar mucho empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Flor is known for being a very hard worker and dedicated to her family's well-being.  She is married and the mother of four children for whom she has always tried to provide the best she could.  Flor has spent much of her life involved in agriculture, but always working for companies.  Approximately three years ago she decided to become independent and set up her own vegetable growing business.  This has allowed her to generate an income to help her husband cover household expenses.  In order to grow her crops successfully, Flor is seeking a loan to pay for irrigation and fertilizer.

Through her crops, Flor is hoping to generate more income for her family and also give her children a better lifestyle and a good education.  Flor's goal is to see her crop business grow so she can become a large vegetable merchant and generate employment for those who need it most.

loans.use: To pay for irrigation and fertilizer for crops.

loans.name: Everilda Azucel

texts.es:
La señora Everilda Azucel es casada, tiene 30 años de edad, cursó sus estudios de educación básica, tiene 2 hijos 1 de los cuales estudian, se dedica a la artesanía, al tejido de cortes típicos, inicio este negocio siendo operaria, y hasta ahora lleva 2 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien la apoya económicamente.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferente clases y colores para mejora su producción de cortes típicos, espera en el futuro tener una negocio grande.
texts.en:
Everilda Azucel is 30 years old and married.  She completed her primary education and has two children, one of whom is in school.  Everilda works making handicrafts.  She weaves traditional clothing.  She started out in this business as a worker and now has two years experience.  She has the support of her husband who supports her financially.

Everilda is requesting a loan to buy different type of threads in different colors so that she can improve her production of traditional clothing.  She hopes, in the future, to have a large business.

loans.use: to buy threads for her weaving

loans.name: Odilio Santiago

texts.es:
El señor Odilio Santiago es casado, tiene  34 años de edad, esta graduado de bachiller en mecánica automotriz, tiene 3 hijos los cuales estan estudiando, se dedica a la reparación y mantenimiento de vehículos, inicio este trabajo como operario y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien tiene un comedor, donde venden comida 3 veces al día.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de repuestos y tenerlos listo, cada vez que sus clientes lo necesiten, espera mejorar su negocio y tener trabajadores.
texts.en:
Señor Odilio Santiago is married, he is 34 years old and he is a graduate of automotive mechanics. He has three children who are all students. He repairs and services vehicles for a living. He began this job as an operator and he has three years experience so far. He relies on the support of his wife, who has a cafeteria where they sell food three times a day.

He is requesting a loan that he will use to buy spare parts in order to have them ready each time his customers need them. He hopes to improve his business and hire staff.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for vehicles.

loans.name: Juan Pedro

texts.es:
El señor Juan Pedro es casado, tiene 49 años de edad, cursó los estudios de educación primaria, tiene 8 hijos 5 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inicio este negocio gracias apoyo de sus padres y hasta el momento lleva 20 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferentes clases y colores, espera tener en el futuro un  negocio amplio, y mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Juan Pedro is 49 years old and married.  He completed his 'educación primaria' (education for children aged 7-14).  Juan Pedro has eight children, five of whom are in school.  His business is weaving traditional clothing.  He started this business thanks to the support of his parents and he now has 20 years experience.

Juan Pedro is requesting a loan to buy different types of thread in different colors.  He hopes to have a large business in the future and to improve his profits.

loans.use: to buy threads for his weaving

loans.name: C9369 Abishyizehamwe Group

texts.en:
Immaculee is 48 years old and is married with four children between the ages of four and six years old. 

She sells spare parts. Her business is well organized. She employs one person to help her and works from 6am until 6pm every day. Immaculee has three years of experience in this business. She is the president of this group which is called "C9369 Abishyizehamwe" in the local language. 

Immaculee has requested a loan from Kiva lender, Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more spare parts to sell. With the profit from the loan, Immaculee will renovate her house and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more spare parts to sell.

loans.name: C8044  Ubumwe Group

texts.en:
Geoffre is 27 years old and married with two children aged two and four years old. 

His business is well organized. In his small shop, he sells different goods including juice, rice, soap, salt, sugar and Irish potatoes, etc. He works from 7am until 8pm every day. Geoffre employes one person to help him and they have three years experience. 

Geoffre is the president of this group, which is called "C8044  Ubumwe" in the local language. In the photo, he is the first person from the right. 

Geoffre has requested a loan from Kiva lenders through Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase rice, soap, salt and sugar, etc to sell. With the profits from the loan, he will be able to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase more goods, such as rice, soap, sugar, Irish potatoes and beans to sell.

loans.name: C8056 Twivanemubukene Group

texts.en:
Viviane is 35 years old and married with five children between the ages of two and twelve years old. 

She sells sacks of charcoal and her business is open from 8 am until 6 pm every day. She currently employs two people to help her. 

Viviane is the leader of the group, which is called "C8056 Twivanemubukene" in the local language. In the photo, she is the person on the left side. She has a year's worth of experience. 

Viviane has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell. With this profit, she will save money for her future, reinvest in her business and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Emilsen De Jesus

texts.es:
Emilsen es una persona que ha atravesado muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante le ha permitido superarlas y continuar su vida junto a sus hijos. Emilsen es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos debido a que el padre de sus hijos murió hace aproximadamente 3 años. Desde entonces, Emilsen es la que debe buscar todos los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar.
