Today he’s requesting to borrow 14,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer and seedlings for his farm. He notes that this will boost his productivity, and therefore his sales and revenue. In the future, he plans to open a shop.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings for his farm business.

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.en: Rogelio, 31, raises pigs as his primary source of income, working hard to provide for the needs of his family as he dreams of raising their standard of living. Now requesting a loan of P15,000 to buy feeds and vitamins for his hogs, he hopes these purchases will nourish and render them more fit so that they command higher prices at sale time.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for his hogs.

loans.name: Henry Norberto

texts.es:
Henry es un gran emprendedor que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y tener un gran carisma. Henry aprendió la actividad de la elaboración de artesanías hace aproximadamente 6 años, cuando unos artesanos visitaron su municipio y les pidió que le enseñaran la actividad. Posteriormente, unos indios también visitaron su municipio y estos le enseñaron otras técnicas más, lo que hizo que adquiriera el conocimiento necesario para la elaboración de las artesanías con una buena calidad. Henry con grandes esfuerzos consiguió algunas máquinas necesarias para la elaboración de sus artesanías y así empezó a generar sus propios ingresos gracias a que contactó con muy buenos clientes. Henry posteriormente dio la sugerencia de capacitar a los presos de su municipio, de modo que pudieran trabajar para el desde la cárcel, y de esta manera generó empleo para estas personas tan necesitadas. Henry actualmente tiene muy buenas ventas, hasta el punto que en ocasiones no tiene la capacidad de satisfacer todos los requerimientos de sus clientes. Henry, con el ánimo de aumentar su capacidad de producción, busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de maquinaria necesaria para la elaboración de sus artesanías.

Henry espera que su negocio siga generando buenos ingresos, con los cuales les pueda ofrecer a sus padres una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de salir adelante. Henry sueña con tener un gran negocio donde pueda generar más empleo para más personas necesitadas, y poder llegar en algún momento hasta exportar sus artesanías.
texts.en:
Henry is a great entrepreneur who is noted for being very hard-working and charming.  He learned how to make handicrafts approximately six years ago when some craftsmen visited his town and he asked them to teach him.  Some Indians then visited his town and they taught him some additional techniques.  In this way, he acquired the knowledge he needed to make good-quality handicrafts.  With a lot of hard work, he managed to acquire some machines that he needs for making his handicrafts and started making his own income because he contacted some good customers.  Henry suggested training prisoners in his town so that they could work for him from prison.  In this way, he provided jobs for these people whose need is so great.  Henry currently experiences very good sales, to such an extent that he sometimes doesn't have enough capacity to meet all of his customers' requirements.  With the aim of increasing his production capacity, Henry is looking to take out a loan which will enable him to buy the machinery he needs to make his handicrafts.

Henry hopes that his business will continue making good income so that he can offer his parents a better quality of life and have more opportunities for making progress.  Henry dreams of having a business which can create more jobs for those in need and he would like, at some point, to be able to start exporting his handicrafts.

loans.use: to buy machinery that he needs for making his handicrafts

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is 44 years old, and she has been running her general store for three years. She is married with three children. Her husband works as a farmer in the village of Guam, San guillermo. She is able to earn about P3,000 a month and uses her profit to pay for her family's electric bills and daily needs. 

Nelly is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase grocery items such as canned goods, noodles, curls, soft drinks and other basic kitchen ingredients for her sari-sari store. She hopes to obtain this loan so that she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items such as canned goods, noodles, curls, soft drinks and other basic kitchen ingredients for her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Majeedan's Group

texts.en:
Majeedan is the mother of four sons and a daughter. Her two eldest sons are laborers, while the others remain at home. Due to financial constraints, she couldn’t provide them with educational opportunities.

Majeedan has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah to buy a buffalo for her husband’s livestock business, a purchase that will enable him to produce a larger quantity of milk to sell. He has been operating his business for the past many years, and his clients are very happy with him because he always provides them with good quality milk. Majeedan is hopeful that through this loan, he will be able to earn more profits from his business.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Majeedan.

loans.use: to buy a buffalo for the livestock business.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
Humberto ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de salir adelante le han permitido superarlas y continuar al lado de su esposa y su hija de 6 años. Humberto trabaja como cerrajero, y se ha dedicado a esta actividad gran parte de su vida. Además, cuando su trabajo como cerrajero se encuentra con pocas posibilidades de empleo, trabaja como oficial de construcción o en otras actividades que resulten. Humberto hace un tiempo, fue robado y perdió sus herramientas de trabajo, lo que hizo que se le dificultara enormemente la consecución de trabajo. Sin embargo, con el objetivo de seguir generando los ingresos para su hogar, Humberto alquila la herramienta que necesita para poder llevar a cabo su trabajo, y de esta manera genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Con el ánimo de no tener que pagar más el alquiler de las herramientas de trabajo, Humberto aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de herramientas de trabajo para llevar a cabo su actividad de cerrajería y reponer las herramientas que le fueron robadas. 

Humberto espera que de esta manera pueda generar mayores ingresos para su hogar, pues será más fácil la consecución de trabajos ya que sus clientes podrán confiar en la entrega oportuna de sus pedidos. Además, Humberto espera que de esta manera pueda ofrecerles a su esposa y su hija de 6 años una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Humberto has experienced a lot of difficulties in his life but his desire to make progress has allowed him to overcome them and continue surviving alongside his wife and his 6-year-old daughter.  Humberto works as a locksmith and he has been working in this business for most of his life.  When there aren't many jobs for him as a locksmith, he works as a [skilled] construction worker or on other jobs that come up.  Humbero suffered a robbery a while back and he lost all his work tools.  This has made it extremely difficult for him to carry out his work.  With the aim of continuing to make income, he has been renting the tools he needs so that he can continue working and supporting his household.  As he does not want to have to continue paying to rent his work tools, Humberto is looking to take out a loan which will enable him to buy new tools to replace the stolen ones so that he can work in his business.

Humberto hopes, in this way, to be able to make more income for his household.  It will be easier for him to carry out his work because his customers will be able to trust that he will complete his work on time.  He hopes that he will be able to offer his wife and 6-year-old daughter a better quality of life and enjoy more opportunities for making progress.

loans.use: to buy work tools for his business to replace some which were stolen

loans.name: Clemente

texts.en:
It is hard to be the head of the family, but it is harder for Clemente that he is the head of their village. Clemente is 48 years old, married, and has four children, whom he is sending to school. His wife is a housekeeper. 

Clemente is a farmer. He plants and harvests rice in his field, which he considers as his business. His earnings from the business usually went for his children’s education and expenses in their household. To sustain his farm needs, Clemente borrows loans from the traders to whom he sells his products.

Clemente wants to borrow a loan amounting to PHP 25,000 to buy fertilizers, herbicides, and insecticides for farm needs. The loan will be a big help for him to stop getting farm needs from the traders, which have a high interest rate.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides, and insecticides for farm needs.

loans.name: Enilsa Elena

texts.es:
Enilsa se ha dedicado a la actividad de la carnicería gran parte de su vida, pues desde temprana edad comenzó a trabajar como empleada en carnicerías de su municipio. Enilsa se encuentra casada y es madre de 3 hijos, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena calidad de vida. Enilsa, junto con su esposo, decidieron independizarse y montar su propia carnicería, y desde entonces, generan sus ingresos desde su propio negocio y con esto han podido sacar adelante sus hijos. Debido al poco capital con el que cuentan, la consecución de la carne para la venta ha sido muy difícil en los últimos meses, pues a esto se le suma que el precio del ganado y del cerdo ha aumentado considerablemente. Con el ánimo de poder surtir su carnicería con carne de ganado y de cerdo, Enilsa aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de carnes de res y de cerdo para surtir su negocio. 

Enilsa espera que de esta manera su negocio pueda surtirse de carnes sin que sus ingresos mensuales se vean afectados. Además, Enilsa espera que su negocio aumente las ventas, pues tendrá más productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, y de esta manera también podrá ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Enilsa has devoted much of her life to butcher shop activities, because at an early age she began working as a clerk in local butcher shops. Enilsa is married and the mother of three children, to whom she always wanted to offer a good quality of living.

Enilsa, along with her husband, decided to become independent and start their own butcher shop. Since then they generated income from their own business and with this have been able to move forward with their children. Because of their limited working capital, procuring meat for sale has been very difficult in recent months, as the price of cattle and pigs has increased considerably.

Striving to supply her butcher shop with beef and pork, Enilsa is hoping that a loan will enable her to purchase the beef and pork needed for her business.

Enilsa hopes that her business can stock up on meat without affecting her monthly income. Additionally, Enilsa expects her business to increase sales, as more products will become available to her customers. She will then be able to offer her children a better life and greater opportunities for advancement.

loans.use: Purchase beef and pork for her business

loans.name: Javier De Jesus

texts.es:
Javier es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora para salir adelante, lo que le ha permitido superar las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida. Javier se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 30 años a la tapicería de vehículos y muebles, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar, donde convive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, Javier es muy reconocido entre los habitantes de su municipio, lo que le ha permitido generar muy buenas ventas para su negocio. Debido a que su maquinaria ya tiene mucho tiempo de uso, Javier quiere renovarla para poder ejercer su actividad con una mejor calidad, sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para la compra de esta maquinaria. Es por esto que Javier aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de maquinaria para la tapicería de vehículos y muebles, y esto le permite ejercer su actividad con una mejor calidad.

Javier espera que de esta manera pueda renovar su maquinaria sin que sus ingresos mensuales se vean afectados, y de esta manera pueda seguir garantizando el sustento necesario para su familia. Javier sueña con poder ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa y sus hijos, y de esta manera pueda tengan mejores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Javier is a very hard-working and tenacious person who strives to make progress in life.  As a result, he has been able to overcome the difficulties he has faced.  Javier has been upholstering vehicles and furniture for approximately 30 years and this business makes him the income he needs to support his household.  Javier lives with his wife and two children.  Thanks to the good quality of his work, Javier is very well known among the people who live in his town.  This means that he experiences very good sales.  Owing to the fact that he has been using his equipment for a long time, he would like to replace it so that he can provide better-quality work.  As he does not have enough capital to buy this equipment, Javier is looking to take out a loan which will allow him to buy it.  This will enable him to produce better-quality work.

Javier hopes, in this way, to renew his equipment without affecting his monthly income so that he can continue providing for his for his family.  Javier dreams of being able to offer his wife and children a better quality of life and hopes to enjoy better opportunities for making progress.

loans.use: to buy equipment for upholstering vehicles and furniture

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza and her husband aim to improve their living conditions and send his youngest son to a higher level of education. She and her husband have patiently run their store for two years and her transportation business for thirteen years.

Analiza would like to ask for a loan amounting to PHP 15,000, allowing her to buy merchandise for her store and use some of the amount for repair and maintenance of her jeepney (a small bus). She believes that through the loan amount requested, she could continuously use her jeepney in transporting her passengers and could also improve her store. 

Analiza is hoping that she will be able to increase her income and provide her family a better way of living.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store and to use some of the amount for repair and maintenance of her jeepney.

loans.name: Rukhsana's Group

texts.en:
Rukhsana has requested a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s tailoring business. With the loan investment, he will buy clothes and a sewing machine that will allow him to improve his business. He will also hire a worker for completing the orders on time.

Rukhsana is also a seamstress and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. She is an expert in women’s clothes sewing and due to her good quality work, gets regular orders every month.

She has given birth to two sons and a daughter. Her sons are getting their education while her daughter has not yet started her education.

She is confident that her husband will successfully be able to improve his income by investing the loan into his business.

loans.use: to buy clothes and a sewing machine for her husband's tailoring business.

loans.name: Rey

texts.en:
Rey is a farmer within his village, he grows corn crops on his five hectares of farmland. He is 39 years old, married and blessed with six children. Rey wanted to increase his profit to educate all his children and give them a better quality of life. He uses the profit gained from his farming business for his children's education, daily meals and for replanting his farmland.

Rey has also been involved in the livestock business for almost 18 years. He is currently raising three sows and one boar. Due to an increase in household expenditures, expensive farm supplies and hog feed, he struggles with a shortage of capital. For this reason, he would like a loan of P15,000 to buy hog feed.  He will use this loan wisely in order to develop his rice field and livestock business to earn a higher profit and save for the future emergencies of the family.

loans.use: to buy hog feed for his livestock business

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 33 years old and married to Mayflor. The couple is blessed with three children. Richard has raised hogs for two years and he is also engaged in the  farming business. All three children are still studying. So, his income is spent on children's education, daily meals and maintenance of his farming business.

He is asking for a loan of P15,000 to purchase livestock feed and vitamins in order to improve the hogs' growth to maturity. This loan amount would really help him in fulfilling his family's needs and in attaining his goal in life, which is to support his children until they finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed and vitamins

loans.name: Soeun

texts.en:
59-year-old Soeun is a mother of ten children.  However, she has responsibility only for her two children who are still in school as some of her children are factory workers and some are helping her in the current business, rice farming. She has been with this business for 20 years to feed this big family and she earns about US$6 per day.

Soeun joined VisionFund in 2011 and successfully repaid back her loan which has made her make a better living. Now she is requesting a new loan in second cycle in amount of KHR 3,000,000. She will use this loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland and to build a new latrine.  She hopes to earn more income and continue in improving her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland and to build a new latrine

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es:
La señora Maria Esperanza es casada, tiene 34 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos que están estudiando, se dedica al comercio, a la venta de ropa para mujeres, inició este negocio por iniciativa propia y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mercadería, blusas, suéteres, fajas, sabanas, et, espera tener una negocio prospero, y mejorar sus ganancias de venta.
texts.en:
Maria Esperanza is 34 years old, married, and has two children.  She completed six years of 'educación primaria' (education for children aged 7-14).  Her business is selling women's clothing.  She started the business on her own initiative and has three years experience.

Maria Esperanza is requesting a loan to buy merchandise: blouses, sweaters, 'fajas' (woven sashes worn as belts), sheets, etc.  She hopes to have a prosperous business and to improve her profits.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Kodzo

texts.fr:
Kodzo est un homme âgé de 32 ans. Il est marié å un/e coiffeuse. Il a 03enfants.
Kodzo travaille comme maintenancier , réparateur et vendeur de téléphones portables depuis 2002. Il exerce seul son activité dans une boutique qu’il a loué et achète ses produits à Lomé.
Kodzo a requis son troisième  crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des appareils portables pour la revente. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité et avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Kodzo is a 32-year old man, who is married to a hairdresser. He has three children.

Kodzo has been servicing, repairing and selling mobile telephones since 2002. He carries out his business alone in a shop which he has rented, and he buys his products in Lomé.

Kodzo has requested a third loan from WAGES so that he can buy mobile 'phones to resell. He wants to reinvest in his business and have a happy family.

loans.use: to buy mobile telephones

loans.name: Fredy

texts.en:
Fredy is happily living with his wife and two children within the local community of Pinto Alfonso Lista. His place is known to be mountainous and agricultural.

He has run and managed his hog-raising business for five years. He is currently raising one sow and two hogs for fattening. He plans to obtain more hogs to raise in order to gain more income to meet all his family's needs and cover his agricultural expenses. But due to insufficient capital, he is asking for financial assistance from lenders in the amount of 15,000 Philippine pesos. He will use this loan amount to purchase feed to improve his hog-raising business. Fredy would be glad if his requested loan amount were approved.

loans.use: to buy feed for his livestock business

loans.name: Albert

texts.en:
Albert is a patient and loving father of four children. He is 41 years of age and is a widower. Albert not only fills the role of a father, but also stands in as a mother for his children. In order to meet his responsibilities to his children, Albert maintains a farming business, which involves planting rice crops on his farm.

Albert is patiently carrying his responsibility. Sometimes he feels burdened for being alone, but he is striving for the future of his children--his inspiration to continue the journey of life.

With his situation in life, Albert is having a hard time financing his farm to maintain his business. Thus, he is requesting a loan of 25,000 Philippine pesos to buy seeds and fertilizers and pay for the cost of labor in farming. He hopes that he can strive to overcome the struggles he will encounter in life.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers and pay for farm labor

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
To make a living, Jose raises hogs and engages in agricultural business. He has run his hog-raising business for one year. Aside from raising hogs, Jose plants his one hectare of farmland with corn crops to obtain a larger income.

Jose is married with seven children. Four of his children are studying; two are working as hired laborers on a farm and one is out of school due to insufficient funds. Due to the large number of household members, Jose and his wife carefully manage their hog and farming business.  According to Jose, the profit from his two businesses is not enough to meet all the family's household needs and the school expenses of his four children.  So, he is asking for additional capital in the amount of P15,000. He will use this loan amount to buy feed and vitamins for the hogs. He hopes that his business will improve to earn more income and give his children a quality education.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins to improve the growth of his hogs

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is 52 and married, with two grown-up children. They live in a village, planting rice and vegetables for sale.  She and her husband agreed to strengthen their sources of income to satisfy the family's needs and educate their children. Due to their financial burden, Narcisa is involved in a hog-raising business to generate additional income. She has been in this business for almost 10 years. Through patience and hard work, she can earn profits of P10,000 on every two heads of pigs she sells. She utilized her income for their food and allowances of their children. 

She planned to improve her pigpen and acquire more piglets to raise, but due to inadequate capital, she is asking for an additional P20,000 loan to buy feed, vitamins, piglets and materials need to improve the pigpen. She is hoping that she will be successful in managing her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, piglets and materials need to improve the pigpen

loans.name: Nally

texts.en:
Nally is a hardworking mother of four children. She has been involved in buying and selling hogs for over two years and has extensive experience in this business. This business brings in a good profit both to the business and the family budget. 

Nally dreams of lifting her family from poverty; this is why she works hard at her hog raising business. She also wants to provide the necessities for her pigs. Therefore, she has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy feed, vaccines, and vitamins for her pigs. She hopes this will make them fit and nourished, and provide higher prices when it is time for them to be sold. She also hopes to grow her business to secure a good living for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines, and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Andres Rigoberto

texts.es:
El señor Andres Rigoberto es casado, tiene 27 años de edad, esta graduado de maestro de educacion primaria, tiene 2 hijos 1 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a impartir clases a niños, tiene este trabajo gracias gracias al apoyo de su familia, tiene un año de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de productos para una tienda, compra de aguas gaseosas, jugos, embutidos, lácteos, golosinas, etc. Espera que su tienda sea un negocio prospero.
texts.en:
Mr. Andres Rigoberto is 27 years old, married, and the father of two children, one of whom is in school. This elementary education graduate is dedicated to teaching children, and thanks to his family's support is holding a job in which he has one year of experience.

He is applying for a loan he will use to purchase products for a general store (carbonated water, fruit juice, sausages, dairy products, candy, etc.). He hopes his store will become a thriving business.

loans.use: Buy products for his store

loans.name: Danny Andres

texts.es:
Emprendedor es la mejor palabra para caracterizar a Danny, un joven de 26 años que desde hace aproximadamente 7 años se dedica a la producción musical. Danny proviene de una familia donde la mayoría son músicos, lo que hace que lleve intrínseco el amor por la música. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus producciones, Danny tiene muy buen reconocimiento en su región, lo que ha hecho que pueda salir adelante con su estudio musical y conseguir una gran cantidad de clientes. Debido a que su negocio esta constantemente renovándose, Danny requiere realizar la compra de una tarjeta de sonido, sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar esta compra. Es por esto que Danny espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una tarjeta de sonido profesional con la cual pueda realizar sus producciones con una mayor calidad.

Danny espera que de esta manera pueda conseguir su tarjeta de sonido sin que sus ingresos mensuales se vean afectados, además, de poder seguir contribuyendo económicamente en su hogar. Danny sueña con tener un gran estudio de producción musical, que sea reconocido en el país y grandes artistas graben en su estudio.
texts.en:
'Entrepreneur' is the best word to describe Danny, a young man of 26 who has been in the music production business for approximately seven years.  Danny comes from a family of musicians which means he has an innate love of music.  Thanks to the good quality of his productions, Danny is very well known in his region.  This has enabled him to move forward with his music studio and gain a large number of customers.  Owing to the fact that his business is constantly updating itself, Danny needs to buy a sound card.  As he doesn't have enough capital to make this purchase he hopes to receive a loan which will allow him to buy a professional sound card.  This will enable him to make better-quality productions.  

Danny hopes that, in this way, he will be able to buy his sound card without affecting his monthly income.  He also hopes to be able to continue contributing financially to his household.  Danny dreams of having a large music studio which is well known around the country and that great artists will come and record in his studio.

loans.use: to buy a professional sound card so that he can make better quality productions

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr:
Amélé est une femme âgée de 23 ans. Elle est mariée å un chauffeur. Elle a 2 enfants, dont 1 à l’école. Le premier a 04ans et le dernier 02ans.
Amélé travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2009. Elle vend des produits d’alimentation générale pour tous clients dans sa boutique. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la concurrence sur le marché.
Amélé a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits d’alimentation générale ainsi que des produits congelés. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Amélé voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’assurer l’éducation de ses enfants afin qu’ils vivent heureux.
texts.en:
Amélé is a 23-year old woman, who is married to a driver. She has two children, one of whom is at school. The eldest child is four years old and the youngest two years old. Amélé has been working as a retailer since 2009. She sells groceries to all sorts of customers in her shop. She buys her products in Lomé and she works alone. Her main difficulty at the moment is the competition on the market. 

Amélé has requested her first loan from WAGES to buy groceries as well as frozen products. She wants to reinvest in her business. In the coming years, she would like to increase her business volume. She says that with the profits she makes she is planning to provide for her children's education, so that they can live happily.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Mohran

texts.en:
Mohran is a 27-year-old young man. He is married with no children yet. He is a Palestinian National Authority employee who gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's costs. 

Mohran has a small farm and wants to cultivate it with olive seedlings, so he is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing olive seedlings and improving the farm's condition. This will enable Mohran and the family to eat from its crop in the near future and sell part of the crop to increase the family income.

Mohran is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: to purchase olive seedlings.

loans.name: Yahiya

texts.en:
Yahiya is 48-years-old and a father with three sons and three daughters. He is pictured here. For the past ten years, he has operated a food stall where he sells Palestinian traditional food such as hummus, foul, and falafel. Yahiya's business has been profitable but he lacks the raw ingredients to produce his food.

Yahiya is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help cover the cost of purchasing bulk ingredients to make falafel, hummus, and foul. He will also improve the condition of his food stall. His loan will increase his sales and improve his family's income.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients to make food

loans.name: Khalida's Group

texts.en:
Khalida has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing and embroidery business. With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine that will allow her to complete orders on time, because her current machine has become rough and needs replacement. She will also buy beads, thread, and embroidery frames for the improvement of her embroidery business as well. 

Her husband sells wood. In his area, people use wood for cooking food and purchase wood from him regularly. Khalida has given birth to five children. Only two of them are able to get an education, while the others remain at home. She is hopeful that the loan will help her make her business more profitable by offering better quality services to her customers.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for sewing business

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en:
Romeo is a hog raiser within his village. He raises hogs in order to resell them for a profit. He has been doing this kind of work for almost 20 years. He is currently raising one hog for fattening and three piglets. According to him, the profit gained from his business is used to pay for their bills at home, school fees for their children, and daily meals. 

Romeo is 49 years old, married, and has seven children. Three of his children have settled into marriage; the other three are still studying, and one is out of school due to insufficient capital. Romeo would like his three children to finish their degree courses so they can find better opportunities for their future. To attain his dream, he is requesting a loan amounting to 15,000 Philippine pesos, which will be used to buy vitamins and feed for his hogs. He knows that this loan amount will help him improve his business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for his hog-raising business

loans.name: Rat's Group

texts.en:
One of the villagers in Tbeung Khmum district in which rice farming is one of the common businesses, Rat is 62-year-old mother of four dependent children.She earns a living through farming as the primary source of income and works for others for pay as the additional income. She has been with this business for almost 31 years and she can earn US$6 per day.

Rat joined VisionFund as the first cycled client in 2011. She completely repaid the loan and has managed to buy a buffalo for plowing her farmland. Now she leads a group and is requesting a loan of KHR 500,000 to buy seed and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy seed and fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Heng

texts.en:
Heng is 46 years old and married of six children, 2 of whom are still in school. To strive for the entire family, she has been growing rice for 26 years and planting cassava for 3 years. Moreover, she also raises pigs for sale and works for others for pay as extra income.

Heng completely repaid back her first loan with VisionFund which has helped make a better living than before and she can earn US$9 per day. Now she is applying for a second loan of KHR 2,000,000 to buy fertilizer for her Cassava plantation.She hopes to produce more crop yield.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her Cassava plantation

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Oun

texts.en:
Oun is aged 53 and a mother of seven children, 3 of whom are dependent and still in school while the rest are working for pay at the construction site. She has been farming for 20 years to support her family as the main source of income. Additionally, she also buys and sells cows as the supplementary income and she can earn almost US$10 per day.

This is a first loan with VisionFund and she is requesting a loan of KHR 1,500,000 to buy more cows for her farmland as well as for sale. She hopes to earn more income and buy more tools for her business expansion in the future.

loans.use: To buy more cows for farmland and for sale

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
Leonardo se dedica a su negocio de billares desde hace aproximadamente 12 años. Leonardo se encuentra casado y es padre de 2 hijos a quienes les ha querido brindar una educación de calidad. Leonardo atiende su negocio todos los días con el ánimo de poder generar buenos ingresos para su hogar y constantemente está buscando ofrecer nuevos servicios para sus clientes. Actualmente, Leonardo quiere colocar una máquina de juegos en su billar, para poder así atraer más clientes y generar mayores ingresos para su hogar. Con el ánimo de hacer esta compra, Leonardo aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina de juegos para colocar en su negocio de billares. 

Leonardo espera que de esta manera su negocio aumente las ventas y de esta manera genere mayores ingresos para su hogar para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Leonardo sueña con tener un gran negocio donde pueda atender a una gran cantidad de clientes y pueda generar empleo para las personas más vulnerables de su municipio.
texts.en:
Leonardo has worked at his billiards business for about 12 years. Leonardo is married and the father of 2 children, who he has wanted to provide with good quality education. Leonardo attends to his business every day, enthusiastic to earn a good income for his family. He is constantly looking to offer new services to his customers. Leonardo wants to put a game machine in his pool hall in order to attract more customers and earn more income for his family. To be able to make this purchase, Leonardo hopes to take out a loan. 

Leonardo hopes that the game machine will increase his sales and generate more income, which would allow his family to enjoy a better quality of life. Leonardo’s dream is to have a large business where he can attend to a large number of clients. He also hopes to create jobs to employ the most vulnerable people in his municipality.

loans.use: buy a game machine to put in his pool hall

loans.name: Gloria Amparo

texts.es:
Gloria se dedica a la actividad de la confección desde hace aproximadamente 30 años, gracias a que aprendió de un curso de confección que tomó. Desde entonces, Gloria se ha venido generando sus propios ingresos con esta actividad, pues desde el comienzo montó su propio taller de confección donde ha realizado el servicio de confección a terceros. Gloria se encuentra casada y junto con su esposo ha podido superar grandes adversidades que le ha presentado la vida. Gloria tuvo un tiempo de crisis durante el cual tuvo que cerrar su negocio, sin embargo, sus ganas de salir adelante le permitieron superarlo y ha podido reiniciar su taller de confección. Gloria, con el ánimo de continuar mejorando su taller de confección para poder ofrecer el mejor servicio a sus clientes, busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina fileteadora la cual le permita ofrecer un servicio de mejor calidad a sus clientes y poder agilizar su trabajo de confección.

Gloria espera que su negocio vuelva a los niveles de ventas que tenía anteriormente y poder generar ingresos con los cuales pueda mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, además, de poder generar empleo para las personas que más lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Gloria has worked in dressmaking for approximately 30 years because she learned how in a sewing class she took. Since then, Gloria has been earning her own income with this activity. From the beginning, she set up her own sewing shop where she has sewn items for third parties.

Gloria is married, and together with her husband she has been able to overcome great adversity in her life. Gloria went through a time of crisis, during which she had to close her business. However, her desire to get ahead allowed her to overcome the crisis, and she has been able to re-open her sewing shop. Gloria, who desires to continue improving her sewing shop so she can offer her customers the best service, is asking for a loan which will make it possible for her to buy an overlock sewing machine. This will allow her to offer better-quality service to her customers and make her dressmaking business more agile.

Gloria hopes that her business will return to its previous levels of sales and that it will be able to generate income so she can improve her family's quality of life. She also wants to create jobs for people who need them most.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Imee

texts.en: Imee is a hard-working woman who will engage herself in any opportunity that she knows will help her family uplift their living standard. Imee is married and blessed with one kid. Her husband is a farmer, and at the same time a driver. Imee is engaged in a retailing business. She is gaining income from selling a variety of goods in her sari-sari store, retailing mobile loads and rice. Sometimes she sells cosmetics products for an additional source of income, but she gains more income from her sari-sari store. Imee wanted to expand the products she offers to her costumers, but she did not have enough capital to do so. In this connection, Imee is asking for a loan of 50,000 Philippine pesos to buy rice to sell, drinks, spices, and canned goods.

loans.use: to buy rice to sell, drinks, spices, and canned goods.

loans.name: Pek

texts.en:
As a breadwinner of the family and 48 years old, Pek is a widowed father of eight children. Out of his eight children, he has to support only four children who are still in school. He earns a living through rice farming in both seasons, dry and rainy; and he earns almost US$8.5 per day.

Pek has never been with VisionFund before. Now he is requesting a loan of KHR 1,600,000 to lease an additional plot of land for growing rice and to hire laborer for plowing his farmland. He hopes to make a better living than before

loans.use: To lease an additional plot of land for growing rice and to hire laborer for plowing his farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Siny

texts.en:
Siny is a young 22-year-old mother of one daughter who is too young for attending school. 
To make a living, she has been planting rice as the primary source of income and raising pigs as the extra income for 5 years.

Siny joined the first loan with VisionFund in 2011. She completely repaid back the loan and it has helped her in expanding her business and increasing her income. Now she is applying for a loan of KHR 2,000,000 to buy pig's feed and more piglets. She hopes to earn more income and keep her pig-raising business growing.

loans.use: To buy pig's feed and more piglets

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Kheng

texts.en:
Aged 32 with no children, Kheng is a divorced woman living in a village of Ponhea Krek district, Cambodia. She is a farmer and also a tailor who has been with this business for almost ten years.

Kheng received the first loan with VisionFund in 2010 and she successfully repaid back the loan. The loan has helped her business growth well and she can earn about US$12 per day. Now she is requesting for second loan of KHR 4,000,000 to lease a small shop and necessary material such as fabric, needle, thread, etc. for her tailoring business. She hopes to earn more income and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To lease a small shop and necessary material such as fabric, needle, thread, etc. for her tailoring business

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia is 36 years old, married and a mother of 2 sons and a daughter. her eldest son is a rickshaw driver while her remaining two children are enrolled in local school and getting their education.
Razia is a housewife as well as working lady. She is an embroidery expert and makes beautiful looking embroidered clothes for her community clients.
Her husband is a rickshaw driver and provides transport services to his passengers. 
Razia has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah because her husband wants to expand his business. With the loan investment, he will buy another rickshaw which he will give on rent for making extra profits.
Razia is very confident that by improving her husband’s business, her family will be able to enjoy better financial life.

loans.use: To buy an Autorickshaw for transport business

loans.name: Mumtaz's Group

texts.en:
Mumtaz has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her family business of livestock. She operates this business with her husband and has a lot of experience in it. With the loan investment, her husband will buy goats, sheep in larger number that will allow him selling to butchers on profit. 
Mumtaz also knows the art of sewing and uses her skills in her spare time to earn profits.
She is the mother of 3 sons and a daughter. her eldest son works in a factory while others remain at home.
She is very hardworking person and also performs her household duties very well along with her business.
She is very confident that a loan investment will allow her husband to improve his business and earn better income.
Note:"In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Mumtaz."

loans.use: To buy goats, sheep for animal selling business

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem is a mother of three sons and a daughter. Her eldest son works while her remaining children are continuing their education by attending a nearby school.

Naseem herself is also a working lady and sells clothes to her community clients and to different clothes shop at a profit. She also knows the art of sewing and makes beautiful-looking clothes on order.

She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her clothes selling business. With the loan investment, she will buy clothes at wholesale prices for selling.

She is an experienced business lady and knows the latest trends in clothing. She is confident about her success in business after investing the loan.

loans.use: To buy clothes for clothes selling business

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.en:
Ricardo is 41 years old. He is married and has four children. He has been involved in his farm business for 20 years. He has three hectares of land where he grows rice. He sells his harvest to traders and earned about 40,000 PHP last crop season. The income will then help him to cope with the needs of his family and give his children a higher education. 

Ricardo wants to obtain a loan in the amount of PHP15,000 to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers and rice seedlings. He hopes that he can get the amount he requested to further growth of his business.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers and rice seedlings

loans.name: C5264  Dupendane Group

texts.en:
Theoneste is 32 years old and is married with two children ages five and 16. For the past two years, he has worked selling items such as Irish potatoes, soap, sugar, rice and vegetables. His business is open from six in the morning through two in the afternoon every day and he currently employs two people to help him. Theoneste is the leader of his loan group that is called "C5264 Dupendane" in the local language. 

Theoneste is requesting a loan from Kiva via the Vision Finance Company to purchase more Irish potatoes, soap, sugar, rice, and other items to sell. With the profit from his loan, he hopes to save money for medical insurance and to pay his children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase soap, sugar, rice, and other items to sell

loans.name: Ameeran's Group

texts.en:
Ameeran is a mother with four sons. For many years, she has been operating a little grocery shop in her home where she sells items such as sugar, spices, and snacks at low rates. Her eldest son supports her in her business and her other sons are studying. Ameeran also buys clothing at wholesale markets and sells items to neighboring clients and clothing shops to make a profit. Ameeran's husband is a farmer who grows different seasonal crops on his land. He is a hard worker who believes in his abilities.

Ameeran is requesting a loan from the Kiva partner Asasah to buy grocery items in bulk to meet customer need, expand her business, and increase her profit and sales. She is confident that her loan will result in a successful business.

loans.use: to buy groceries such as sugar, salt,  and spices to sell

loans.name: Antonia Marta

texts.es:
La señora Antonia Marta es casada, tiene 46 años de edad, cursos estudios de educación primaria, tiene 8 hijos 7 de los cuales estudian, se dedica a la confección de delantales típicos, lleva 12 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la carpintería.

Decide solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de telas típicas de diferente colores y poder mejorar su producción de delantales, espera en el futuro tener un negocio prospero.
texts.en:
Señora Antonia Marta is married, with primary-school-level education.  She has eight children, seven of whom attend school.  She works sewing traditional aprons.  She has 12 years of experience, and has help from her husband who works in carpentry.

She decided to request a loan which she will use for the purchase of traditional fabrics of different colors, so that she will be able to improve her production of aprons.  She hopes to have a prosperous business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fabric.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: El señor Jorge es originario  de Granada, soltero, tiene 2 hijos una de 14 y el otro de  6 en la actualidad se encuentran estudiando. Su experiencia la adquirió hace 10 años cuando trabajaba en un restaurante elaborando platillos y preparando cocteles. En la actualidad hace 2 año comenzó a elaborar cocteles de mariscos  y a distribuirlos por encargos o pedidos a domicilio y en su casa a lo apoya su mama, el producto lo comercializa en la parte céntrica de Granada no tiene otros ingresos, por el momento no esta interesado en comercializar en otro lado su producto, le gustaría tener un restaurante. El crédito lo utilizara para comprar una procesadora de alimentos y ingredientes para elaborar sus cocteles permitiéndole incrementar sus ingresos y mejorando la calidad del  producto. Uno de sus  planes a futuro es poder   tener un local  donde pueda vender  sus deliciosos cocteles y dar una buena atención a sus clientes y alcanzar sus sueños de tener su propio restaurante.
texts.en:
Señor Jorge is originally from Granada.  He is single, with two children; one is aged 14, and the other aged 6, and they currently attend school.  

He acquired his experience ten years ago when he was working in a restaurant preparing dishes and cocktails.  Two years ago, he started preparing seafood dishes and distributing them in response to orders or requests.  He works from his home with the help of his mom, and sells his products in the central part of Granada.  He has no other income. 

For now, he is not interested in selling his products in another part of town, as he would like to have a restaurant.  He will use the loan to purchase a food processor and ingredients for preparing his dishes, allowing him to increase his income and improve the quality of his product.

One of his plans for the future is to be able to have premises where he can sell his delicious dishes, provide good service to his customers, and achieve his dreams of having his own restaurant.

loans.use: o purchase a food processor and ingredients for preparing his dishes

loans.name: Khalifa

texts.fr:
Khalifa est boutiquier depuis 7 ans. En plus de cela, il fait aussi de l’embouche. Il est à sa première expérience de crédit .Khalifa âgé de 32 ans, marié a investi très tôt dans le commerce : il faisait le marchand ambulant et petit à petit il a ouvert une boutique. 
Avec le crédit il va acheter du sucre, du tamarin, des haricots, des céréales, du sel... ; de ces produits il en stocke dans sa boutique mais il fait aussi le tour des marchands pour leur vendre et recueillir leurs commandes. Comme charges, il paie la location de sa boutique.
Comme tout bon commerçant, Khalifa veut diversifier ses produits et services pour améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Khalifa has been a shopkeeper for 7 years. In addition, he also raises livestock. This is his first experience taking out a loan. Khalifa is 32 years old and married. He started working as a vendor early on: he used to work as an itinerant vendor and eventually opened a shop.
He is going to use his loan to buy sugar, tamarind, beans, cereals, salt etc.  He carries these items in his shop but he also visits other sellers to offer his wares and take their orders. As to expenses, he pays rent on his shop. Like every good vendor,  Khalifa would like to diversify his merchandise and services so as to improve the living condition of his family.

loans.use: to buy cereals (millet, corn, wheat), tamarind, sugar, salt and other miscellaneous products

loans.name: Ghulam Fatima's Group

texts.en:
Ghulam Fatima has requested a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her son’s rickshaw transport business. With the loan investment, he will change his autorickshaw body because it has become rough and needs urgent replacement.
By doing that, he will be able to provide better transport services to his passengers and increase his income.
He has been operating his business for sometime now and Ghulam Fatima is very confident that his business will become more profitable after investing the loan.
She is the mother of 2 other daughters who sews clothes for neighboring clients. 
Her husband is a laboerr and earns reasonable amount of income every month.
Ghulam is very efficient lady and performs her household duties very well by staying at home. she also sews clothes and earns reasonable income every month. She is confident about her family's bright future.

loans.use: To buy Autorickshaw body for transport business

loans.name: C5296 Abahizi Group

texts.en:
Claudete is 29 years old and is married with three children who are aged from 3 to 10 years old. She sells bananas, Irish potatoes, beans, sorghum etc. Her business is well organized. She starts from 6am and works until 6pm every day, with four years of experience in this business.

Claudete has requested a loan from Kiva partner Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more bananas, Irish potatoes, beans, and sorghum to sell. With the profit from the loan, Claudete will reinvest in her business and hopes to be able to save money.

loans.use: To purchase more bananas, Irish potatoes, beans, sorghum etc.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is 19 years old and single. She is committed to help her parents and for the past four years has run a hog-raising business in the village of Carabatan Chica. Cristina had to stop her studies because of a lack of funds. She invested her savings and income into her business and presently is generating an average monthly income of 2,000 PHP per hog. Cristina is grateful that her business is doing well.

Cristina is requesting a 5,000 PHP loan to buy vaccines, feed, and an additional hog. She hopes to raise more hogs.

loans.use: to buy vaccines, feed, and a hog

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon remains single at her age of 52. According to her, her goal when she is still young is to help her parents until she overlooks to get married that’s why she is still single until now. Corazon is engaged in agricultural business which is planting crops of rice and corn. She also runs a hog raising business.
At present, Corazon is getting financial shortage because she has multiple businesses to finance. She needs an additional capital to sustain her pigs feed every day. Corazon is asking for a loan of P50,000 to buy feed for the maintenance of her hogs. She hopes to succeed in the business she has.

loans.use: To buy feed for the maintenance of her hogs.

loans.name: Maria Elsy

texts.es:
Maria Elsy es una emprendedora que con gran esfuerzo ha sacado su negocio adelante. Hace aproximadamente 8 años Maria Elsy decidió montar su propio negocio de fabricación de bolsos, y poco a poco ha ido consolidando su negocio en la región. Gracia a este negocio, genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar, donde convive con sus 2 hijos. Debido a que Maria Elsy es una madre soltera cabeza de familia, debe garantizarles a sus 2 hijos unos buenos ingresos para sostener sus gastos. Maria Elsy es muy reconocida en su región por la buena calidad de sus productos y la buena atención que ofrece, y gracias a esto ha podido captar un gran número de clientes que le hacen muy buenos pedidos. Debido a que un cliente suyo le ha hecho un gran pedido, y no cuenta con el inventario suficiente para poder atenderlo, Maria Elsy busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas para la fabricación de sus bolsos y responder a un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente suyo.

Maria Elsy espera poder seguir aumentando las ventas de su negocio y poder mejorarles la calidad de vida a sus 2 hijos. Maria Elsy anhela que su negocio crezca y pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y a corto plazo espera poder abrir un local propio al lado de su taller donde ofrezca sus bolsos.
texts.en:
Maria Elsy is an entrepreneur who, with a lot of hard work, has succeeded in advancing her business. About 8 years ago, Maria Elsy decided to set up a bag making business, and little by little she has strengthened the place of her business in the region. Thanks to her business, she is able to make ends meet for her two sons. Since Maria Elsy is a single mother, she has to earn enough to take care of her sons.

Maria Elsy is well recognized in her region for the good quality of her products and her good customer service. Thanks to this, she has earned a large number of customers that put in a lot of good orders. One of her customers has put in a large order, and Maria Elsy does not currently have enough inventory to fill the order. She would like to take out a loan to purchase the raw materials to make her bags, and therefore, be able to respond to the large request her client has made. 

Maria Elsy hopes to continue increasing sales at her business and improve the quality of life of her two sons. Maria Elsy wishes for her business to grow and to generate jobs for people that most need them. She also hopes that soon she can open a storefront next to her workshop to sell her bags.

loans.use: Purchase raw materials to make bags and fill a large order that one of her customers has made.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.es:
La señora Catarina es casada, tiene 36 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 3 hijos 2 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la artesanía al tejido de cortes típicos, esta trabajando actualmente como operaria en un negocio de tejido, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo. 

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de una plancha de cocina y cosas para uso en la cocina, olla, jarros, vasos, tazas, etc. Espera en el futuro tener su propio comedor y tener clientes que consuman comida, para que pueda mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Catarina is 36 years old and married.  She did not have the opportunity to get an education.  She has three children; two of them go to school.

She devotes herself to handicrafts by weaving traditional clothing.  She is currently working as an operator for a weaving business.  She has her husband’s support, and he does the same work that she does.

She is requesting a loan to buy a griddle and things to use in the kitchen like pots, pitchers, glasses, and cups, etc.  In the future she hopes to have her own eatery and customers to eat her food.  She wants this so that she will be able to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a griddle and kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Juan Alfredo

texts.es:
El señor Juan Alfredo es casado, tiene 31 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educacion primaria, tiene 3 hijos de los cuales 2 estudian, se dedica a la artesanía al tejido de cortes típicos, inició este negocio como operario y hasta el momento lleva 18 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa, quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos, lo cual le permitirá tener mas producción, mejores venta y ganancias. Espera  que su negocio sea grande.
texts.en:
Juan Alfredo is 31 years old and married.  He has a sixth grade education.  He has three children; two of them go to school.

He devotes himself to weaving typical clothing.  He started this business as an operator, and so far he has 18 years of experience.  He has his wife’s support, and she does that same work that he does.

He is requesting the loan to buy yarn, which will allow him to have greater productions and improved sales and income.  He wishes for his business to be big.

loans.use: to buy yarn for weaving.

loans.name: Blanca Nubia

texts.es:
Blanca se dedica a la actividad de la confección desde hace aproximadamente 17 años, gracias a esto ha podido contribuir junto con su esposo al sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Blanca es madre de 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer todo lo necesario, es por esto que debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar, Blanca decidió montar un taller de confección donde ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros. Blanca, gracias a la buena calidad de los servicios que ofrece, ha podido captar una muy buena clientela, lo que le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas. Blanca actualmente quiere aumentar la capacidad de producción de su taller de confección con el ánimo de poder pagar los estudios universitarios de su hijo menor, es por esto que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina plana para aumentar la capacidad de producción de su taller. 

Blanca espera que de esta manera pueda cumplir su sueño de que sus hijos accedan a una educación universitaria, además, de poder mejorarle la calidad de vida a su familia. Blanca espera que su taller aumente las ventas considerablemente y en un futuro hacerlo crecer y poder generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Blanca has been working in the sewing trade for the the last 17 years, approximately.  Thanks to this, she has been able to contribute alongside her husband to covering the household expenses.  Blanca is the mother of two children, whom she has always wanted to provide with everything they need.  It is for this reason, and owing to the fact that the income earned by her husband wasn't sufficient to cover all the household costs, that Blanca decided to set up a sewing workshop where she provides sewing services to third parties.  Thanks to the good quality of the service that she provides, she has been able to gain a very good customer base, which has allowed her to have very good sales.

Blanca currently wants to increase her sewing workshop's production capacity, with the goal of being able to pay for a university education for her younger son.  It is for this reason that she is hoping that a loan will provide her the opportunity of being able to purchase a sewing machine to increase her workshop's production capacity.

Blanca hopes in this way that she can achieve her dream of having her children attain a university education, and additionally, to be able to improve her family's quality of life.  Blanca hopes that her workshop's sales will increase considerably, and in the future she will be able to grow her workshop and be able to create employment opportunities for those who most need them.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine to increase her workshop's production capacity.

loans.name: C5262 Twitezimbere Group

texts.en:
Jean Baptiste is 49 years old and is married with four children between the ages of 3 and 15 years old. His business is well organized. He sells sorghum, beans, and maize in his market and works from 7am until 7pm every day.

Jean Baptiste has requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase more sorghum, beans, and maize to sell. With his profit, Jean Baptiste will buy more food for his family and save money.

loans.use: To purchase more sorghum, beans, maize and so on.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 46 years old and married, with five children between 2 and 13 years old. He owns a business selling general merchandise. This is his fifteenth year in this business. He works from 6 AM until 9 PM every day. 

Joseph has requested a Kiva loan through Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more green bananas, eggs, Irish potatoes, soap, rice, etc. to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase more goods like green bananas, eggs, Irish potatoes, soap, rice, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Khalida's Group

texts.en:
Khalida has five children, two of whom work while the others remain at home. She is a seamstress, sewing clothes for neighborhood clients to financially support her husband who has a job. 

Khalida is requesting a loan from the Kiva partner Asasah to support her brother's welding business. She will use her loan to purchase a new welding machine and hire a worker to assist her brother. Khalida's loan will allow her brother to provide better services to his customers and increase his profits. She is confident that, with her loan investment, her brother will successfully improve his business.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine for her brother's business

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina has been 29 years in farming business. She raises corn and rice in her farm. To further support her children needs in school, Marcelina expand her business into raising of pigs. 
With her earnings in her hog raising of pigs, Marcelina is able to finance her children fees in school. Her business serves as her helper every time she has emergency needs. When times of payment for tuition fees in school, Marcelina sells her pigs to pay immediately her children fees in school.
Marcelina’s hog raising business is a big help for her in able to continue sending her children to school. Due to costly hogs feed now, Marcelina is asking for a loan of P50,000 to buy additional piglets to raise feed for maintenance of pigs. She wishes that she could maintain the business until her children finish their education.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise feed for maintenance of pigs.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 52 years of age, married and has five children. Her children are adult age. Teresita’s husband is a farmer, they both managing their farm business, primarily raises corn crops. 
With her determination to uplift their living and smoothly carry out from poverty, Teresita engaged herself in hog raising business. She considers it as additional source of income of the family. Teresita is continuing her good attitude for the better future of her family.
With regards to her hog raising business, Teresita is asking for a loan of P45,000 to buy additional piglets to raise and feed for the maintenance of her hogs. She hopes to maintain the business and maintain her additional source of income as well.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and feed for the maintenance of her hogs.

loans.name: Seak's Group

texts.en:
Seak is one of the villagers in a rural area of Thmor Koul district, Cambodia. She is 44 years old and a widowed mother of two sons who are still in school. To earn the family's keep, she has been planting rice for 15 years as the main source of income.Additionally, She also produces rice wine for sell as the extra income.

Seak has been with VisionFund since 2010, and she completely repaid the all the remaining loan already. The loan has made her a better living especially in fixing her house and buying the school's materials for her sons. Now she can earn about US$5 per day. Currently, she is a group leader of other four members and she is applying for a new loan in amount of KHR 600,000.00. She will use this entire loan to build a decent house for her family. She hopes to have a proper shelter as the others.

loans.use: To build a decent house for her family

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is a loving woman who has two adult children. She is able to send her children to school and finish their education through her profits from farming business. She is planting corn in her field and at the same time she engages herself in hog raising business.
Rosita doesn’t want to rely only on her children to sustain her needs. She is working hard to sustain her needs and share with her grandchildren what she has. Rosita wants to maintain her business hog raising to support her emergency needs if in case she will encounter.
Rosita is requesting a loan of P36,000 to buy feed for the maintenance of her pigs and additional piglets to raise. She will manage well her business and looking towards for the growth of it.

loans.use: to buy feed for the maintenance of her pigs and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Sreypov's Group

texts.en:
Sreypov, 29, is a young mother of two children who are still in school.To feed her family, she has been growing soybean and sesame for 10 years.

Sreypov joined VisionFund for the past 4 cycles already. With her effort, she managed to repay back the loan successfully. The loan has made a better living for family. Now she is a leader of a group loan with another member who is the first cycled client. She is requesting a loan of KHR 1,400,000 to buy seed and fertilizer for both soybean and sesame plantation. She hopes to earn more income and make a better living.

loans.use: To buy seed and fertilizer for both soybean and sesame plantation

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is 26, married and has one school-age child. Marissa is engaged in a hog-raising business to supplement her husband's income. They aim to improve their living condition so that they will become financially stable and give their child a better future. Despite problems and difficulties they encountered in life, Marissa aims to continue and improve her business to earn a higher income. 

Due to financial constraints, Marissa is asking for an additional capital of 20,000 PHP to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed in her hog-raising business. She believes that through patience and strong determination she will be able to make an improvement in the business and hopes that she will be successful someday.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising business

loans.name: Chenda's Group

texts.en:
At age 38, Chenda is married with three daughters who are still in school. To support the entire family, she and her husband have been farming for 10 years as their main source of income. They sometimes catch fish to sell as extra income and she can earn about 5 USD per day.

Her first loan with VisionFund was in 2008 and she managed to repay it back successfully. The loan has made her a better living and enabled her to send all of her children to school. She is a group leader of the new loan of 1,400,000 KHR each. She will use the entire loan to buy seed and fertilizer for her farmland. With the loan, she hopes to get high crop yield and keep all of her children in school until tertiary level.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Maria Viglenice

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que ha atravesado por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de salir adelante le han permitido superarlas y continuar progresando en su vida. Maria es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 6 hijos, a quienes siempre les ha buscado brindar una buena calidad de vida. Debido a que el padre de sus hijos los abandonó hace un tiempo sin contribuir económicamente a los ingresos para su hogar, Maria tuvo que generar sus propios ingresos y al mismo tiempo estar pendiente del cuidado de sus hijos menores. De allí le surgió la idea de vender desde su casa productos de uso personal como lociones, cremas, desodorantes, entre otros y gracias a esto genera sus ingresos. Maria es muy reconocida en su región gracias a la buena atención que presta a sus clientes, y por esto ha podido captar gran cantidad de clientes y algunos de ellos le hacen pedidos de su mercancía en grandes cantidades. Debido a que un cliente le ha hecho un pedido de una gran cantidad de sus productos, Maria busca un préstamo que le permita acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal para atender un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente. 

Maria espera que su negocio siga aumentando las ventas y pueda seguir ofreciendo a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida. Maria sueña con tener un gran negocio donde pueda generar empleo y le genere grandes ingresos, con los cuales pueda brindarles la oportunidad a sus hijos de acceder a una educación de calidad y a los mayores el acceso a una educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Maria has been through many hardships in her life; nevertheless, her drive to get ahead in life has allowed her to overcome them and continue progressing in her life. Maria is a single mother with 6 children, and she has always searched for ways to give them a good quality of life. The father of her children abandoned them a long time ago without contributing anything to the household income. Maria had to earn her own income while being in charge of the care of her children. 

She had the idea of selling personal use products such as lotions, creams, deodorants, and other products out of her home. Thanks to this business, she can earn an income. Maria is well recognized in her region because of the good customer service she offers her clients, which has allowed her to gain a large number of customers.Some of them put in orders for large quantities of merchandise. Maria wants to take out a loan to buy products for personal use in order to fill a customer’s larger order. 

Maria hopes that her business’s sales will continue increasing and that she will be able to continue offering her children a good quality of life. Her dream is to have a large business that would create jobs and provide her with a lot of income, which she would use to give her kids a good education and send her older kids to college.

loans.use: Purchase products for personal use to fill a customer’s large order

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
La señora Manuela es casada, tiene 31 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educacion primaria, tiene 3 hijos 2 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la confección de playeras, inició siendo operaria hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Solicita un créditos para utilizarlo en la compra de telas y una maquinas, para poder mejorar su producción, y poder tener un negocio propio, ya que al momento esta como operaria.
texts.en:
Manuela is 31 years old and married.  She has a third grade education.  She has three children; two of them go to school.  

She makes tennis shoes.  She started as an operator, and up until now she has five years of experience.

She is requesting a loan to buy fabric and a machine in order to improve her production.  She will also use the loan to be able to have her own business because she works as an operator at this time.

loans.use: to buy fabric and a machine.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
Juan es una persona que ha podido salir adelante y progresar junto a su familia gracias a sus ganas de trabajar y siempre hacerle frente a las dificultades. Juan se encuentra casado y es padre de 2 hijos de 5 y 7 años de edad, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer todo lo necesario. Juan se ha dedicado a trabajar para empresas de productos lácteos gran parte de su vida, y esto le ha permitido lograr conocer muy bien el sector. Juan, gracias a que su jefe le dio la oportunidad de distribuir los productos por su cuenta y con un margen de ganancia que le permite tener muy buenas utilidades, alquila un vehículo diariamente para la distribución de los productos y poder así llegar a atender a más clientes durante el día. El alquiler del vehículo tiene un costo muy elevado, lo que hace que las utilidades del negocio se disminuyan considerablemente. Con el ánimo de poder seguir teniendo buenas utilidades para su negocio, Juan aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra del vehículo que alquila para la distribución de los productos lácteos y poder tener así unas mayores utilidades.

Juan espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá seguir distribuyendo los productos sin tener que pagar un alquiler diario, el cual tiene un costo muy elevado. Juan espera que con mayores utilidades pueda ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, y a sus hijos el acceso a una educación de mayor calidad.
texts.en:
Juan is someone who has been able to move ahead in live and progress alongside his family, thanks to his desire to work and always face difficulties head-on.  Juan is married and the father of two children aged 5 and 7, whom he has always wanted to provide with everything they need.

Juan has been working for dairy product companies for most of his life, and this has allowed him to to gain very good knowledge of this sector. Thanks to his boss, who gave him the opportunity to distribute products on his own account with a profit margin that allowed him to generate good earnings, Juan rents a vehicle on a daily basis for distribution of his products.  In this way he is able to serve more clients during the day.  Renting this vehicle is very expensive, which decreases his business' profits considerably.  With the goal of being able to have good profits for his business, Juan hopes that a loan will provide him with the opportunity to purchase the vehicle that he currently rents for distributing his dairy products.  In this way he will be able to have better profits.

Juan hopes that in this way his income will increase considerably, as he will be able to continue distributing his products without having to pay for daily vehicle rental, which is very expensive.  Juan hopes that with better profits, he will be able to provide his family with a better quality of life, and provide his children with access to a better quality of education.

loans.use: to purchase the vehicle that he currently rents for distributing dairy products, and in this way to be able to have better profits.

loans.name: Nakry's Group

texts.en:
In aged 40, Nakry is a married with three children. Out of her three children, one child is still in school while another two children are working as the factory workers. Since cricket is one of the popular foods in Cambodia, she makes a living through catching crickets for sale. She has been with this business for three years.

This is the fifth cycle for her and her group member with VisionFund. The loan has gradually improved her living condition and she managed to buy a few lamps for catching the cricket. As the result, she can earn about US$7.5 per day.She is now requesting a loan of KHR 1,200,000 to buy a machine for catching more crickets. She hopes to buy a motorbike as her own asset for transporting the crickets to the market and earn more income.

loans.use: To buy a machine for catching more crickets to sell

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Due to hardships of living, Marivic involves in hog-raising business to generates additional income. She is 46, married and has three school-age children. With her husband, they planned to improve their source of living to continue sending their children to school. To work out their plan, Marivic aimed to improve her hog-raising business to increase her income. 

Due to insufficient capital, she is requesting for an additional of P25,000 to buy feeds, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising. She mentioned that her loan will be helpful in improving their business and hoping that she will make her business grow and profitable in the future.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising

loans.name: Boeun's Group

texts.en:
Living in one of the remote area located in the Moung Russey district, Boeun is a 39-year-old mother of three children who are still in school. She has been farming for 15 years as the primary source of income. 
To better feed for the family, she sells vegetables and fishes which are transported by an old bike from one village to another.
